GV02pncvbr1u:459_0: (PB 5.3.10) tasmād varaṇo bhiṣajya etena hi devā ātmānam atrāyanta (PB 5.3.11) tasmād brāhmaṇo vāraṇena na pibed vaiśvānaraṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:459_1: necchamayā iti (PB 5.3.12) paśavo vai vāravantīyaṃ śāntiḥ paśavaḥ śāntād eva tat saṃvvatsarād uttiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:460_0: (PB 5.4.1) prāṇena purastād āhavanīyam upatiṣṭhante prāṇam eva taj jayanti (PB 5.4.2) apānena paścāt puccham upatiṣṭhante
GV02pncvbr1u:460_1: apānam eva taj jayanti (PB 5.4.3) vratapakṣābhyāṃ pakṣāv upatiṣṭhante diśa eva taj jayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:461: (PB 5.4.4) prajāpater hṛdayenāpikakṣam upatiṣṭhante jyaiṣṭhyam eva taj
GV02pncvbr1u:463: (PB 5.4.5) vasiṣṭhasya nihavena cātvālam upatiṣṭhante svargam eva tal lokam āotvā śriyaṃ vadante (PB 5.4.6) vaiśvadevyām ṛci bhavati viśvarūpaṃ vai paśūnāṃ rūpaṃ paśūn eva
GV02pncvbr1u:464: taj jayanti (PB 5.4.7) sattrasyarddhyāgnīdhram upatiṣṭhanta ṛddhāv eva pratitiṣṭhanti (PB 5.4.8) caturakṣarāṇidhanaṃ bhavati catuṣpādāḥ paśavaḥ paśuṣv eva
GV02pncvbr1u:466: (PB 5.4.9) ātamitor nidhanam upayanty āyur eva sarvam āpnuvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:467: (PB 5.4.10) ślokānuślokābhyāṃ havirdhāne upatiṣṭhante kīrtim eva taj
GV02pncvbr1u:469: (PB 5.4.11) yāmena mārjālīyam upatiṣṭhante pitṛlokam eva taj jayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:470: (PB 5.4.12) āyurṇavastobhābhyāṃ sada upatiṣṭhante brahma caiva tat kṣatraṃ ca jayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:472: (PB 5.4.14) indraṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāny astuvaṃs tasyarśya ekam aṅgam astutam acāyat tad asyaitenāstaut tenāsya priyaṃ dhāmopāgacchat priyam evāsyaitena dhāmopagacchanti
GV02pncvbr1u:473: (PB 5.4.15) yat paro'kṣaṃ nidhanam upeyur hrītamukhaṃ pratimuñceran pratyakṣam upayanti hrītamukham evāpajayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:474: (PB 5.5.1) āsandīm āruhyodgāyati devasākṣya eva tad upariṣadyaṃ jayati
GV02pncvbr1u:475: (PB 5.5.2) audumbarī bhavaty ūrg udumbara ūrjam evāvarunddhe
GV02pncvbr1u:477: (PB 5.5.4) chandobhir ārohati svargam eva tal lokam ārohati
GV02pncvbr1u:478: (PB 5.5.5) chandobhir upāvarohaty asmiṃ loke pratitiṣṭhati (PB 5.5.6) sarveṇātmanā samuddhṛtyodgeyam eṣu lokeṣu ned vyāhito 'sānīti
GV02pncvbr1u:479_0: (PB 5.5.7) ekasyāṃ stotrīyāyām astutāyāṃ pādāv upāharati (PB 5.5.8) saha nidhanena pratiṣṭhām upayanty eṣeṣv eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhante
GV02pncvbr1u:479_1: (PB 5.5.9) preṅkhām āruhya hotā śaṃsati mahasa eva tad rūpaṃ kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:480: (PB 5.5.10) yadā vai prajā maha āviśati preṅkhās tarhy ārohanti (PB 5.5.11) phalakam āruhyādhvaryuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:481_0: (PB 5.5.12) kūrcān itare 'dhyāsata ūrdhvā eva tad utkrāmanto yanti (PB 5.5.13) abhigarāpagarau bhavato nindaty enān anyaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:481_1: prānyaḥ śaṃsati ya enān nindati pāpmānam eṣāṃ so 'pahanti yaḥ praśaṃsati yad evaiṣāṃ suṣṭutaṃ suśastaṃ tat so 'bhigṛṇāti
GV02pncvbr1u:482: (PB 5.5.14) śūdrāryau carmaṇi vyāyacchete tayor āryaṃ varṇam ujjāpayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:483: (PB 5.5.15) devāś ca vā asurāś cāditye vyāyacchantas taṃ devā abhyajayaṃs
GV02pncvbr1u:485: parāsurā abhavann ātmanā parāsya bhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:486: (PB 5.5.16) yadāryaṃ varṇam ujjāpayanty ātmānam eva tad ujjāpayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:487: (PB 5.5.17) parimaṇḍalaṃ carma bhavaty ādityasyaiva tad rūpaṃ kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:488: (PB 5.5.18) sarvāsu sraktiṣu dundubhayo vadanti yā vanaspatiṣu vāk tām eva
GV02pncvbr1u:489: taj jayanti (PB 5.5.19) bhūmidundubhir bhavati yā pṛthivyāṃ vāk tām eva taj jayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:490: (PB 5.5.20) sarvā vāco vadanti yeṣu lokeṣu vāk tām eva taj jayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:491: (PB 5.5.21) saṃnaddhāḥ kavacinaḥ pariyantīndriyasyaiva tad rūpaṃ kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:494: (PB 5.6.2) adhvaryuḥ śirasodgāyan maitrāvaruṇo dakṣiṇena pakṣeṇa brāhmaṇācchaṃsy uttareṇa gṛhapatiḥ pucchenodgātātmanā
GV02pncvbr1u:495: (PB 5.6.3) tad yady evaṃ kuryur ekaikayā stotrīyayāstutayodgātāram
GV02pncvbr1u:497: (PB 5.6.4) tisṛbhir udgātātmana udgīyātha yā śirasaḥ stotrīyā tāṃ dadhyād aparābhis tisṛbhir udgīyātha yā dakṣiṇasya pakṣasya stotrīyā tāṃ dadhyād
GV02pncvbr1u:498_0: aparābhis tisṛbhir udgīyātha yottarasya pakṣasya stotrīyā tāṃ dadhyāt tisṛbhir vaikayā vā stutaṃ syād atha yā pucchasya stotrīyā
GV02pncvbr1u:498_1: tāṃ dadhyāt (PB 5.6.5) ātmany eva tad aṅgāni pratidadhati svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai (PB 5.6.6) atho khalv āhuḥ katham adhvaryur
GV02pncvbr1u:499_0: udgātaiva sarveṇodgāyet tad eva samṛddhaṃ samṛddhāv eva pratitiṣṭhanti (PB 5.6.7) havirdhāne śirasā stutvā saṃrabdhāḥ pratyañca
GV02pncvbr1u:499_1: eyus te dakṣiṇena dhiṣṇyān parītya paścān maitrāvaruṇasya dhiṣṇyasyopaviśya rathantareṇa
GV02pncvbr1u:500_0: pañcadaśena stuvīraṃs ta udañcaḥ saṃsarpeyur jaghanena hotur dhiṣṇyaṃ paścād brāhmaṇācchaṃsino dhiṣṇyasyopaviśya bṛhatā saptadaśena
GV02pncvbr1u:500_1: stuvīraṃs te yenaiva prasarpeyus tena punar niḥsṛpyottareṇāgnīdhraṃ parītya paścād gārhapatyasyopaviśya pucchenaikaviṃśena
GV02pncvbr1u:501: tena punaḥ prasṛpya yathāyatanam upaviśyāsandīm āruhyodgātātmanodgāyati
GV02pncvbr1u:502_0: (PB 5.6.8) taṃ patnyo 'paghāṭilābhir upagāyanty ārtvijyam eva tat patnyaḥ kurvanti saha svargaṃl lokam ayāmeti (PB 5.6.9)
GV02pncvbr1u:502_1: kule-kule 'nnaṃ kriyate tad yat pṛccheyuḥ kim idaṃ kurvantītīme yajamānā annam atsyantīti brūyuḥ (PB 5.6.10) yo vai dīkṣitānāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:502_2: pāpaṃ kīrtayati tṛtīyam evāṃśaṃ pāpmano haraty annādas tṛtīyaṃ pipīlikās tṛtīyam (PB 5.6.11) parimādbhiś caranti tvak ca
GV02pncvbr1u:502_3: vā etal loma ca mahāvratasya yat parimādas tvacaṃ caiva tal loma ca mahāvratasyāptvāvarundhate (PB 5.6.12) vāṇaṃ vitanvanty
GV02pncvbr1u:502_4: anto vai vāṇo 'nto mahāvratam antenaiva tad
GV02pncvbr1u:503: antam abhivādayanti (PB 5.6.13) śatatantrīko bhavati śatāyur vai puruṣaḥ śatavīryaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:504_0: (PB 5.6.14) tam ullikhet prāṇāya tvāpānāya tvā vyānāya tveti prāṇāpānavyānān eva tad āptvāvarundhate (PB 5.6.15) pari kumbhinyo
GV02pncvbr1u:504_1: mārjālīyaṃ yantīdaṃ madhv idaṃ madhv iti saghoṣā eva tad vayo bhūtvā saha svargaṃl lokaṃ yanti
GV02pncvbr1u:505_0: (PB 5.7.1) devā vai vācaṃ vyabhajanta tasyā yo raso 'tyaricyata tad gaurīvitam abhavad anuṣṭubham anu pariplavate vāg anuṣṭub
GV02pncvbr1u:505_1: vāco raso gaurīvitam (PB 5.7.2) yad gaurīvitenānvahaṃs stuvate vācy eva tad vācā rasaṃ dadhati
GV02pncvbr1u:506: (PB 5.7.3) rasavad vācā vadati ya evaṃv vedeti
GV02pncvbr1u:507: (PB 5.7.4) dvyudāsaṃ bhavati svargasya vā etau lokasyāvasānadeśau
GV02pncvbr1u:508: pūrveṇaiva pūrvam ahaḥ saṃsthāpayanty uttareṇottaram ahar abhyativadanti
GV02pncvbr1u:509: (PB 5.7.5) etad vai yajñasya śvastanaṃ yad gaurīvitaṃ yad gaurīvitam anusṛjeyur aśvastanā aprajasaḥ syuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:510: (PB 5.7.6) saṃ vā anyo yajñas tiṣṭhata ity āhur vāg eva na saṃtiṣṭhata iti
GV02pncvbr1u:511: yad gaurīvitam anvahaṃ bhavati vācam eva tat punaḥ prayuñjate
GV02pncvbr1u:513_0: (PB 5.7.8) devakṣetraṃ vā ete 'bhyārohanti ye svarṇidhanam upayanti sa u vai sattriṇaḥ sattram upanayed ity āhur ya enān
GV02pncvbr1u:513_1: devakṣetram abhyārohed iti na vai devakṣetra āsīna ārtim ārchati yat svarṇidhanam anvahaṃ bhavati naiva kāṃ canārtim ārchanti
GV02pncvbr1u:513_2: (PB 5.7.9) cyavante vā ete 'smāl lokād ity āhur ye svarṇidhanam upayantīti
GV02pncvbr1u:514: yad ṛcā svarūpaṃ yanty asmiṃ loke pratitiṣṭhanti yad ekāro 'tarikṣe yat sāmnāmuṣmint sarveṣu lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhanti svarṇidhanena tuṣṭuvānāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:515: (PB 5.7.10) sujñānaṃ bhavati (PB 5.7.11) devā vai svargaṃl lokaṃ yanto 'jñātād abibhayus ta etat
GV02pncvbr1u:516: saṃjñānam apaśyaṃs tena jñātram agacchan yat sujñānam anvahaṃ bhavati jñātram eva gacchanti
GV02pncvbr1u:517: (PB 5.8.1) ye vai vācam annam ādayanty annādā bhavanti ye vitarṣayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:518: rukṣā bhavanti (PB 5.8.2) gaurīvitaṃ śyāvāśvaṃ nihava etāni vai sāmāni vāco 'nnam eteṣāṃ vāg annaṃ yad etāni na cyavante vācam eva tad annam ādayanti tena sarve 'nnādā bhavanti
GV02pncvbr1u:519: (PB 5.8.3) abhikrāntāpakrāntāni bhavanty abhikrāntāpakrāntaṃ vai vāco rūpam
GV02pncvbr1u:521: (PB 5.8.5) samudraṃ vā ete prasnānti ye saṃvvatsaram upayanti yo vā
GV02pncvbr1u:522: aplavaḥ samudraṃ prasnāti na sa tata udeti yat plavo bhavati svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai (PB 5.8.6) ati viśvāni duritā taremeti yad evaiṣāṃ duṣṭutaṃ duḥśastaṃ tad
GV02pncvbr1u:524: (PB 5.8.8) parāṃ vā ete parāvataṃ gacchanti ye ṣaḍahasyāntaṃ gacchanti yadokonidhanaṃ ṣaḍahamukhe bhavati prajñātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:525: (PB 5.8.9) yadā vai puruṣaḥ svam oka āgacchati sarvaṃ tarhi prajānāti
GV02pncvbr1u:527_0: (PB 5.9.1) ekāṣṭakāyāṃ dīkṣeran (PB 5.9.2) eṣā vai saṃvvatsarasya patnī yad ekāṣṭakaitasyāṃ vā gatāṃ rātriṃ vasati sākṣād
GV02pncvbr1u:527_1: eva tat saṃvvatsaram ārabhya dīkṣante (PB 5.9.3) tasya sāniryā yad apo' nabhinandanto 'bhyavayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:528: (PB 5.9.4) vicchinnaṃ vā ete saṃvvatsarasyābhidīkṣante ya ekāṣṭakāyāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:529: dīkṣante 'ntanāmānāv ṛtū bhavete (PB 5.9.5) ārtaṃ vā ete saṃvvatsarasyābhidīkṣante ye 'ntanāmānāv ṛtū abhidīkṣante (PB 5.9.6) tasmād ekāṣṭakāyāṃ na dīkṣyam
GV02pncvbr1u:530: (PB 5.9.7) phālgune dīkṣeran (PB 5.9.8) mukhaṃ vā etat saṃvvatsarasya yat phālguno mukhata eva tat
GV02pncvbr1u:532: (PB 5.9.9) tasya sāniryā yat saṃmeghe viṣuvān saṃpadyate
GV02pncvbr1u:533: (PB 5.9.10) citrāpūrṇamāse dīkṣeran (PB 5.9.11) cakṣur vā etat saṃvvatsarasya yac citrāpūrṇamāso mukhato vai cakṣur mukhata eva tat saṃvvatsaram ārabhya dīkṣante tasya na niryāsti
GV02pncvbr1u:535: (PB 5.9.13) teṣām akāṣṭakāyāṃ krayaḥ saṃpadyate tenaikāṣṭakāṃ na saṃbaṭ kurvanti (PB 5.9.14) teṣāṃ pūrvapakṣe sutyā saṃpadyate pūrvapakṣe māsāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:536: saṃtiṣṭhamānā yanti pūrvapakṣa uttiṣṭhanti tān uttiṣṭhataḥ paśava oṣadhayo 'nūttiṣṭhanti tān kalyāṇī vāg abhivadary arātsur ime sattriṇa iti te
GV02pncvbr1u:538: (PB 5.10.1) ā vā ete saṃvvatsaraṃ pyāyayanti ya utsṛjanti
GV02pncvbr1u:539: (PB 5.10.2) yathā vai dṛtir ādhmāta evaṃ saṃvvatsaro 'nutsṛṣṭo yan notsṛjeyur amehena pramāyukāḥ syuḥ (PB 5.10.3) prāṇo vai saṃvvatsara udānā māsā yad utsṛjanti prāṇa evodānān
GV02pncvbr1u:540: dadhati yo dīkṣitaḥ pramīyate yā saṃvvatsarasyānutsṛṣṭasya śuk sā tam
GV02pncvbr1u:543: (PB 5.10.5) yady utsṛjeyur ukthāny utsṛjeyus tad evotsṛṣṭaṃ tad anutsṛṣṭam (PB 5.10.6) atho khalv āhur ekatrikaṃ kāryaṃ tad eva sākṣād utsṛṣṭam
GV02pncvbr1u:545: (PB 5.10.7) chidro vā eteṣāṃ saṃvvatsara ity āhur ye stomam utsṛjantīti
GV02pncvbr1u:546: (PB 5.10.8) paśum ālabhante stomam eva tad ālabhante stomo hi paśuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:547: (PB 5.10.9) śva utsṛṣṭāḥ sma iti vatsān apākurvanti prātaḥ paśum ālabhante
GV02pncvbr1u:548: tasya vapayā pracaranti tatas savanīyenāṣṭākapālena tata āgneyenāṣṭākapālena tato dadhnaindreṇa tataś caruṇā vaiśvadevena tat prātaḥsavanaṃ saṃtiṣṭhante
GV02pncvbr1u:550: savanīyenaikādaśakapālena tato marutvatīyenaikādaśakapālena tataś caruṇaindreṇa tan mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ saṃtiṣṭhante
GV02pncvbr1u:551: (PB 5.10.11) paśunā pracaranti tataḥ savanīyena dvādaśakapālena tato
GV02pncvbr1u:552: vaiśvadevena dvādaśakapālena tataś caruṇāgnimārutena tat tṛtīyaṃ savanaṃ saṃtiṣṭhante (PB 5.10.12) pṛṣadājyena pracarya patnīs saṃyājayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:553: (PB 6.1.1) prajāpatir akāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti sa etam agniṣṭomam apaśyat tam āharat tenemāḥ prajā asṛjata
GV02pncvbr1u:554: (PB 6.1.2) ekādaśena ca vai satā stotreṇāgniṣṭomasyāsṛjataikādaśena ca
GV02pncvbr1u:555_0: māsā saṃvvatsarasya tā dvādaśena ca stotreṇāgniṣṭomasya paryagṛhṇād dvādaśena ca māsā saṃvvatsarasya (PB 6.1.3) tasmāt prajā
GV02pncvbr1u:555_1: daśamāso garbhaṃ bhṛtvaikādaśam anu prajāyante tasmād dvādaśaṃ nābhyatiharanti dvādaśena hi parigṛhītās tad ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:555_2: pari jātāḥ prajā gṛhṇāti pra jātā janayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:556_0: (PB 6.1.4) tāsāṃ parigṛhītānām aśvatary atyakrāmat tasyā anuhāya reta ādattā tad vaḍavāyāṃ nyamāḍ yasmād vaḍavā dviretās
GV02pncvbr1u:556_1: tasmād aśvatary aprajā āttaretā hi (PB 6.1.5) tasmād v adakṣiṇīyāti hi sā yajñam aricyatātiriktasya dakṣiṇā syāt salomatvāya
GV02pncvbr1u:556_2: ṣoḍaśinaḥ stotredeyātirikto vai ṣoḍaśy atirikta evātiriktāṃ dadāti
GV02pncvbr1u:557_0: (PB 6.1.6) so 'kāmayata yajñaṃ sṛjeyeti sa mukhata eva trivṛtam asṛjata taṃ gāyatrī cchando 'nyasṛjyatāgnir devatā brāhmaṇo
GV02pncvbr1u:557_1: manuṣyo vasanta ṛtus tasmāt trivṛt stomānāṃ mukhaṃ gāyatrī cchandasām agnir devatānāṃ brāhmaṇo
GV02pncvbr1u:558: manuṣyāṇāṃ vasanta ṛtūnāṃ tasmād brāhmaṇo mukhena vīryaṃ karoti mukhato hi sṛṣṭaḥ (PB 6.1.7) karoti mukhena vīryaṃ ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:559: (PB 6.1.8) sa urasta eva bāhubhyāṃ pañcadaśam asṛjata taṃ triṣṭup chando
GV02pncvbr1u:560: 'nvasṛjyatendro devatā rājanyo manuṣyo grīṣma ṛtus tasmād rājanyasya pañcadaśa stomas triṣṭup chanda indro devatā grīṣma ṛtus tasmād u bāhuvīryo bāhubhyāṃ hi sṛṣṭaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:561: (PB 6.1.9) karoti bāhubhyāṃ vīryaṃ ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:562_0: (PB 6.1.10) sa madhyata eva prajananāt saptadaśam asṛjata taṃ jagatī cchando 'nvasṛjyata viśve devā devatā vaiśyo manuṣyo
GV02pncvbr1u:562_1: varṣā ṛtus tasmād vaiśyo 'dyamāno na kṣīyate prajananād dhi sṛṣṭas tasmād u bahupaśur vaiśvadevo hi jāgato varṣā hy asyartus
GV02pncvbr1u:562_2: tasmād brāhmaṇasya ca rājanyasya cādyo 'dharo hi sṛṣṭaḥ (PB 6.1.11) sa patta eva pratiṣṭhāyā ekaviṃśam asṛjata tam anuṣṭup
GV02pncvbr1u:563_0: 'nvasṛjyata na kā cana devatā śūdro manuṣyas tasmāc chūdra uta bahupaśur ayajñiyo videvo hi na hi taṃ kā cana devatā 'nvasṛjyata
GV02pncvbr1u:563_1: tasmāt pādāv anejyaṃ nāti vardhate patto hi sṛṣṭas tasmād ekaviṃśastomānāṃ pratiṣṭhā
GV02pncvbr1u:564: pratiṣṭhāyā hi sṛṣṭas tasmād anuṣṭubhaṃ chandāṃsi nānu vyūhanti (PB 6.1.12) pāpavasīyaso vidhṛtyai (PB 6.1.13) vidhṛtiḥ pāpavasīyaso bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:565: (PB 6.2.1) yo vai stomān upadeśanavato vedopadeśanavān bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:566: (PB 6.2.2) prāṇo vai trivṛd ardhamāsaḥ pañcadaśaḥ saṃvvatsaraḥ saptadaśa āditya ekaviṃśa ete vai stomā upadeśanavanta upadeśanavān bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:567: (PB 6.2.3) ime vai lokās triṇavas triṇavasya vai brāhmaṇeneme lokās triṣ
GV02pncvbr1u:569: (PB 6.2.4) eṣu lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:570: (PB 6.2.5) devatā vāva trayastriṃśo 'ṣṭau vasava ekādaśa rudrā
GV02pncvbr1u:571: dvādaśādityāḥ prajāpatiś ca vaṣaṭkāraś ca trayastriṃśau
GV02pncvbr1u:572: (PB 6.2.6) sa devena yajñena yajate ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:573: (PB 6.2.7) yo vā adhipatiṃ vedādhipatir bhavati trayastriṃśo vai stomānam adhipatiḥ puruṣaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:574: (PB 6.2.8) tasmān nyañco 'nye paśavo 'danty ūrdhvaḥ puruṣo 'dhipatir hi saḥ (PB 6.2.9) adhipatiḥ samānānāṃ bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:575: (PB 6.3.1) eṣa vāva yajño yad agniṣṭomaḥ (PB 6.3.2) ekasmā anyo yajñaḥ kāmāyāhriyate sarvebhyo
GV02pncvbr1u:576: (PB 6.3.3) dvādaśa stotrāṇy agniṣṭomo dvādaśamāsāḥ saṃvvatsaraḥ saṃvvatsaraṃ paśavo 'nu prajāyante tena paśavyaḥ samṛddhaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:577: (PB 6.3.4) dvādaśa stotrāṇi dvādaśa śastrāṇi tac caturviṃśatiś
GV02pncvbr1u:580: (PB 6.3.5) agnau stotram agnau śastraṃ pratitiṣṭhati tena brahmavarcasasya
GV02pncvbr1u:581: (PB 6.3.6) kiṃ jyotiṣṭomasya jyotiṣṭomatvam ity āhur virājaṃ saṃstutaḥ saṃpadyate virāḍ vai cchandasāṃ jyotiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:582: (PB 6.3.7) jyotiḥ samānānāṃ bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:583_0: (PB 6.3.8) jyeṣṭhayajño vā eṣa yad agniṣṭomaḥ (PB 6.3.9) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata tā asmai śraiṣṭhyāya nātiṣṭhanta sa etam
GV02pncvbr1u:583_1: agniṣṭomam apaśyat tam āharat tato 'smai prajāḥ śraiṣṭhyāyātiṣṭhanta (PB 6.3.10) tiṣṭhante 'smai samānāḥ śraiṣṭhyāya ya evaṃv
GV02pncvbr1u:583_2: veda (PB 6.3.11) yat tv ity āhur gāyatraṃ prātaḥsavanaṃ traiṣṭubhaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ jāgataṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ kva tarhi
GV02pncvbr1u:586: (PB 6.3.13) aṣṭākṣarā gāyatrī hiṅkāro navama ekādaśākṣarā triṣṭub
GV02pncvbr1u:587_0: dvādaśākṣarā jagatī cchandobhirevānuṣṭubham āpnoti yajamānasyānavalopāya (PB 6.3.14) yo vā anuṣṭubhaṃ sarvatrāpiṃ savanāny
GV02pncvbr1u:587_1: anvāyattāṃ veda sarvatrāsyāpir bhavaty eṣā vā anuṣṭup sarvatrāpiḥ savanāny anvāyattā tad ya evaṃ vveda sarvatrāpir bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:588_0: (PB 6.3.15) yad vai rājāno 'dhvānaṃ dhāvayanti ye 'śvānāṃv vīryavattamās tān yuñjate trivṛt pañcadaśa ekaviṃśa ete vai stomānāṃv
GV02pncvbr1u:588_1: vīryavattamās tān eva yuṅkte svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai (PB 6.3.16) catuṣṭomo bhavati pratiṣṭhā vai catuṣṭomaḥ pratiṣṭhityai
GV02pncvbr1u:589: (PB 6.4.1) prajāpatir devebhya ūrjaṃ vyabhajat tata udumbaraḥ samabhavat prājāpatyo vā udumbaraḥ prājāpatya udgātā yad udgātaudumbarīṃ prathamena
GV02pncvbr1u:590: karmaṇānvārabhate svayaiva tad devatayātmānam ārtvijyāya vṛṇīte
GV02pncvbr1u:591_0: (PB 6.4.2) tām ucchrayati dyutānas tvā māruta ucchrayatūd divaṃ stabhānāntarikṣaṃ pṛṇa dṛṃha pṛthivīm (PB 6.4.3) tām anvārabhata
GV02pncvbr1u:591_1: āyoṣ ṭvā sadane sādayāmy avataś chāyāyāṃ samudrasya hṛdaya iti
GV02pncvbr1u:592: (PB 6.4.4) yajño vā āyus tasya tat sadanaṃ kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:593: (PB 6.4.5) yajño vā avati tasya sā cchāyā kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:594: (PB 6.4.6) madhyato vā ātmano hṛdayaṃ tasmān madhye sadasa audumbarī mīyate
GV02pncvbr1u:595: (PB 6.4.7) namaḥ samudrāya namaḥ samudrasya cakṣuṣa ity āha vāg vai
GV02pncvbr1u:596: samudro manaḥ samudrasya cakṣus tābhyām eva tan namas karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:597: (PB 6.4.8) sāmā yūnarvāhāsīd ity āha sāma vai yūnarvā sāmna eva tan namaskaroty ārtvijyaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:598: (PB 6.4.9) yo vā evaṃ sāmne namaskṛtya sāmnārtvijyaṃ karoti na sāmno
GV02pncvbr1u:600: (PB 6.4.10) ya enam anuvyāharati sa ārtim ārchati
GV02pncvbr1u:601: (PB 6.4.11) ūrg asy ūrjodā ūrjaṃ me dehy ūrjaṃ me dhehy annaṃ me dehy
GV02pncvbr1u:602_0: annaṃ me dhehi prajāpater vā etad udaraṃ yat sada ūrg udumbaro yad audumbarī madhye sadaso mīyate madhyata eva tat prajābhyo
GV02pncvbr1u:602_1: 'nnam ūrjaṃ dadhāti (PB 6.4.12) tasmād yatraiṣā yātayāmā kriyate tat prajā aśanāyavo bhavanti (PB 6.4.13) sāma devānām annaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:602_2: sāmany eva tad devebhyo 'nna ūrhaṃ dadhāti sa eva tad ūrji śritaḥ prajābhya ūrjaṃ vibhajati (PB 6.4.14) udaṅṅ āsīna udgāyaty
GV02pncvbr1u:602_3: udīcīṃ tādṛśam ūrjā bhājayati pratyaṅṅ āsīnaḥ prastauti pratīcīṃ tādṛśam ūrjā bhājayati dakṣiṇāsīnaḥ pratiharati dakṣiṇāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:602_4: tādṛśam ūrjā bhājayati prāñco 'nya ṛtvija ārtvijyaṃ kurvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:603: tasmād eṣā diśāṃ vīryavattamaitāṃ hi bhūyiṣṭhāḥ prīṇanti
GV02pncvbr1u:604_0: (PB 6.4.15) brahmavādino vadanti kasmāt satyāt prāñco 'nya ṛtvija ārtvijyaṃ kurvantīti viparikramyodgātāra iti diśām abhīṣṭyai
GV02pncvbr1u:604_1: diśām abhiprītyā iti brūyāt tasmāt sarvāsu dikṣv annaṃv vidyate sarvā hy abhīṣṭāḥ prītāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:605: (PB 6.5.1) prajāpatir akāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti so 'śocat tasya śocata ādityo mūrdhno 'sṛjyata so 'sya mūrdhānam udahan sa droṇakalaśo
GV02pncvbr1u:606: 'bhavat tasmin devāḥ śukram agṛhṇata tāṃ vai sa āyuṣārtim atyajīvat
GV02pncvbr1u:609: prajāpater mūrdhāsy atyāyupātram asīdam ahaṃ māṃ prāñcaṃ prohāmi tejase
GV02pncvbr1u:611: (PB 6.5.4) yad āha vānaspatya iti satyenaivainaṃ tat prohati
GV02pncvbr1u:612: (PB 6.5.5) yad āha bārhaspatya iti bṛhaspatir vai devānām udgātā tam eva tad yunakti
GV02pncvbr1u:613: (PB 6.5.6) yad āha prājāpatya iti prājāpatyo hy eṣa devatāyā yad
GV02pncvbr1u:614: droṇakalaśo yad āha prajāpater mūrdheti prajāpater hy eṣa mūrdhna
GV02pncvbr1u:616: (PB 6.5.7) yad āhātyāyupātram ity ati hy etad anyāni pātrāṇi yad
GV02pncvbr1u:618: (PB 6.5.8) devapātrī bhavati ya evaṃv veda (PB 6.5.9) brāhmaṇaṃ pātre na mīmāṃseta yaṃ brāhmaṇam iva manyate pra
GV02pncvbr1u:619_0: devapātram āpnoti na manuṣyapātrāc chidyate (PB 6.5.10) vāg vai devebhyo 'pakrāmat sāpaḥ prāviśat tāṃ devāḥ punar ayācaṃs
GV02pncvbr1u:619_1: tā abruvan yat punar dadyāma kiṃ nas tataḥ syād iti yat kāmayadhva ity abruvaṃs tā abruvan yad evāsmāsu manuṣyā apūtaṃ praveśayāṃs
GV02pncvbr1u:620_0: (PB 6.5.11) śuddhā asmā āpaḥ pūtā bhavanti ya evaṃv veda (PB 6.5.12) sā punartātyakrāmat sā vanaspatīn prāviśat tān devāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:620_1: punar ayācaṃs tāṃ na punar adadus tān aśapan svena vaḥ kiṣkuṇā vajreṇa vṛścān
GV02pncvbr1u:621: iti tasmād vanaspatīn svena kiṣkuṇā vajreṇa vṛścanti devaśaptā hi
GV02pncvbr1u:622: (PB 6.5.13) tāṃv vanaspatayaś caturdhā vācaṃv vinyadadhur dundubhau
GV02pncvbr1u:623: vīṇāyām akṣe tūṇave tasmād eṣā vadiṣṭhaiṣā valgutamā vāg vā vanaspatīnāṃ devānāṃ hy eṣā vāg
GV02pncvbr1u:625: upary-upary akṣaṃ pavitraṃ prayacchanty ubhayata eva vācaṃ parigṛhṇanti
GV02pncvbr1u:626_0: (PB 6.5.15) yasya kāmayetāsuryam asya yajñaṃ kuryāṃv vācaṃv vṛñjīyeti droṇakalaśaṃ prohan bāhubhyām akṣan upaspṛśed asuryam
GV02pncvbr1u:626_1: asya yajñaṃ karoti vācaṃv vṛṅkte yo 'sya priyaḥ syād anupaspṛśann akṣaṃ prohet prāṇā vai droṇakalaśaḥ prāṇān evāsya kalpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:626_2: (PB 6.5.16) yan nv ity āhur vācānyān ṛtvijo vṛṇate kasmād udgātāro vṛtā ārtvijyaṃ kurvantīti
GV02pncvbr1u:627: (PB 6.5.17) yad droṇakalaśam upasīdanti tenodgātāro vṛtāḥ (PB 6.5.18) prājāpatyā vā udgātāraḥ prājāpatyo droṇakalaśo droṇakalaśa
GV02pncvbr1u:629: (PB 6.5.19) prāñca upasīdanti prāñco yajñasyāgre karavāmeti (PB 6.5.20) anabhijitā vā eṣodgātṝṇāṃ dig yat prācī yad droṇakalaśaṃ prāñcaṃ prohanti diśo 'bhijityai
GV02pncvbr1u:630: (PB 6.5.21) yan nv ity āhur antarāśvaḥ prāsevau yujyate 'ntarā śamya anaḍvān ka udgātṝṇāṃ yoga iti yad droṇakalaśam upasīdanti sa eṣāṃ yogas
GV02pncvbr1u:631: tasmād yuktair evopasadyaṃ na hy ayukto vahati
GV02pncvbr1u:632: (PB 6.6.1) grāvṇaḥ saṃsādya droṇakalaśam adhyūhanti viḍ vai grāvāṇo 'nnaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:633: somo rāṣṭraṃ droṇakalaśo yad grāvasu droṇakalaśam adhyūhanti viśy eva tad rāṣṭram adhyūhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:634: (PB 6.6.2) yaṃ dviṣyād vimukhān grāvṇaḥ kṛtvedam aham amum amuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram amuṣyā viśo 'muṣmād annādyān nirūhāmīti nirūhed viśa evainam annādyān nirūhati
GV02pncvbr1u:635: (PB 6.6.3) yo 'sya priyaḥ syāt saṃmukhān grāvṇaḥ kṛtvedam aham amuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram amuṣyāṃ viśy amuṣinn annādye 'dhyūhāmīty adhyūhed viśy evainam annādye 'dhyūhati
GV02pncvbr1u:636: (PB 6.6.4) atho tad ubhayam anādṛtyedam ahaṃ māṃ tejasi brahmavarcasse 'dhyūhāmīty adhyūhet tejasy eva brahmavarcasa ātmānam adhyūhati
GV02pncvbr1u:637: (PB 6.6.5) yaḥ kāmayeta viśā rāṣṭraṃ hanyām iti vyūhya grāvṇo 'dho
GV02pncvbr1u:638: droṇakalaśaṃ sādayitvopāṃśusavanam upariṣṭād abhinidadhyād idam aham amuyā viśā 'do rāṣṭraṃ hanmīti viśaiva tad rāṣṭraṃ hanti
GV02pncvbr1u:639: (PB 6.6.6) yo vai daivāni pavitrāṇi veda pūto yajñiyo bhavati cchandāṃsi
GV02pncvbr1u:640: vai daivāni pavitrāṇi tair droṇakalaśaṃ pāvayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:641_0: (PB 6.6.7) vasavas tvā gāyatreṇa cchandasā punantu rudrās tvā traiṣṭubhena cchandasā punantv ādityās tvā jāgatena cchandasā
GV02pncvbr1u:641_1: punantv etāni vai daivāni pavitrāṇi pūto yajñiyo bhavati ya evaṃv veda (PB 6.6.8) svarbhānur vā āsura ādityaṃ tamasāvidhyat
GV02pncvbr1u:642: te 'trim upādhāvaṃs tasyātrir bhāsena tamo 'pāhan yat prathamam apāhan sā kṛṣṇāvir abhavad yad dvitīyaṃ sā rajatā yat tṛtīyaṃ sā lohinī yayā varṇam abhyatṛṇat sā śuklāsīt
GV02pncvbr1u:643: (PB 6.6.9) tasmāc chuklaṃ pavitraṃ śukraḥ somaḥ sa śukratvāya
GV02pncvbr1u:644_0: (PB 6.6.10) yaṃ dviṣyāt tasyaiteṣāṃ varṇānām api pavitre kuryāt pāpmanaivainaṃ tamasā vidhyati kṛṣṇam iva hi tamo yo 'sya
GV02pncvbr1u:644_1: priyaḥ syād āsaktiśuklaṃ kuryāj jyotir vai hiraṇyaṃ jyotir evāsmin dadhāti (PB 6.6.11) tasmād ātreyaṃ candreṇecchanty atrir
GV02pncvbr1u:645: (PB 6.6.12) abhyatṛṇat pavitraṃv vigṛhṇanti hastakāryam eva tad yajñasya kriyata etad vā udgātṝṇāṃ hastakāryaṃ yat pavitrasya vigrahaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:646: (PB 6.6.13) na hastaveṣyān nir ṛcchati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:647_0: (PB 6.6.14) yo 'pi na vigṛhṇāti prāṇād enam antaryanti (PB 6.6.15) taṃ brūyād vepamānaḥ prameṣyasa iti vepamāna eva pramīyate
GV02pncvbr1u:647_1: (PB 6.6.16) pra śukraitu devī manīṣāsmad rathaḥ sutaṣṭo na vājīty udgātā
GV02pncvbr1u:648: dhārām anumantrayate (PB 6.6.17) āyuṣe me pavasva varcase me pavasva viduḥ pṛthivyā divo
GV02pncvbr1u:649: janitrāc chṛṇvantv āpo 'dhaḥ kṣarantīḥ somehodgāyety āha mahyaṃ tejase brahmavarcasāyeti
GV02pncvbr1u:650: (PB 6.6.18) eṣa vai somasyodgītho yat pavate somodgītham eva sāma gāyati
GV02pncvbr1u:651: (PB 6.6.19) ācchinnaṃ pāvayanti yajñaṃ caiva prāṇāṃś ca saṃtanvanti saṃtataṃ pāvayanti yajñasya saṃtatyai
GV02pncvbr1u:652: (PB 6.7.1) bṛhaspatir vai devānām udagāyat taṃ rakṣāṃsy ajighāṃsan sa ya
GV02pncvbr1u:653: eṣāṃ lokānām adhipatayas tān bhāgadheyenopādhāvat (PB 6.7.2) sūryo mā divābhyo nāṣṭrābhyaḥ pātu vāyur antarikṣābhyo 'gniḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:655: (PB 6.7.3) ete vā eṣāṃ lokānām adhipatayas tān bhāgadheyenopāsarat
GV02pncvbr1u:656: (PB 6.7.4) karoti vācā vīryaṃ na sadasyām ārtim ārcchati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:657: (PB 6.7.5) vāg vai devebhyo 'pākrāmat tāṃ devā anvamantrayanta sā 'bravīd
GV02pncvbr1u:658_0: abhāgāsmi bhāgadheyaṃ me 'stv iti kas te bhāgadheyaṃ kuryād ity udgātāra ity abravīd udgātāro vai vāce bhāgadheyaṃ kurvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:658_1: (PB 6.7.6) tasyai juhuyād bekurānāmāsi juṣṭā devebhyo namo vāce namo vācas
GV02pncvbr1u:659: pataye devi vāg yat te vāco madhumat tasmin mā dhāḥ sarasvatyai svāheti
GV02pncvbr1u:660: (PB 6.7.7) vāh vai sarasvatī tām eva tad bhāgadheyenārabhate
GV02pncvbr1u:661: (PB 6.7.8) yaṃ dviṣyāt tasyaitām āhutiṃ juhuyād vācaṃ manasā dhyāyed vācam
GV02pncvbr1u:662: evāsya vṛṅkte (PB 6.7.9) bahiṣpavamānaṃ sarpanti svargam eva tal lokaṃ sarpanti
GV02pncvbr1u:663: (PB 6.7.10) prakvāṇā iva sarpanti pratikūlam iva hītaḥ svargo lokaḥ tsaranta iva sarpanti mṛgadharmo vai yajño yajñasya śāntyā apratrāsāya
GV02pncvbr1u:664: (PB 6.7.11) vācaṃ yacchanti yajñam eva tad yacchanti yad vyavavadeyur yajñaṃ nirbrūyus tasmān na vyavavadyam (PB 6.7.12) pañcartvijaḥ saṃrabdhāḥ sarpanti pā-nkto yajño yāvān yajñas
GV02pncvbr1u:666: (PB 6.7.13) yadi prastotāvacchidyate yajñasya śiraś chidyate brahmaṇe
GV02pncvbr1u:667: varaṃ dattvā sa eva punar vartavyaś chinnam eva tat pratidadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:668: (PB 6.7.14) yady udgātāvacchidyate yajñena yajamāno vyṛdhyate 'dakṣiṇaḥ sa yajñakratuḥ saṃsthāpyo 'thānya āhṛtyas tasmin deyaṃ yāvad dāsyan syāt
GV02pncvbr1u:670: paśavo vai pratihartā sarvavedasaṃ deyaṃ yadi sarvavedasaṃ na dadāti sarvajyāniṃ jīyate (PB 6.7.16) adhvaryuḥ prastaraṃ harati
GV02pncvbr1u:671: (PB 6.7.17) yajamāno vai prastaro yajamānam eva tat svargaṃl lokaṃ harati
GV02pncvbr1u:672: (PB 6.7.18) yajño vai devebhyo 'śvo bhūtvāpākrāmat taṃ devāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:673: prastareṇāsamayaṃs tasmād aśvaḥ prastareṇa saṃmṛjyamāna upāvarabhate yad adhvaryuḥ prastaraṃ harati yajñasya śāntyā apratrāsāya
GV02pncvbr1u:674: (PB 6.7.19) prajāpatiḥ paśun asṛjata te 'smāt sṛṣṭā aśanāyanto 'pākrāmaṃs
GV02pncvbr1u:675: tebhyaḥ prastaram annaṃ prāyacchat enam upāvartanta tasmād adhvaryuṇā prastara īṣad iva vidhūyo vidhūtim iva hi tṛṇaṃ paśava upāvartante
GV02pncvbr1u:676: (PB 6.7.20) upainaṃ paśava āvartante ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:678: (PB 6.7.22) yajamānaṃ tu svargāl lokā avagṛhṇāti (PB 6.7.23) aṣṭhīvatopaspṛśatodgeyaṃ tenāsya havir askannaṃ bhavati na

GV02pncvbr1u:783_1: gāyatrīṃ prāyuñjata tayā na vyāpnuvaṃs triṣṭubhaṃ prāyuñjata tayā na vyāpnuvañ jagatīṃ prāyuñjata tayā na vyāpnuvann anuṣṭubhaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:784_0: tayālpakādi na vyāpnuvaṃs ta āsāṃ diśāṃ rasān prabṛhya catvāry akṣarāṇy upādadhuḥ sā bṛhaty abhavat tayemāṃl lokān vyāpnuvan
GV02pncvbr1u:784_1: (PB 7.4.3) bṛhatī maryā yayemāṃl lokān vyāpāmeti tad bṛhatyā bṛhattvam (PB 7.4.4) paśūn vā asyāntān upādadhuḥ paśavo vai
GV02pncvbr1u:785: stotre dakṣiṇā dīyante sva eva tad āyatane dīyante (PB 7.4.5) yan nv ity āhur anyāni cchandāṃsi varṣīyāṃsi kasmād bṛhaty
GV02pncvbr1u:786_0: ucyata eṣā hīmāṃl lokān vyāpnon nānyac chandaḥ kiṃ cana yāni sapta caturuttarāṇi cchandāṃsi tāni bṛhatīm abhisaṃpadyante
GV02pncvbr1u:786_1: tasmād bṛhaty ucyate (PB 7.4.6) yan nv ity āhur gāyatraṃ prātaḥsavanaṃ traiṣṭubhaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ jāgataṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:787_0: (PB 7.4.7) bahiṣpavamānena vai devā ādityaṃ svargaṃl lokam aharan sa nādhriyata taṃ bṛhatyā madhyandine 'stabhnuvaṃs tasmād
GV02pncvbr1u:787_1: bṛhatyā madhyandinaṃ stuvanty ādityaṃ hy eṣā madhyandine dādhāra
GV02pncvbr1u:788: (PB 7.4.8) yair u kaiś ca cchandobhir madhyandine stuvanti tāni triṣṭubham
GV02pncvbr1u:789: abhi saṃpadyante tasmāt triṣṭubho nayanti mādhyandināt savanāt
GV02pncvbr1u:790_0: (PB 7.5.1) prajāpatir akāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti sa śocann amahīyamāno 'tiṣṭhat sa etad āmahīyavam apaśyat tenemāḥ prajā
GV02pncvbr1u:790_1: asṛjata tāḥ sṛṣṭā amahīyanta yad amahīyanta tasmād āmahīyavam
GV02pncvbr1u:791_0: (PB 7.5.2) tā asmāt sṛṣṭā apākrāmaṃs tāsāṃ divi sad bhūmy ādada iti prāṇān ādatta tā enaṃ prāṇeṣv ātteṣu punar upāvartanta
GV02pncvbr1u:791_1: tābhya ugraṃ śarma mahi śrava iti punaḥ prāṇān prāyacchat tā asmād ud evāyodhaṃs tāsāṃ stauṣa iti
GV02pncvbr1u:792: manyūn avāśṛṇāt tato vai tasmai tāḥ śraiṣṭhyāyātiṣṭhanta
GV02pncvbr1u:793: (PB 7.5.3) tiṣṭhante 'smai samānāḥ śraiṣṭhyāya ya evaṃv veda (PB 7.5.4) prajānāṃ ca vā eṣā sṛṣṭiḥ pāpavasīyaś ca vidhṛtir yad
GV02pncvbr1u:795: (PB 7.5.5) vidhṛtiḥ pāpavasīyaso bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:796: (PB 7.5.6) devā vai yaśaskāmāḥ sattram āsatāgnir indro vāyur makhas te
GV02pncvbr1u:797: 'bruvsn yan no yaśa ṛcchāt tan naḥ sahāsad iti teṣā makhaṃ yaśa ārcchat
GV02pncvbr1u:798_0: tad ādāyāpākrāmat tad asya prāsahāditsanta taṃ paryayatanta svadhanuḥ pratiṣṭhābhyātiṣṭhat tasya dhanurārtnir ūrdhvā patitvā
GV02pncvbr1u:798_1: śiro 'cchinat sa pravargyo 'bhavad yajño vai makho yat pravargyaṃ pravṛñjanti yajñasyaiva tac chiraḥ pratidadhati
GV02pncvbr1u:799: (PB 7.5.7) tad devā yaśo vyabhajanta tasyāgnī rauravaṃ prābṛhata
GV02pncvbr1u:800_0: (PB 7.5.8) tad vai sa paśuvīryaṃ prābṛhata paśavo vai rauravam (PB 7.5.9) paśumān bhavati ya evaṃv veda (PB 7.5.10) agnir
GV02pncvbr1u:800_1: vai rūras tasyaitad rauravam (PB 7.5.11) asurā vai devān paryayatanta tata etāv agnī rūrau viṣvañcau
GV02pncvbr1u:801: stobhāv apaśyat tābhyām enān pratyauṣat te pratyuṣyamāṇā aravanta yad aravanta tasmād rauravam
GV02pncvbr1u:802: (PB 7.5.12) athendro yaudhājayaṃ prābṛhata tad vai sa vajraṃ prābṛhata vajro vai yaudhājayam
GV02pncvbr1u:803: (PB 7.5.13) vajraṃ bhrātṛvyāya praharati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:804: (PB 7.5.14) indro vai yudhājit tasyaitad yaudhājayam (PB 7.5.15) yudhā maryā ajaiṣmeti tasmād yaudhājayam (PB 7.5.16) atha vāyur auśanaṃ prābṛhata
GV02pncvbr1u:805: (PB 7.5.17) tad vai sa prāṇvīryaṃ prābṛhata prāṇā vā auśanam (PB 7.5.18) sarvam āyur eti ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:806_0: (PB 7.5.19) vāyur vā uśanaṃs tasyaitad auśanam (PB 7.5.20) uśanā vai kāvyo 'surāṇāṃ purohita āsīt taṃ devāḥ kāmadughābhir
GV02pncvbr1u:806_1: apāmantrayanta tasmā etāny auśanāni prāyacchan kāmadughā vā auśanāni (PB 7.5.21) kāmadughā enam upatiṣṭhante ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:807: (PB 7.6.1) prajāpatir akāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti sa tūṣṇīṃ manasādhyāyat tasya yan manasy āsīt tad bṛhat samabhavat
GV02pncvbr1u:808: (PB 7.6.2) sa ādadhīta garbho vai me 'yam antarhitas taṃv vācā prajanayā iti (PB 7.6.3) sa vācaṃ vyasṛjata sā vāg rathantaram anvapadyata
GV02pncvbr1u:809: (PB 7.6.4) ratham aryāḥ kṣeplātārīd iti tad rathantarasya rathantaratvam
GV02pncvbr1u:810: (PB 7.6.5) tato bṛhad anu prājāyata bṛhan maryā idaṃ sa jyog antarabhūd iti tad bṛhato bṛhattvam (PB 7.6.6) yathā vai putro jyeṣṭha evaṃ bṛhat prajāpateḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:812: (PB 7.6.8) pra jyaiṣṭhyam āpnoti ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:813: (PB 7.6.9) yan nv ity āhur bṛhat pūrvaṃ prajāpatau samabhavat kasmād
GV02pncvbr1u:814: rathantaraṃ pūrvaṃ yogam ānaśa iti (PB 7.6.10) bṛhad eva pūrvaṃ samabhavad rathantaraṃ tu pūrvaṃ sṛṣṭyāsṛjata tasmāt pūrvaṃ yogam ānaśe
GV02pncvbr1u:815: (PB 7.6.11) tayoḥ samānaṃ nidhanam āsīt tasmin nātiṣṭhetāṃ ta ājim aitāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:816_0: tayor has iti bṛhat prāṇam udajayad as iti rathantaram apānam abhisamaveṣṭata (PB 7.6.12) prāṇāpānau vai bṛhadrathantare
GV02pncvbr1u:816_1: jyog āmayāvina ubhe kuryād apakrāntau vā etasya prāṇāpānau yasya jyog āmayati prāṇāpānāv evāsmin dadhāti (PB 7.6.13) yan
GV02pncvbr1u:816_2: nv ity āhur ubhe bṛhadrathantare bahirṇidhane kasmād bṛhad
GV02pncvbr1u:817: bahirṇidhanāni bhajate 'ntarṇidhanāni rathantaram iti (PB 7.6.14) prāṇo bṛhat tasmād bahirṇidhanāni bhajate bahir hi prāṇo 'pāno
GV02pncvbr1u:818_0: rathantaraṃ tasmād antarṇidhanāni bhajate 'ntar hy apānaḥ (PB 7.6.15) mahāvṛkṣau vai bṛhadrathantare nidhanena samarpye (PB
GV02pncvbr1u:818_1: 7.6.16) yad vai mahāvṛkṣau samṛcchete bahu tatra vibhagnaṃ prabhagnaṃ śete
GV02pncvbr1u:819: (PB 7.6.17) airaṃ vai bṛhad aiḍaṃ rathantaraṃ mano vai bṛhad vāg
GV02pncvbr1u:820: rathantaraṃ sām a vai bṛhad ṛg rathantaraṃ prāṇo vai bṛhad apāno rathantaram asau vai loko bṛhad ayaṃ rathantaram etāni manasānvīkṣyodgāyet kḷptābhyām evābhyām udgāyati
GV02pncvbr1u:821: (PB 7.7.1) paśavo vai bṛhadrathantare aṣṭākṣareṇa prathamāyā (?) ṛcaḥ prastauty aṣṭāśaphāṃs tat paśūn avarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:822: (PB 7.7.2) dvyakṣareṇottarayor ṛcoḥ prastauti dvipād yajamāno yajamānam
GV02pncvbr1u:824: (PB 7.7.3) pañcākṣareṇa rathantarasya pratiharati pāṅktāṃs tat paśūn
GV02pncvbr1u:826: (PB 7.7.4) caturakṣareṇa bṛhataḥ pratiharati catuṣpadas tat paśūn
GV02pncvbr1u:828_0: (PB 7.7.5) na vai bṛhan na rathantaram ekaṃ chando 'yacchat tataḥ kakubhāv uttare upādadhus tasmād bṛhatī prathamā kakubhāv
GV02pncvbr1u:828_1: uttare tasmād bṛhadrathantare ekarcena kurvanti na hi te ekaṃ chando 'yacchat
GV02pncvbr1u:829_0: (PB 7.7.6) nava bṛhato rohān rohati nava prāṇāḥ prāṇān evāvarundhe (PB 7.7.7) trīn prathamāyāṃ rohati bhūtaṃ bhavad bhaviṣyat
GV02pncvbr1u:829_1: tān evāvarundhe trīn madhyamāyāṃ rohaty ātmānaṃ prajāṃ paś+ūṃs tān evāvarundhe trīn
GV02pncvbr1u:830: uttamāyāṃ rohati traya ime lokā eṣv eva lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:831: (PB 7.7.8) sarvān kāmān avarundhe ya evaṃv vidvān bṛhato rohān rohati
GV02pncvbr1u:832: (PB 7.7.9) vajreṇa vā etat prastotodgātāram abhipravartayati yad
GV02pncvbr1u:833: rathantaraṃ prastauti samudram antardhāyodgāyed vāg ity ādeyaṃv vāg vai samudraḥ samudram evāntardadhāty ahiṃsāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:834: (PB 7.7.10) balavad geyaṃ vajram evaṃ pravṛttaṃ pratyudgṛhṇāti
GV02pncvbr1u:835: (PB 7.7.11) balvalā kurvatā geyam abhilobhayateva vajram evābhilobhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:836: (PB 7.7.12) kṣipraṃ geyaṃ svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai (PB 7.7.13) devaratho vai rathantaram akṣareṇākṣareṇa pratiṣṭhāpayatodgeyam areṇāreṇa hi rathaḥ pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:837: (PB 7.7.14) yo vai devaratham ananvālabhyātiṣṭhaty avāsmāt padyata iyaṃ vai devaratha imām ālabhyodgāyen nāsmād avapadyate
GV02pncvbr1u:838: (PB 7.7.15) īśvaraṃ vai rathantaram udgātuś cakṣuḥ pramathitoḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:839: prastuyamāne saṃmīlet svardṛśaṃ prativīkṣeta nainaṃ cakṣur jahāti
GV02pncvbr1u:840: (PB 7.7.16) prajananaṃ vai rathantaraṃ yat tasthuṣa ity āhāsthāyukodgātur vāg bhavaty api prajananaṃ hanty asthuṣa iti vaktavyaṃ susthuṣa iti vā
GV02pncvbr1u:841: sthāyukodgātur vāg bhavati na prajananam api hanti
GV02pncvbr1u:842: (PB 7.7.17) pṛṣṭhāni vā asṛjyanta tair devāḥ svargaṃl lokam āyaṃs teṣāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:844: (PB 7.7.18) tasya vaśiṣṭho mahimno vinidhāya tena stutvā svargaṃl lokam ait tān saṃbhṛtyodgāyet
GV02pncvbr1u:845: (PB 7.7.19) yas te goṣu mahimā yas te apsu rathe vā te stanayitnau ya u te yas te agnau mahimā tena saṃbhava rathantara draviṇavan na edhi
GV02pncvbr1u:846: (PB 7.8.1) apo vā ṛtvyam ārcchat tāsāṃv vāyuḥ pṛṣṭhe vyavartata tato vasu vāmaṃ samabhavat tasmin mitrāvaruṇau paryapaśyatāṃ tāv abrūtāṃv vāmaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:847: maryā idaṃ deveṣv ājānīti tasmād vāmadevyam
GV02pncvbr1u:848: (PB 7.8.2) tat parigṛhṇantāv abrūtām idam avidāvedaṃ nau mābhyartiḍhvam iti tat prajāpatir abravīn mad vā etad dhy ajani mama vā etad iti tad
GV02pncvbr1u:849: agnir abravīn māṃ (?) vā etad annam ajani mama vā etad iti tad indro
GV02pncvbr1u:850_0: 'bravīc chreṣṭhasthā vā etad ahaṃ vaḥ śreṣṭho 'smi mama vā etad iti tad viśve devā abruvann asmaddevatyaṃ vā etad yad adbhyo
GV02pncvbr1u:850_1: 'dhi samabhūd asmākaṃ vā etad iti tat prajāpatir abravīt sarveṣāṃ na idam astu sarva idam
GV02pncvbr1u:851: upajīvāmeti tat pṛṣṭheṣu nyadadhuḥ sarvadevatyaṃ vai vāmadevyam
GV02pncvbr1u:852: (PB 7.8.3) yat kavatīṣu tena prājāpatyaṃ ko hi prajāpatir yad aniruktāsu
GV02pncvbr1u:853: tena prājāpatyam anirukto hi prajāpatiḥ (PB 7.8.4) yad gāyatrīṣu tenāgneyaṃ gāyatracchandā hy agniḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:854_0: (PB 7.8.5) yat pṛṣṭheṣu nyadadadhus tenaindraṃ sarvāṇi hi pṛṣṭhānīndrasya niṣkevalyāni (PB 7.8.6) yan maitrāvaruṇo 'nuśaṃsati
GV02pncvbr1u:854_1: tena maitrāvaruṇam (PB 7.8.7) yad bahudevatyam uttamaṃ padaṃ tena vaiśvadevaṃ sarveṣv eva rūpeṣu pratitiṣṭhati (PB 7.8.8)
GV02pncvbr1u:854_2: prajāpatir vā etāṃ gāyatrīṃ yonim apaśyat sa ādīdhītāsmād yoneḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:856: (PB 7.8.9) sa rathantaram asṛjata tad rathasya ghoṣo 'nvasṛjyata
GV02pncvbr1u:857: (PB 7.8.10) sa bṛhad asṛjata tat stanayitnor ghoṣo 'nvasṛjyata sa vairūpam asṛjata tad vā tasya ghoṣo 'nvasṛjyata
GV02pncvbr1u:858: (PB 7.8.11) sa vairūpam asṛjata tad agner ghoṣo 'nvasṛjyata
GV02pncvbr1u:859: (PB 7.8.12) sa śakvarīr asṛjata tad apāṃ ghoṣo 'nvasṛjyata
GV02pncvbr1u:860: (PB 7.8.13) sa revatīr asṛjata tad gavāṃ ghoṣo 'nvasṛjyata
GV02pncvbr1u:861: (PB 7.8.14) etair vā etāni saha ghoṣair asṛjyanta
GV02pncvbr1u:862: (PB 7.8.15) sarve 'smin ghoṣāḥ sarvāḥ puṇyā vāco vadanti ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:863_0: (PB 7.9.1) pitā vai vāmadevyaṃ putrāḥ pṛṣṭhāni (PB 7.9.2) etasmād vā etāni yoner asṛjyanta (PB 7.9.3) tasmāt pṛṣṭhānāṃ stotraṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:863_1: vāmadevyenānuṣṭuvanti śāntyai (PB 7.9.4) yad dhi putro 'śāntaṃ carati pitā tac chamayati
GV02pncvbr1u:864: (PB 7.9.5) ayaṃ vai loko madhyamo vāmadevyam etasmād vā imau lokau
GV02pncvbr1u:865: viṣvañcāv asṛjyetāṃ bṛhac ca ratantaraṃ ca
GV02pncvbr1u:866_0: (PB 7.9.6) yad rathantareṇa stuvanti ye rathantarāḥ paśavo 'ntarīkṣaṃ ta upaśrayanti yad bṛhatā stuvanti ye bārhatāḥ paśavo
GV02pncvbr1u:866_1: 'ntarīkṣaṃ ta upaśrayanti te vāmadevyasya stotreṇāvaruddhāḥ (PB 7.9.7) dhruva āsīno vāmadevyenodgāyet paśūnām upavṛtyai (PB
GV02pncvbr1u:866_2: 7.9.8) upainaṃ paśava āvartante ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:867: (PB 7.9.9) antarikṣaṃ vai vāmadevyam adhūnvatevodgeyam adhūtam ivāntarikṣaṃ paśavo vai vāmadevyam ahiṃsatevodgeyaṃ paśūnām ahiṃsāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:868: (PB 7.9.10) katham iva vāmadevyaṃ geyam ity āhuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:869: (PB 7.9.11) yathāṅkulī putrān saṃdaśyāsaṃbhindantī harati yathā vāto 'psu
GV02pncvbr1u:871: (PB 7.9.13) yo vai svadhūr vāmadevyaṃ gāyati svadhūr bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:872: (PB 7.9.14) yāty asyānyo niyānena nānyasya niyānena yāti
GV02pncvbr1u:873: (PB 7.9.15) na bṛhato na rathantarasyānurūpaṃ geyaṃ svenaivāyatanena geyam āyatanavān bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:874: (PB 7.9.16) devā vai paśūn vyabhajanta te rudram antarāyaṃs tān vāmadevyasya stotra upekṣate
GV02pncvbr1u:875: (PB 7.9.17) aniruktaṃ geyam (PB 7.9.18) yan nirāha rudrāya paśūn apidadhāti rudras tāṃ samāṃ paśūn
GV02pncvbr1u:876: dhātuko bhavati (PB 7.9.19) revatīṣu vāmadevyena paśukāmaḥ stuvīta
GV02pncvbr1u:877: (PB 7.9.20) āpo vai revatyaḥ paśavo vāmadevyam adbhya evāsmai paśūn prajanayati
GV02pncvbr1u:878: (PB 7.9.21) anavartiḥ paśuto bhavati prajā svasya mīliteva bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:880_0: (PB 7.10.1) imau vai lokau sahāstāṃ tau viyantāv abrūtāṃv vivāhaṃv vivahāvahai saha nāv astv iti (PB 7.10.2) tayor ayam amuṣmai
GV02pncvbr1u:880_1: śyaitaṃ prāyacchan naudhasam asāv asmai (PB 7.10.3) tata enayor nidhane viparyakrāmatāṃ devavivāho vai
GV02pncvbr1u:882: (PB 7.10.4) pravasīyāṃsaṃ vivāham āpnoti ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:883: (PB 7.10.5) ito vā ime lokā ūrdhvāḥ kalpamānā yanty amuto 'rvāñcaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:884_0: kalpamānā āyanti (PB 7.10.6) yad rathantareṇa stuvantīmaṃl lokaṃ tena yunakty antarikṣaṃv vāmadevyena naudhasenāmuṃ yad bṛhatā
GV02pncvbr1u:884_1: stuvanty amuṃl lokaṃ tena yanakty antarikṣaṃv vāmadevyena śyaitenemam
GV02pncvbr1u:885: (PB 7.10.7) kḷptān imāl lokān upāste ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:886: (PB 7.10.8) bṛhadrathantare vai śaitanaudhase yad rathantarāya naudhasaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:887: prati prayuñjanti bṛhad evāsmai tat prati prayuñjanti bṛhad dhy etat
GV02pncvbr1u:888_0: paro'kṣaṃ yan naudhasaṃ yad bṛhate śyaitaṃ prati prayuñjanti rathantaram evāsmai tat prati prayuñjanti rathantaraṃ hy etat
GV02pncvbr1u:888_1: paro'kṣaṃ yac chyaitam (PB 7.10.9) ubhabhyāṃ bṛhadrathantarābhyāṃ stute ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:889: (PB 7.10.10) devā vai brahma vyabhajanta tāṃ nodhāḥ kākṣīvata āgacchat te
GV02pncvbr1u:890: 'bruvann ṛṣir na āgaṃs tasmai brahma dadāmeti tasmā etat sāma prāyacchaṃs tasmān naudhasaṃ brahma vai naudhasam
GV02pncvbr1u:891_0: (PB 7.10.11) brahmavarcasakāma etena stuvīta brahmavarcasī bhavati (PB 7.10.12) athaitac chyaitam (PB 7.10.13) prajāpatiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:891_1: paśūn asṛjata te 'smāt sṛṣṭā apākrāmaṃs tān etena sāmnābhivyāharat te 'smā atiṣṭhanta te śetyā abhavan yac chetyā abhavaṃs
GV02pncvbr1u:892: (PB 7.10.14) paśukāma etena stuvīta paśumān bhavati (PB 7.10.15) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata tāḥ sṛṣṭā aśocaṃs tāḥ śyaitena huṃmā
GV02pncvbr1u:893: ity abhyajighrat tato vai tāḥ samaidhanta samedhante tāṃ samāṃ prajā yatraivaṃ vidvāñ chyaitenodgāyati
GV02pncvbr1u:894: (PB 7.10.16) eṣa vai yajamānasya prajāpatir yad udgātā yac chyaitena hiṅ
GV02pncvbr1u:895: karoti prajāpatir eva bhūtvā prajā abhijihgrati
GV02pncvbr1u:896: (PB 7.10.17) vasunidhanaṃ bhavati paśavo vai vasu paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:897: (PB 8.1.1) āṣkāraṇidhanaṃ kāṇvaṃv vaṣaṭkāraṇidhanam abhicaraṇīyasya brahmasāma kuryād abhinidhanaṃ mādhyandine pavamāne
GV02pncvbr1u:898: (PB 8.1.2) deveṣur vā eṣā yad vaṣatkāro 'bhīti vā indro vṛtrāya vajraṃ prāharad abhītyevāsmai vajraṃ prahṛtya deveṣv ā vaṣaṭkāreṇa vidhyati
GV02pncvbr1u:899: (PB 8.1.3) traikakubhaṃ paśukāmāya brahmasāma kuryāt tvam aṅga praśaṃsiṣa ity etāsu
GV02pncvbr1u:900_0: (PB 8.1.4) indro yatīn sālāvṛkebhyaḥ prāyacchat teṣāṃ traya udaśiṣyanta rāyovājo bṛhadgiriḥ pṛthuraśmis te 'bruvan ko naḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:900_1: putrān bhariṣyantīty aham intīndro 'bravīt tāṃs trikakub adhinidhāyācarat sa etat sāmāpaśyad
GV02pncvbr1u:901: yat trikakub apaśyat tasmāt traikakubham (PB 8.1.5) sa ātmānam eva punar upādhāvat tvam aṅga praśaṃsiṣo devaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:902: śaviṣṭha martyaṃ na tvad anyo maghavann asti ca marḍitendra bravīmi te vaca iti sa etena ca pragāthenaitena sāmnā sahasraṃ paśūn asṛjata tān ebhyaḥ prāyacchat te pratyatiṣṭhan
GV02pncvbr1u:903: (PB 8.1.6) yaḥ paśukāmaḥ syād yah pratiṣṭhākāma etasmin pragātha etena sāmnā stuvīta pra sahasraṃ paśūn āpnoti pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:904: (PB 8.1.7) trivīryaṃ vā etat sāma trīndriyam aindrya ṛca aindraṃ sāmaindreti nidhanam indriya eva vīrye pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:906: (PB 8.1.9) ime vai lokāḥ sahāsaṃs te 'śocantaṃs teṣām indra etena sāmnā śucam apāhan yat trayāṇāṃ śocatām apāhaṃs tasmāt traiśokam
GV02pncvbr1u:907: (PB 8.1.10) yāsmād apāhan sā puṃścalīṃ prāviśad yām antarikṣāt sā klībaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:909: (PB 8.1.11) tasmāt teṣāṃ nāśaitavyā ya eṣām āśāmeti tasmā eva śuco
GV02pncvbr1u:911: (PB 8.1.12) śucā vā eṣa viddho yasya jyog āmayati yat traiśokaṃ brahmasāma bhavati śucam evāsmād apahanti (PB 8.1.13) diveti nidhanam upayanti vyuṣṭir vai divā vy evāsmai vāsayati
GV02pncvbr1u:912_0: (PB 8.2.1) āṣkāraṇidhanaṃ kāṇvaṃ pratiṣṭhākāmāya brahmasāma kuryāt (PB 8.2.2) kaṇvo vā etat sāmarte nidhanam apaśyat sa na
GV02pncvbr1u:912_1: pratyatiṣṭhat sa vṛṣadaṃśasyāṣiti kṣuvata upāśṛṇot sa tad eva nidhanam apaśyat tato vai sa
GV02pncvbr1u:913: pratyatiṣṭhad yad etat sāma bhavati pratiṣṭhityai
GV02pncvbr1u:914: (PB 8.2.3) vasiṣṭhasya janitraṃ prajākāmāya brahmasāma kuryāt (PB 8.2.4) vasiṣṭho vā etat putrahataḥ sāmāpaśyat sa prajayā paśubhiḥ prājāyata yad etat sāma bhavati prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:916: (PB 8.2.6) atharvāṇo vā etal lokākāmāḥ sāmāpaśyaṃs tenāmartyaṃl lokam apaśyan yad etat sāma bhavati svargasya lokasya prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:918: (PB 8.2.8) abhīvartena vai devā asurān abhyavartanta yad abhīvarto brahmasāma bhavati bhrātṛvyasyābhivṛtyai
GV02pncvbr1u:920: (PB 8.2.10) prajāpatir uṣasam adhyait svāṃ duhitaraṃ tasya retaḥ parāpatat tad asyāṃ nyaṣicyata tad aśrīṇād idaṃ me mā duṣad iti tat sad akarot paśūn eva
GV02pncvbr1u:921: (PB 8.2.11) yac chrāyantīyaṃ brahmasāma bhavati śrīṇāti caivenaṃ sac ca karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:922: (PB 8.3.1) devāś ca vā asurāś caiṣu lokeṣv aspardhanta te devāḥ prajāpatim upādhāvaṃs tebhya etat sāma prāyacchad etenainān kālayiṣyaddham iti
GV02pncvbr1u:923: tenainān ebhyo lokebhyo 'kālayanta yad akālayanta tasmāt kāleyam
GV02pncvbr1u:924: (PB 8.3.2) ebhyo vai lokebhyo bhrātṛvyaṃ kālayate ya evaṃv veda (PB 8.3.3) stomo vai deveṣu taro nāmāsīd yajño 'sureṣu vidadvasus te devās
GV02pncvbr1u:925: tarobhir vo vidadvasum iti stomena yajñam asurāṇām āvṛñjata (PB 8.3.4) stomena yajñaṃ bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkte ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:926_0: (PB 8.3.5) sāhdyā vai nāma devā āsaṃs te 'vacchidya tṛtīyasavanaṃ mādhyandinena savanena saha svargaṃl lokam āyaṃs tad devāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:926_1: lokeyena samatanvan yat kāleyaṃ bhavati tṛtīyasavanasya saṃtatyai
GV02pncvbr1u:927_0: (PB 8.3.6) vidadvasu vai tṛtīyasavanaṃ yat tarobhir vo vidadvasum iti prastauti tṛtīyasavanam eva tad abhyativadati (PB 8.3.7)
GV02pncvbr1u:927_1: sarvāṇi vai rūpāṇi kāleyaṃ yat padaprastāvaṃ tena rāthantaraṃ yad bṛhato rohān rohati tena bārhataṃ yat stobhavān pratihāras
GV02pncvbr1u:927_2: tena bārhataṃ yad dravadiḍaṃ tena rāthantaraṃ sarveṣv eva rūpeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:928_0: (PB 8.4.1) sādhyā vai nāma devā āsaṃs te sarveṇa yajñena saha svargaṃl lokam āyaṃs te devāśīchandāṃsy abruvan somam āharateti
GV02pncvbr1u:928_1: te jagatīṃ prāhiṇvan sā trīṇy akṣarāṇi hitvaikākṣarā bhūtvāgacchat triṣṭubhaṃ prāhiṇvan saikam akṣaraṃ hitvā tryakṣarā bhūtvāgacchad
GV02pncvbr1u:928_2: gāyatrīṃ prāhiṇvaṃś caturakṣarāṇi vai tarhi cchandāṃsy āsan sā tāni cākṣarāṇi haranty āgacchad aṣṭākṣarā bhūtvā trīṇi ca
GV02pncvbr1u:928_3: savanāni hastābhyāṃ dve savane dantair daṃṣṭvā tṛtīyasavanaṃ tasmād dve aṃśumatī savane dhītaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ dantair hi
GV02pncvbr1u:929_0: tad daṃṣṭvā dhayanty aharat tasya ye hriyamāṇasyāṃśavaḥ parāpataṃs te pūtīkā abhavan yāni puṣpāṇy avāśīyanta tāny arjjunāni
GV02pncvbr1u:929_1: yat prāprothat te praprothās tasmāt tṛtīyasavana āśiram avanayanti yam eva taṃ gāvaḥ somam adanti tasya taṃ rasam avanayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:930: (PB 8.4.2) te triṣṭub jagatyai gāyatrīm abrūtām upa tvāyāveti sābravīt kiṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:931: me tataḥ syād iti yat kāmayasa ity abrūtāṃ sābvravīn mama sarvaṃ prātaḥsavanam aham uttare savane praṇayānīti tasmād gāyatraṃ prātaḥsavanaṃ gāyatry uttare savane praṇayati
GV02pncvbr1u:932: (PB 8.4.3) tān triṣṭup tribhir akṣarair upait saikādaśākṣarā bhūtvā prājāyata tāṃ jagaty ekenākṣareṇopait sā dvādaśākṣarā bhūtvā prājāyata
GV02pncvbr1u:933: (PB 8.4.4) tasmād āhur gāyatrī vāva sarvāṇi cchandāṃsi gāyatrī hy etān
GV02pncvbr1u:935: (PB 8.4.5) indras tṛtīyasavanād bībhatsamāna udakrāmat tad devāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:936_0: svādiṣṭhayeti asvadayan madiṣṭhayeti madvad akurvan pavasva soma dhārayety apāvayann indrāya pātave suta iti tato vai tad
GV02pncvbr1u:936_1: indra upāvartata yat svādiṣṭhayā madiṣṭhayeti prastauti tṛtīyasavanasya sendratvāya (PB 8.4.6) svādiṣṭhā vai deveṣu paśava
GV02pncvbr1u:937: svādiṣṭhayā madiṣṭhayeti paśūn asurāṇām avṛñjata (PB 8.4.7) paśūn bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkte ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:938_0: (PB 8.4.8) tāsu saṃhitam (PB 8.4.9) sādhyā vai nāmadevā āsaṃs te 'vacchidya tṛtīyasavanaṃ mādhyandinena savanena saha svargaṃl
GV02pncvbr1u:938_1: lokam āyaṃs tad devāḥ saṃhitena samadadhur yat samadadhus tasmāt saṃhitam
GV02pncvbr1u:939: (PB 8.4.10) kāleyaṃ purastād bhavati saṃhitam upariṣṭād etābhyāṃ hi tṛtīyasavanaṃ saṃtāyate
GV02pncvbr1u:940: (PB 8.4.11) sarvāṇi vai rūpāṇi saṃhitaṃ yat padaprastāvaṃ tena rāthantaraṃ yad bṛhato rohān rohati tena bārhataṃ yad padanidhanaṃ tena rāthantaraṃ sarveṣv eva rūpeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:942_0: (PB 8.5.2) uṣṇikkakubbhyāṃ vā indro vṛtrāya vajraṃ prāharat kakubhi parākramatoṣṇihā prāharat tasmāt kakubho madhyamaṃ padaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:942_1: bhūyiṣṭhākṣaraṃ parākramaṇaṃ hi tad abhi samauhat tasmād uṣṇiha uttamaṃ padaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:943: bhūyiṣṭhākṣaraṃ puro gurur iva hi vajraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:944: (PB 8.5.3) vajraṃ bhrātṛvyāya praharati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:945: (PB 8.5.4) nāsike vā ete yajñasya yad uṣṇikkakubhau tasmāt samānaṃ chandaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:946: satī nānā yajñaṃv vahatas tasmāt samānāyā nāsikāyāḥ satyā nānā prāṇāv uccarataḥ (PB 8.5.5) prāṇā vā uṣṇikkakubhau tasmāt tābhyāṃ na vaṣaṭ kurvanti yad
GV02pncvbr1u:947: vaṣaṭ kuryuḥ prāṇān agnau pradadhyuḥ (PB 8.5.6) tāsu saphaṃ vipham iva vai tṛtīyasavanaṃ tṛtīyasavanasya saphatvāyāthauṣkalam etena vai prajāpatiḥ puṣkalān paśūn asṛjata teṣu
GV02pncvbr1u:948: rūpam adadhād yad etat sāma bhavati paśuṣv eva rūpaṃ dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:949: (PB 8.5.7) purojitī vo andhasa iti padyā cākṣaryā ca virājau bhavataḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:950_0: padyayā vai devāḥ svargaṃl lokam āyann akṣaryayā ṛṣayo nu prājānān yad ete padyā cākṣaryā ca virājau bhavataḥ svargasya lokasya
GV02pncvbr1u:950_1: prajñātyai (PB 8.5.8) tāsu śyāvāśvam (PB 8.5.9) śyāvāśvam ārvanānasaṃ sattram āsīnaṃ dhanvodavahan sa etat sāmāpaśyat tena
GV02pncvbr1u:950_2: vṛṣṭim asṛjata tato vai sa pratyatiṣṭhat tato gātum avindata gātuvid vā etat sāma (PB 8.5.10) vindate gātuṃ pratitiṣṭhaty
GV02pncvbr1u:950_3: etena tuṣṭuvānaḥ (PB 8.5.11) indras tṛtīyasavanād bībhatsamāna udakrāmat taṃ devāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:951_0: śyāvāślvenaihāyi ehiyety anvāhvayan sa upāvartata yad etat sāma bhavati tṛtīyasavanasya sendratvāya (PB 8.5.12) athaitad
GV02pncvbr1u:951_1: āndhīgavam andhīgur vā etat paśukāmaḥ sāmāpaśyat tena sahasraṃ paśūn asṛjata yad etat sāma bhavati paśūnāṃ puṣṭyai madhye
GV02pncvbr1u:951_2: nidhanam aiḍaṃ bhavaty etena vai tṛtīyasavanaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ yan madhye nidhanam aiḍaṃ na syād apratiṣṭhitaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:951_3: syāt (PB 8.5.13) daśākṣaraṃ madhyato nidhanam upayanti daśākṣarā virāḍ virājy eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:952: (PB 8.5.14) abhi priyāṇi pavata iti kāvaṃ prājāpatyaṃ sāma
GV02pncvbr1u:953_0: (PB 8.5.15) prajā vai priyāṇi paśavaḥ priyāṇi prajāyām eva paśuṣu pratitiṣtśuṣu pratitiṣṭhati (PB 8.5.16) raśmī vā etau yajñasya
GV02pncvbr1u:953_1: yad auśanakāve devakośo vā eṣa yajñam abhisamubjito yad ete antato bhavato yajñasyāriṣṭyai
GV02pncvbr1u:954: (PB 8.6.1) devā vai brahma vyabhajanta tasya yo raso 'tyaricyata tad yajñāyajñīyam abhavat
GV02pncvbr1u:955: (PB 8.6.2) brahmaṇo vā eṣa raso yad yajñāyajñīyaṃ yad yajñāyajñīyena stuvanti brahmaṇa eva rase yajñaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:956: (PB 8.6.3) yonir vai yajñāyajñīyam etasmād vai yoneḥ prajāpatir yajñam asṛjata tasmād yajñāyajñīyam
GV02pncvbr1u:957: (PB 8.6.4) tasmād vā etena purā brāhmaṇā bahiṣpavamānam astoṣata yoner yajñaṃ pratanavāmahā iti yajñaṃ tataḥ stuvanti yonau yajñaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:958: (PB 8.6.5) asureṣu vai sarvo yajña āsīt te devā yajñāyajñīyam apaśyaṃs
GV02pncvbr1u:959_0: teṣāṃ yajñā-yajñā vo agnaya ity agnihotram avṛñjata girā-girā ca dakṣasa iti darśapūrṇamāsau pra-pra vayam amṛtaṃ jātavedasam
GV02pncvbr1u:959_1: iti cāturmāsyāni priyaṃ mitraṃ na śaṃsiṣam iti saumyam adhvaram
GV02pncvbr1u:960: (PB 8.6.6) yajñā vo agnaye girā ca dakṣase pra vayam amṛtaṃ jātavedasaṃ priyaṃ mitraṃ na śaṃsiṣam iti vai tarhi cchandāṃsy āsaṃs te devā
GV02pncvbr1u:961: abhyārambham abhinivartyaṃ cchandobhir yajñam asurāṇām avṛñjata
GV02pncvbr1u:962: (PB 8.6.7) chandobhir yajñaṃ bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkte ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:963: (PB 8.6.8) etad dha sma vā āha kūśāmbaḥ svāyavo brahmā lātavyaḥ kaṃ svid adya śiśumārī yajñapathe 'pyastā gariṣyati
GV02pncvbr1u:964: (PB 8.6.9) eṣā vai śiśumārī yajñapathe 'pyastā yajñāyajñīyaṃ yad girā-girety āhātmānaṃ tad udgātā girati
GV02pncvbr1u:965: (PB 8.6.10) airaṃ kṛtvodgeyam irāyāṃ yajñaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayaty apramāyuka
GV02pncvbr1u:966: udgātā bhavati (PB 8.6.11) vaiśvānare vā etad udgātātmānaṃ pradadhāti yat pra-pra vayam ity āha praprīṃ vayam iti vaktavyaṃv vaiśvānaram eva parikrāmati
GV02pncvbr1u:967: (PB 8.6.12) yo vai nihnuvānaṃ cchanda upaiti pāpīyān ujjagivān bhavaty etad vai nihnuvānaṃ cchando yan na śaṃsiṣam iti nu śaṃsiṣam iti vaktavyaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:968: suśaṃsiṣam iti vā na nihnuvānaṃ chanda upaiti vasīyān ujjagivān bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:969: (PB 8.6.13) yasya vai yajñā vāgantā bhavanti vācaś chidreṇa sravanty ete
GV02pncvbr1u:970_0: vai yajñā vāgantā ye yajñāyajñīyāntā etad vācaś chidraṃ yad anṛtaṃ yad agniṣṭomayājy anṛtam āha tad anv asya yajñaḥ sravaty
GV02pncvbr1u:970_1: akṣareṇāntataḥ pratiṣṭhāpyam akṣareṇaiva yajñasya cchidram api dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:971: (PB 8.6.14) virājo vā etad rūpaṃ yad akṣaraṃ virājy evāntataḥ pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:972: (PB 8.7.1) ito vai prātar ūrdhvāṇi cchandāṃsi yujyante 'muto 'vāñci
GV02pncvbr1u:973_0: yajñāyajñīyasya stotre yujyante yajñā vo agnaye girā ca dakṣasa iti dvādaśākṣaraṃ pra vayam amṛtaṃ jātavedasam ity ekādaśākṣaraṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:973_1: priyaṃ mitraṃn na śaṃsiṣam ity aṣṭākṣaram (PB 8.7.2) anuṣṭubham uttamāṃ saṃpādayatīyaṃ vā anuṣṭub asyām eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:973_2: (PB 8.7.3) vāg vā anuṣṭub vācy eva pratitiṣṭhati jyaiṣṭhyaṃ vā anuṣṭub
GV02pncvbr1u:975: (PB 8.7.4) katham iva yajñāyajñīyaṃ geyam ity āhur yathānaḍvān prasrāvayamāṇa ittham iva cettham iva ceti
GV02pncvbr1u:976: (PB 8.7.5) vaiśvānaraṃ vā etad udgātānu prasīdann etīty āhur yad yajñāyajñīyasyarcaṃ saṃpratyāheti parikrāmatevodgeyaṃv vaiśvānaram eva parikrāmati
GV02pncvbr1u:977: (PB 8.7.6) vaiśvānare vā etad adhvaryuḥ sadasyān abhisṛjati yad yajñāyajñīyasya stotram upāvartayati prāvṛtenodgeyaṃv vaiśvānareṇānabhidāhāya
GV02pncvbr1u:978: (PB 8.7.7) na ha tu vai pitaraḥ prāvṛtaṃ jānanti yajñāyajñīyasya vai
GV02pncvbr1u:979_0: stotre pitaro yathāyathaṃ jijñāsanta ākarṇābhyāṃ prāvṛtyaṃ tad eva prāvṛtaṃ tad aprāvṛtaṃ jānanti pitaro na vaiśvānaro hinasti
GV02pncvbr1u:979_1: (PB 8.7.8) apaḥ paścāt patnya upasṛjanti vaiśvānaram eva tac chamayanty āpo hi śāntiḥ

GV02pncvbr1u:1100_0: (PB 9.3.7) yad arvāk stuvanti tad astutaṃ yat samprati stuvanti tat stutaṃ yad atiṣṭuvanti tat suṣṭutam (PB 9.3.8) yady arvāk
GV02pncvbr1u:1100_1: stuyur yāvatībhir na stuyus tāvatībhir vātiṣṭuyur bhūyo 'kṣarābhir vā
GV02pncvbr1u:1101: (PB 9.3.9) yady atiṣṭuyur yāvatībhir atiṣṭuyus tāvatībhir vā na stuyuḥ kanīyo 'kṣarābhir
GV02pncvbr1u:1102: (PB 9.3.10) yady arvāk stuyus trīḍam agniṣṭomasāma kāryaṃ nidhanam ekeḍayā ye dve tābhyām eva tat samaṃ kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1103: (PB 9.3.11) yady atiṣṭuyuḥ svāram agniṣṭomasāma kāryam ūnam iva vā etat
GV02pncvbr1u:1104: sāmno yat svaras tenaiva tat samaṃ kriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:1105: (PB 9.4.1) yadi somau saṃsutau syātāṃ mahati rātreḥ prātaranuvākam upākuryāt (PB 9.4.2) pūrvo vācaṃ pūrvaś chandāṃsi pūrvo devatā vṛṅkte
GV02pncvbr1u:1106: (PB 9.4.3) vṛṣaṇvatīṃ pratipadaṃ kuryād indro vai vṛṣā prātaḥsavanād evaiṣām indraṃv vṛṅkte
GV02pncvbr1u:1109: (PB 9.4.5) susamiddhe hotavyam agnir vai sarvā devatāḥ sarvā eva devatāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1110_0: paśyañ juhoti (PB 9.4.6) saṃveśāyopaveśāya gāyatryai cchandase 'bhibhūtaye svāhā saṃveśāyopaveśāya triṣṭubhe cchandase 'bhibhūtaye
GV02pncvbr1u:1110_1: svāhā saṃveśāyopaveśāya jagatyai cchandase 'bhibhūtaye svāheti juhoti (PB 9.4.7) cchandāṃsi vā abhibhūtayas tair evainān
GV02pncvbr1u:1111: (PB 9.4.8) yatra vā indrasya harī tad indraḥ. indrasya vai harī
GV02pncvbr1u:1112: bṛhadrathantare yad ubhe bṛhadrathantare bhavataḥ pūrva evendrasya harī ārabhante
GV02pncvbr1u:1114: (PB 9.4.10) turaśravasaś ca vai pārāvatānāṃ ca somau saṃsutāv āstāṃ tata
GV02pncvbr1u:1115: ete turaśravāḥ sāmanī apaśyat tābhyām asmā indraḥ śalmalināṃ yamunāyā havyaṃ nirāvahat yat tair aśravase bhavato havyam evaiṣāṃv vṛṅkte
GV02pncvbr1u:1117: (PB 9.4.12) yā vai pūrvāḥ prasnānti tāḥ pūrvās tīrthaṃ jayanti pūrva
GV02pncvbr1u:1118_0: evendram ārabhante (PB 9.4.13) vihavyaṃ śasyam (PB 9.4.14) jamadagneś ca vā ṛṣīṇāṃ ca somau saṃsutāv āstāṃ tata etaj gamadagnir
GV02pncvbr1u:1118_1: vihavyam apaśyat tam indra upāvartata yad vihavyaṃ hotā śaṃsatīndram evaiṣāṃv vṛṅkte
GV02pncvbr1u:1119: (PB 9.4.15) yadītaro 'gniṣṭomaḥ syād ukthaḥ kāryo yady uktho 'tirātro yo vai bhūyān yajñakratuḥ sa indrasya priyo bhūyasaivaiṣāṃ yajnakratunendraṃv
GV02pncvbr1u:1121: (PB 9.4.16) atho khalv āhur duṣprāpa iva vai paraḥ panthā yam evāgre yajñakratum ārabheta tasmān neyād iti
GV02pncvbr1u:1122: (PB 9.4.17) sajanīyaṃ śasyam agastyasya kayāśubhīyaṃ śasyam (PB 9.4.18) asyā amuṣyā adyaśvān mithunād ahorātrābhyām evainān nirbhajati
GV02pncvbr1u:1123: (PB 9.5.1) yadi somam akrītam apahareyur anyaḥ kretavyaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1124: (PB 9.5.2) yadi krītaṃ yo 'nyo 'bhyāśaṃ syāt sa āhṛtyaḥ somavikrayaṇe tu kiṃ cid dadyāt
GV02pncvbr1u:1125: (PB 9.5.3) yadi somaṃ na vindeyuḥ pūtīkān abhiṣuṇuyur yadi na pūtīkān
GV02pncvbr1u:1127: (PB 9.5.4) gāyatrī somam āharat tasyā anu visṛjya somarakṣiḥ parṇam acchinat tasya yo 'ṃśuḥ parāpatat sa pūtīko 'bhavat tasmin devā ūtim
GV02pncvbr1u:1128: avindann ūtīko vā eṣa yat pūtīkān abhiṣuṇvanty ūtim evāsmai vindanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1129_0: (PB 9.5.5) pratidhuk ca prātaḥ pūtīkāś ca śṛtaṃ ca madhyandine pūtīkāś ca dadhi cāparāhṇe pūtīkāś ca (PB 9.5.6) somapītho
GV02pncvbr1u:1129_1: vā etasmād apakrāmatīty āhur yasya somam apaharantīti sa oṣadhīś ca paśūṃś ca praviśati tam oṣadhibhyaś ca paśubhyaś cāvarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:1129_2: (PB 9.5.7) indro vṛtram ahaṃs tasya yo nastaḥ somaḥ samadhāvat tāni
GV02pncvbr1u:1130: babhrutūlāny arjunāni yo vapāyā utkhinnāyās tāni lohitatūlāni yāni babhrutūlāny arjunāni tāny abhiṣuṇuyād etad vai brahmaṇo rūpaṃ sākṣād eva somam abhiṣuṇoti
GV02pncvbr1u:1131: (PB 9.5.8) śrāyantīyaṃ brahmasāma kāryaṃ sad evainaṃ karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:1132: (PB 9.5.9) yajñāyajñīyam anuṣṭubhi prohed vācaivainaṃ samardhayati vāravantīyam agniṣṭomasāma kāryam indriyasya vīryasya parigṛhītyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1134: (PB 9.5.11) pāṅkto yajño yāvān yajñas tam evārabhate
GV02pncvbr1u:1136: (PB 9.5.13) tatra tad dadyād yad dāsyaṃ syāt
GV02pncvbr1u:1137: (PB 9.6.1) yadi kalaśo dīryeta vaṣaṭkāraṇidhanaṃ brahmasāma kuryāt
GV02pncvbr1u:1138: (PB 9.6.2) avaṣaṭkṛto vā etasya somaḥ parāsicyate yasya kalaśo dīryate yad
GV02pncvbr1u:1139: vaṣaṭkāraṇīdhanaṃ brahmasāma bhavati vaṣaṭkṛta evāsya somo bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:1140: (PB 9.6.3) vidhuṃ dadrāṇaṃ samane bahūnām ity etāsu kāryam
GV02pncvbr1u:1141: (PB 9.6.4) eṣa hi bahūnāṃ samane dīryate yat kalaśaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1142: (PB 9.6.5) tad āhur na vā ārtyārtir anūdyārtyā vā eṣa ārtim anuvadati yaḥ kalaśo dīrṇe dadrāṇavatīṣu karotīti
GV02pncvbr1u:1144: (PB 9.6.7) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata sa dugdho riricāno 'manyata sa etac chrāyantīyam apaśyat tenātmānaṃ samaśrīṇāt prajayā paśubhir indriyeṇa
GV02pncvbr1u:1145: (PB 9.6.8) dugdha iva eṣa riricāno yasya kalaśo dīryate yac chrāyantīyaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1146: brahmasāma bhavati punar evātmānaṃ saṃśrīṇāti prajayā paśubhir indriyeṇa (PB 9.6.9) yadi śrāyantīyaṃ brahmasāma syād vaiṣṇavīṣv anuṣṭupsu
GV02pncvbr1u:1147: vaṣaṭkāraṇidhanaṃ kuryāt (PB 9.6.10) yad vai yajñasya sravati vācaṃ pratisravati vāg anuṣṭup
GV02pncvbr1u:1148: viṣṇur vācaiva yajñasya cchidram apidadhāti (PB 9.6.11) yad vai yajñasya sravaty antataḥ sravati vāravantīyam agniṣṭomasāma kāryaṃ yajñasyaiva cchidraṃ vārayate
GV02pncvbr1u:1149: (PB 9.7.1) yadi prātassavanāt somo 'tiricyeta asti somo ayaṃ suta iti marutvatīṣu gāyatreṣu
GV02pncvbr1u:1150_0: (PB 9.7.2) mādhyandinaṃ vā eṣa savanaṃ nikāmayamāno 'bhyatiricyate yaḥ prātassavanād atiricyate tasmān marutvatīṣu stuvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1150_1: marutvad dhi mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ tasmād u gāyatrīṣu gāyatraṃ hi prātassavanam (PB 9.7.3) yasmāt stomād atiricyate sa eva
GV02pncvbr1u:1150_2: stomaḥ kāryaḥ salomatvāya (PB 9.7.4) aindrāvaiṣṇavaṃ hotānuśaṃsati (PB 9.7.5) vīryaṃ vā indro yajño viṣṇur vīrya eva yajñe
GV02pncvbr1u:1151: (PB 9.7.6) yadi mādhyandināt savanād atiricyeta baṇ mahāṃ asi sūryety ādityavatīṣu gaurīvitena
GV02pncvbr1u:1152: (PB 9.7.7) tṛtīyasavanaṃ vā eṣa nikāmayamāno 'bhyatiricyate yo mādhyandināt savanād atiricyate tasmād ādityavatīṣu stuvanty ādityaṃ hi
GV02pncvbr1u:1153_0: tṛtīyasavanaṃ tasmād u bṛhatīṣu bārhataṃ hi mādhyandinaṃ savanam (PB 9.7.8) yasmāt stomād atiricyeta sa eva stomaḥ kāryaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1153_1: salomatvāyaindrāvaiṣṇavaṃ hotānuśaṃsati vīryaṃ vā indro yajño viṣṇur vīrya
GV02pncvbr1u:1155_0: (PB 9.7.9) yadi tṛtīyasavanād atiricyeta viṣṇoḥ śipiviṣṭavatīṣu gaurīvitena stuyuḥ (PB 9.7.10) yajño vai viṣṇuś śipiviṣṭo
GV02pncvbr1u:1155_1: yajña eva viṣṇau pratitiṣṭhaty atiriktaṃ gaurīvitam atirikta evātiriktaṃ dadhāti (PB 9.7.11) etad anyat kuryur ukthāni praṇayeyur
GV02pncvbr1u:1155_2: ukthāni vā eṣa nikāmayamāno 'bhyatiricyate yo 'gniṣṭomād atiricyate yady ukthyebhyo
GV02pncvbr1u:1156: 'tiricyetātirātraḥ kāryo rātriṃ vā eṣa nikāmayamāno 'bhyatiricyate ya ukthyebhyo 'tiricyate yadi rātrer atiricyeta viṣṇoḥ śipiviṣṭavatīṣu bṛhatā
GV02pncvbr1u:1157_0: stuyur eṣu tu vā atiricyata ity āhur yo rātrer atiricyata iti (PB 9.7.12) amuṃ vā eṣa lokaṃ nikāmayamāno 'bhyatiricyate yo
GV02pncvbr1u:1157_1: rātrer atiricyate bṛhatā stuvanti bṛhad amuṃ lokam āptum arhati tam evāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:1158: (PB 9.8.1) yadi dīkṣitānāṃ pramīyate dagdhvāsthīny upanahya yo nediṣṭhī syāt taṃ dīkṣayitvā saha yajeran
GV02pncvbr1u:1159: (PB 9.8.2) etad anyat kuryur abhiṣutyānyat somam agṛhītvā grahān yāsau dakṣiṇā sraktis tad vā stuyur mārjālīye vā
GV02pncvbr1u:1160: (PB 9.8.3) api vā etasya yajñe yo dīkṣitaḥ pramīyate tam etena
GV02pncvbr1u:1162: (PB 9.8.4) yāmena stuvanti yamalokam evainaṃ gamayanti (PB 9.8.5) tisṛbhiḥ stuvanti tṛtīye hi loke pitaraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1165: (PB 9.8.8) arbudaḥ sarpa etābhir mṛtāṃ tvacam apāhata mṛtām evaitābhis tvacam apaghnate (PB 9.8.9) tā ṛco 'nubruvantas trir mārjālīyaṃ pariyanti savyān ūrūn āghnānāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1166: (PB 9.8.10) stutam anuśaṃsaty amuṣminn evainaṃ loke nidhnuvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1167: (PB 9.8.11) yanti vā ete patha ity āhur ye mṛtāya kurvantīty
GV02pncvbr1u:1168: aindravāyavāgrān grahān gṛhṇate punaḥ panthānam apiyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1169_0: (PB 9.8.12) agna āyūṃṣi pavasa iti pratipatkāryā ya eva jīvanti teṣv āyur dadhāti (PB 9.8.13) saṃvatsare 'sthīni yājayeyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1169_1: saṃvvatsaro vai sarvasya śāntir yat purā saṃvvatsarād yājayeyur vācam aruṣkṛtāṃ krūrām ṛccheyuḥ (PB 9.8.14) vṛtaḥ pavamānāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1170: (PB 9.8.15) yat trivṛtaḥ pavamānā bhavanti prāṇā vai trivṛt prāṇān evopayanti yat saptadaśam itarat sarvaṃ prajāpatir vai saptadaśaḥ prajatim
GV02pncvbr1u:1172: (PB 9.8.16) prāṇāpānair vā ete vyṛdhyanta ity āhur ye mṛtāya kurvantīti
GV02pncvbr1u:1173: maitrāvaruṇāgrān grahān gṛhṇate prāṇāpānau mitrāvaruṇau prāṇāpānair eva samṛdhyante
GV02pncvbr1u:1174: (PB 9.9.1) yasya kalaśa upadasyati kalaśam evāsyopadasyantaṃ prāṇo
GV02pncvbr1u:1177: (PB 9.9.3) atho khalv āhur antarhitam iva vā etad yat payo hiraṇyam
GV02pncvbr1u:1179: (PB 9.9.4) prāṇā vā āpo 'mṛtaṃ hiraṇyam amṛta evāsya prāṇān dadhāti sa
GV02pncvbr1u:1181: (PB 9.9.5) yasya nārāśaṃsa upavāyati nārāśaṃsam evāsyopa+vāyantaṃ prāṇo
GV02pncvbr1u:1183: (PB 9.9.6) yam adhvaryur antato grahaṃ gṛhṇīyāt tasyāptum avanayet
GV02pncvbr1u:1184: (PB 9.9.7) prāyaścityai vai graho gṛhyate prāyaścityevāsmai prāyaścittiṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1186: (PB 9.9.8) yadi pītāpītau somau saṃgaccheyātām antaḥ paridhyaṅgārān
GV02pncvbr1u:1187: nirvartya juhuyāt hutasya cāhutasya cāhutasya hutasya ca /
GV02pncvbr1u:1188: pītāpītasya somasyendrāgnī pibataṃ sutaṃ svāheti saiva tasya prāyaścittiḥ (PB 9.9.9) prajāpataye svāhety abhakṣaṇīyasya juhuyād uttarārdhyapūrvārdhya uparavaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1189: (PB 9.9.10) indur indum avāgād ity avavṛṣṭasya bhakṣayet
GV02pncvbr1u:1190: (PB 9.9.11) tasya ta indrav indrapītasyendriyāvatas sarvagaṇasya sarvagaṇa
GV02pncvbr1u:1192_0: (PB 9.9.12) hiraṇyagarbhaḥ samavartatāgra ity ājyenābhyupākṛtasya juhuyād agnīdhraṃ paretya bhūtānāṃ jātaḥ patir eka āsīt
GV02pncvbr1u:1192_1: sa dādhāra pṛthivīṃ dyām utemāṃ tasmai ta indo haviṣā vidhema svāheti saiva tasya prāyaścittiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1193_0: (PB 9.9.13) yadi grāvāpi śīryate paśubhir yajamāno vyṛdhyate paśavo vai grāvāṇo dyutānasya mārutasya sāmnā stuyuḥ (PB 9.9.14)
GV02pncvbr1u:1193_1: mārutā vai grāvāṇaḥ svenaivaināṃs tad rūpeṇa samardhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1194_0: (PB 9.9.15) yadi somam abhidahed grahān adhvaryuḥ spāśayeta stotrāṇy udgātā śastrāṇi hotātha yathāpūrvaṃ yajñena careyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1194_1: pañca dakṣiṇā deyāḥ pāṅkto yajño yāvān yajñas tam ārabhate 'vabhṛthād udetya punar dīkṣate
GV02pncvbr1u:1195: tatra tad dadyād yad dāsyaṃ syāt purā dvādaśyā dīkṣeta yad dvādaśīm atinayed antardhīyeta
GV02pncvbr1u:1196: (PB 9.10.1) yadi mahāvīro bhidyeta taṃ bhinnam abhimṛśed ya ṛte cid
GV02pncvbr1u:1198: saṃdhātā saṃdhiṃ maghavā purūvasur niṣkartā vihrutaṃ punaḥ mā bhema niṣṭyā ivendra tvad araṇā iva /
GV02pncvbr1u:1199: vanāni na prajahitāny adrivo duroṣāso amanmahi /
GV02pncvbr1u:1201: sakṛt sute mahatā śūra rādhasānu stomaṃ mademahīti mahāvīraṃ bhinnam abhimṛśet saiva tasya prāyaścittiḥ (PB 9.10.2) asuryaṃ vā etasmād varṇaṃ kṛtvā teja indriyaṃ vīryam annādyaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1202: prajāḥ paśavo 'pakrāmanti yasya yūpo virohati sa īśvaraḥ pāpīyān bhavitoḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1203: (PB 9.10.3) tvāṣṭraṃ paśuṃ bahurūpam ālabheta tvaṣṭā vai paśūnāṃ rūpāṇāṃ vikartā tam eva tad upadhāvati sa enaṃ tejaseindriyeṇa vīryeṇānnādyena
GV02pncvbr1u:1204: prajayā paśubhiḥ punas samardhayati saiva tasya prāyaścittiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1205: (PB 10.1.1) agninā pṛthivyauṣadhibhis tenāyaṃ lokas trivṛd vāyunāntarikṣeṇa vayobhis tenaiṣa lokās trivṛd yo 'yam antar ādityena divā
GV02pncvbr1u:1206: nakṣatrais tenāsau lokas trivṛd etad eva trivṛta āyatanam eṣāsya bandhutā
GV02pncvbr1u:1207: (PB 10.1.2) āyatanavān bandhumān bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1208_0: (PB 10.1.3) tam u pratiṣṭhetyāhus trivṛd dhy evaiṣu lokeṣu pratiṣṭhitaḥ (PB 10.1.4) ardhamāsa eva pañcadaśasyāyatanam eṣāsya
GV02pncvbr1u:1208_1: bandhutā (PB 10.1.5) āyatanavān bandhumān bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1209: (PB 10.1.6) taṃ caujo balam ity āhur ardhamāsaśo hi prajāḥ paśava ojo balaṃ puṣyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1210: (PB 10.1.7) saṃvatsara eva saptadaśasyāyatanaṃ dvādaśa māsāḥ pañcadartava
GV02pncvbr1u:1211: etad eva saptadaśasyāyatanam eṣāsya bandhutā (PB 10.1.8) āyatanavān bandhumān bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1212: (PB 10.1.9) tam u prajāpatir ity āhuḥ saṃvatsaraṃ hi prajāḥ paśavo
GV02pncvbr1u:1214: (PB 10.1.10) āditya evaikaviṃsasyāyatanaṃ dvādaśa māsāḥ pañcavartas traya
GV02pncvbr1u:1215: ime lokā asāv āditya ekaviṃśa etad evaikaviṃśasyāyatanam eṣāsya bandhutā
GV02pncvbr1u:1216: (PB 10.1.11) āyatanavān bandhumān bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1217_0: (PB 10.1.12) tam u devatalpa ity āhuḥ pra devatalpam āpnoti ya evaṃv veda (PB 10.1.13) trivṛd eva triṇavasyāyatanam eṣāsya
GV02pncvbr1u:1217_1: bandhutā (PB 10.1.14) āyatanavān bandhumān bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1218: (PB 10.1.15) tam u puṣṭir ity āhus trivṛd dhy evaiṣa puṣṭaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1219: (PB 10.1.16) devatā eva trayastriṃśasyāyatanaṃ trayastriṃśad devatāḥ prajāpatiś catustriṃśa etad eva trayastriṃśasyāyatanam eṣāsya bandhutā
GV02pncvbr1u:1220: (PB 10.1.17) āyatanavān bandhumān bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1221: (PB 10.1.18) tam u nāka ity āhur na hi prajāpatiḥ kasmai canākam

GV02pncvbr1u:1225: (PB 10.2.1) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata so 'tāmyat tasmai vāj jyotir

GV02pncvbr1u:1227: (PB 10.2.2) tasmād yo virājaṃ stomaṃ saṃpadyate taṃ jyotiṣṭomo 'gniṣṭoma
GV02pncvbr1u:1228: ity ācakṣate virāḍ ḍhi chandasāṃ jyotiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1229: (PB 10.2.3) jyotiḥ samānānāṃ bhavati ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1230: (PB 10.2.4) anuṣṭup ca vai saptadaśaś ca samabhavatāṃ sānuṣṭup caturuttarāṇi chandāṃsy asṛjata ṣaḍuttarān stomān saptadaśas tāv etān
GV02pncvbr1u:1231: madhyataḥ prājanayatām (PB 10.2.5) trivṛc ca triṇavaś ca rāthantarau tāv ajaś cāśvaś cānvasṛjyetāṃ tasmāt tau rāthantaraṃ prācīnaṃ pradhūnutaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1232: (PB 10.2.6) pañcadaśaś caikaviṃśaś ca bārhatau tau gauś cāviś cānvasṛjyetāṃ tasmāt tau bārhataṃ prācīnaṃ bhāskurutaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1233: (PB 10.2.7) evaṃ vai vidvāṃsam āhur api grāmyāṇāṃ paśūnāṃ vāca ājānāti
GV02pncvbr1u:1234_0: (PB 10.3.1) prajāpatir akāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti sa ātmann ṛtvyam apaśyat tata ṛtvijo 'sṛjata yad ṛtvyād asṛjata tad

GV02pncvbr1u:1243_0: (PB 10.3.9) tām etām annādyāya vyāvṛjyāsate yad etaṃ dvādaśāhaṃ dvādaśa dīkṣā svādaśopasado dvādaśa prasutaḥ ṣaṭriṃśad etā

GV02pncvbr1u:1243_2: 10.3.11) etāvad vāva saṃvatsara indriyaṃ vīryaṃ yad etā rātrayo dvādaśa pūṛnamāsyo dvādaśaikaṣṭakā dvādaśāmāvāsyā yāvad eva

GV02pncvbr1u:1247: (PB 10.4.1) bhūtaṃ pūrvo 'tirātro bhaviṣyad uttaraḥ pṛthivī pūrvo 'tirātro

GV02pncvbr1u:1250: (PB 10.4.3) saṃvatsarasya vā etau daṃṣṭrau yad atirātrau tayor na svaptavyaṃ saṃvatsarasya daṃṣṭrayor ātmānaṃ ned apidadhānīti
GV02pncvbr1u:1251: (PB 10.4.4) tad āhuḥ ko 'svaptum arhati yad vāva prāṇo +jāgāra tad eva jāgaritam iti (PB 10.4.5) gāyatrīṃ vā etāṃ jyotiḥpakṣām āsate yad etaṃ dvādaśāham aṣṭau
GV02pncvbr1u:1252: madhya ukthā agniṣṭomāv abhito māsā svargṃ lokam etyājarasaṃ brahmādyam annam atti dīpyamānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1253: (PB 10.4.6) triṣpurastād rathantaraṃ upayanti tryāvṛd vai vāk sarvām eva vācam avarudhya sarvam annādyaṃ dvādaśāhaṃ tanvate
GV02pncvbr1u:1254: (PB 10.4.7) jāmi vā etad yajñe kriyata ity āhur yat triṣpurastād
GV02pncvbr1u:1255: rathantaram upayantīti saubharam ukthānāṃ brahmasāma bhavati tenaiva tad ajāmi
GV02pncvbr1u:1256_0: (PB 10.4.8) pratnavatyaḥ prāyaṇīyasyāhnaḥ pratipado bhavanti teno eva tad ajāmi (PB 10.4.9) trir vevopariṣṭād rathantaram
GV02pncvbr1u:1256_1: upayanti trāvṛd vai vāk sarvām eva vācam avarudhya sarvam annādyaṃ dvādaśāhād uttiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1257: (PB 10.5.1) trayo vā ete trirātrā yad eṣa dvādaśāho gāytramukhaḥ prathamo
GV02pncvbr1u:1259: (PB 10.5.2) yasmād gāyatramukhaḥ prathamas tasmād ūrdhvo 'gnir dīdāya yasmād gāyatramadhyo dvitīyas tasmāt tiryaṅ vāyuḥ pavate (PB 10.5.3)
GV02pncvbr1u:1260: (PB 10.5.5) tejasā vā ete prayanti tejo madhye dadhati tejo 'bhyudyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1261_0: jyotiṣā vā ete prayanti jyotir madhye dadhati jyotir abhyudyanti cakṣuṣā vā ete prayanti cakṣur madhye dadhati cakṣur abhyudyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1261_1: prāṇena vā ete prayanti prāṇaṃ madhye dadhati prāṇam abhyudyanti ye gāyatryā prayanti gāyatrīṃ madhye dadhati gāyatrim abhyudyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1261_2: (PB 10.5.6) tantraṃ vā etad vitāyate yad eṣa dvādaśāhas tasyetair (?)
GV02pncvbr1u:1263_0: (PB 10.5.7) girikṣidauccāmanyaveti hovācābhipratārī kākṣaseniḥ kathaṃ dvādaśāha iti yathārān nemiḥ paryety evam enaṃ gāyatrī
GV02pncvbr1u:1263_1: paryeti avisraṃsāya yathārā nābhau dhṛtā evam asyāṃ dvādaśāho dhṛtaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1264: (PB 10.5.8) anuṣṭubhaṃ vā etām annādyāya vyāvṛjyāsate yad etaṃ dvādaśāham (PB 10.5.9) aṣṭābhir vā akṣair anuṣṭup prathamaṃ dvādaśāhasyāhar
GV02pncvbr1u:1265: duyacchaty ekādaśabhir dvitīyaṃ dvādaśābhis tṛtīyam (PB 10.5.10) akṣaraṃ tryakṣaram ucchiṣyate tad evottaraṃ trirātram
GV02pncvbr1u:1267_0: (PB 10.5.11) chandāṃsy evāsyās tṛtīyaṃ trirātraṃ vahanti (PB 10.5.12) tāṃ vā etāṃ pratīcīṃ tiraścīṃ parācīm āsate 'nnādyāya
GV02pncvbr1u:1267_1: tasmāt pratyañcaṃ tiryañcaṃ parāñcaṃ prajāḥ paśum upajīvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1268_0: (PB 10.5.13) chandāṃsi vā anyo'nyasya lokam abhadhyāyan gāyatrī triṣṭubhas triṣṭub jagatyā jagatī gāyatryās tāni vyauhan
GV02pncvbr1u:1268_1: yathālokaṃ tato vai tāni yaṃ-yaṃ kāmam akāmayanta tam asanvan
GV02pncvbr1u:1269_0: (PB 10.5.14) yatkāmo vyūḍhacchandasā dvadaśāhena yajate so 'smai kāmaḥ samṛdhyate (PB 10.5.15) oko vai devānāṃ dvādaśāho
GV02pncvbr1u:1269_1: yatho vai manuṣyā imaṃ lokam āviṣṭā evaṃ devatā dvādaśāham āviṣṭā devatā ha vā etena yajate ya evaṃv vidvān dvādaśāhena yajate
GV02pncvbr1u:1270: (PB 10.5.16) gṛhā vai devānāṃ dvādaśāho nāgṛhatāyā bhayyam
GV02pncvbr1u:1271: (PB 10.5.17) yo vai dvādaśāham agniṣṭomena kalpamānaṃ veda kalpate 'smai
GV02pncvbr1u:1272: prātaḥsavanenaiva prathamas trirātraḥ kalpate mādhyandinena dvitīyas tṛtīyasavanena tṛtīyo 'gniṣṭomasāmnaiva daśamam ahaḥ kalpate
GV02pncvbr1u:1274: (PB 10.6.1) eti prety āśumad vītimad rukmat tejasvad yuñjānaṃ prathamasyāhno rūpaṃ trivṛtaḥ stomasya gāyatrasya chandaso rathantarasya sāmnaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1275: (PB 10.6.2) vṛṣavad vṛtravad rayimad viśvavad upasthitaṃ dvitīyasyāhno
GV02pncvbr1u:1276: rūpaṃ pañcadaśasya stomasya traiṣṭubhasya chandaso bṛhataḥ sāmnaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1277: (PB 10.6.3) udvat trivad digvat gomaṭ ṭaṣabhavat tṛtīyasyāhno rūpaṃ saptadaśasya stomasya jāgatasya chandaso vairūpasya sāmnaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1278: (PB 10.6.4) rājanvaj janavadvat sūryavad virāḍanutodavac caturthasyāhno rūpam ekaviṃśasya stomasyānuṣṭubhasya chandaso (?) rājasya vai sāmnaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1279_0: (PB 10.6.5) citravac chiśumat paṅktiḥ śakvarī dyūnākṣarā gomad ṛṣabhavad vajryabhimat pañcamasyāhno rūpaṃ triṇavasya stomasya
GV02pncvbr1u:1279_1: pāṅktena chandaso śakvarīṇāṃ sāmnaḥ (PB 10.6.6) parivat prativat saptapadā dvipadā vinārāśaṃsā gomad ṛṣabhavat ṣaṣṭhasyāhno
GV02pncvbr1u:1279_2: rūpaṃ trayastriṃśasya stomasya sarveṣāṃ chandasāṃ rūpaṃ (?)
GV02pncvbr1u:1280: revatīnāṃ sāmnaḥ (PB 10.6.7) yasmād eṣā samānā satī ṣaḍahavibhaktir nānārūpā tasmād virūpaḥ saṃvvatsaraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1281: (PB 10.6.8) virūpam enam anuprajāyate ya evaṃv veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1282_0: (PB 10.7.1) agna iti prathamasyāhno rūpam agnivibhakter agnim iti dvitīyasyāgnineti tṛtīyasyāgnir iti caturthasya (PB 10.7.2)
GV02pncvbr1u:1282_1: devā vai śriyam aicchaṃs tān na prathame 'hany avindan na dvitīye na tṛtīye tāñ caturthe 'hany avindan vindate śriyaṃ ya
GV02pncvbr1u:1282_2: evaṃ vedāgner iti pañcamasya teno śrīḥ pratyupoditety āhuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1283: (PB 10.7.3) aprativādy enaṃ bhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1284: (PB 10.7.4) agna iti ṣaṣṭhasya yenaiva rūpeṇa prayanti tad abhyudyanti (PB 10.7.5) yasmād eṣā samānā saty agnivbhaktir nānārūpā tasmād yathartv ādityas tapati
GV02pncvbr1u:1285: (PB 10.8.1) indreti prathamasyāhno rūpam indravibhakter indram iti
GV02pncvbr1u:1286_0: dvitīyasyendreṇeti tṛtīyasyendra iti caturthasyendrād iti pañcamasyendreti ṣaṣṭhasya yenaiva rūpeṇa prayanti tad abhyudyanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1286_1: yasmād eṣā samānā satīndravibhaktir nānārūpā tasmād yathartv oṣadhayaḥ pacyante
GV02pncvbr1u:1287_0: (PB 10.9.1) yad ṛcā prastauti tat prathamasyāhno rūpam svaravibhakter yat purastāt stobhaṃ tad dvitīyasya yad ubhayataḥ stobhaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1287_1: tat tṛtīyasya yad anutunnaṃ tac caturthasya yad abhyārabdhaṃ tat pañcamasya yad
GV02pncvbr1u:1289: (PB 10.9.2) svarāṇāṃ yasmād eṣā samānā satī svaravibhaktir nnānārūpā tasmād yathartu vāyuḥ pavate
GV02pncvbr1u:1290_0: (PB 10.10.1) padanidhanaṃ prathamasyāhno rūpam nidhanavibhakter bahirṇidhanaṃ dvitīyasya niṃnidhanaṃ tṛtīyasyenidhanañ caturthasyāthakāraṇidhanaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1290_1: pañcamasya yad ihākāreṇābhyastaṃ tat ṣaṣṭhasyāhno rūpaṃ nidhanānāṃ yasmād eṣā samānā satī nidhanavibhaktir nnānārūpā tasmād
GV02pncvbr1u:1291_0: (PB 10.11.1) dravadiḍaṃ prathamasyāhno rūpam iḍāvibhakter ūrdhveḍaṃ dvitīyasya pariṣṭubdheḍaṃ tṛtīyasyeḍābhir aiḍaṃ caturthasyādhyardheḍaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1291_1: pañcamasya yad ihākāreṇābhyastaṃ tat ṣaṣṭhasyāhno rūpam iḍānāṃ yasmād eṣā
GV02pncvbr1u:1292: samānā satīḍāvibhaktir nnānārūpā tasmāt samānāḥ santaḥ paśavo nānārūpāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1293: (PB 10.12.1) bharadvājāyanā vai sattram āsata tān apṛcchan kiṃ prathamenāhnā kuruteti praivaimeti kiṃ dvitīyenety avasam evākurmahīti kiṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1294_0: tṛtīyeneti pary evāplavāmahīti kiṃ caturtheneti sataiva sad apyadadhmeti kiṃ pañcameneti prāṇān eva vicchindanta aimeti kiṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1294_1: ṣaṣṭhenetīdam evāgacchāmeti iti (PB 10.12.2) yasya padena prastauty atha svāram abhi vāva tena devāḥ paśūn apaśyan yat purastāt
GV02pncvbr1u:1294_2: stobhaṃ atha svāram ud eva tenāsṛjanata yad ubhayataḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1295: stobham atha svāram ebhya eva tena lokebhyo devāḥ paśubhyo 'nnādyaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1296_0: prāyacchan yad anutunnam atha svāram upaiva tenāśikṣan yasya madhye nidhanam atha svāraṃ garbhāṃs tenādadhata tāni havatāsvāreṇa
GV02pncvbr1u:1296_1: prājanayan (PB 10.12.3) imaṃ vāva devā lokaṃ padanidhanenābhy ajayann amuṃ bahirṇidhanenāntarikṣaṃ diṅnidhanenāmṛtatvam īnidhanenāgacchan
GV02pncvbr1u:1298: (PB 10.12.4) imaṃ vāva devā lokaṃ dravadiḍenābhy ajayann amum ūrdhveḍenāntarikṣaṃ pariṣṭubdheḍena pratiṣṭhām iḍābhir aiḍenāvārundhata
GV02pncvbr1u:1299: pratiṣṭhāyādhyardheḍena vyajayantāsminn eva loka iheḍena pratyatiṣṭhan
GV02pncvbr1u:1300: (PB 10.12.5) na vāk saṃvatsaram ativadatīḍaiva saṃvatsaram ativadati
GV02pncvbr1u:1301: garbheṇa saṃvatsare paryāvṛtya prajāyete tenātivadati (PB 10.12.6) tā vā etāś catasraḥ ṣaḍahaṃ parācya iḍā atiyanty eṣā nūtaiṣā viṣūcy eṣā pratīcy etad vīḍam
GV02pncvbr1u:1302: (PB 10.12.7) saṃvatsaro 'gnir vāk samvatsaro yad agnir vibhajyate vācam
GV02pncvbr1u:1304_0: (PB 10.12.8) dve dve akṣare vibhajanti dvau dvau hi māsāv ṛturatho māsānām eva tad rūpaṃ kriyate (PB 10.12.9) ṣaḍ ahāni vibhajanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1304_1: ṣaḍ ṛtava ṛtūnāṃ dhṛtyā ṛtūnāṃ pratiṣṭhityā atho ṛtūnām eva tad rūpaṃ kriyate ṣaḍ u puruṣā yān agnir
GV02pncvbr1u:1306_0: (PB 10.12.10) yad idaṃ bahudhāgnir vihriyate tad asāv ādityaḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ pratyaṅ tasmād ete devate vibhaktim ānaśāte nāto
GV02pncvbr1u:1306_1: 'nyā kā cana (PB 11.1.1) stomo yujyate sattriyebhyo ' harbhyaḥ pratnavatībhiś copavatībhiś ca (PB 11.1.2) yat pratnavatyo
GV02pncvbr1u:1306_2: upavatībhyaḥ pūrvā yujyante brahma tat pūrvaṃ kṣatrād yujyate brahma hi pūrvaṃ kṣatram
GV02pncvbr1u:1307: (PB 11.1.3) manas tat pūrvaṃ vāco yujyate mano hi yad dhi
GV02pncvbr1u:1309_0: (PB 11.1.4) bṛhat tat pūrvaṃ rathantarād yujyate bṛhad dhi pūrvaṃ rathantarād vijityā tu vai rathantaraṃ pūrvaṃ yogam ānaśe
GV02pncvbr1u:1309_1: (PB 11.1.5) sambhāryās tṛcā bhavanti yathāśiṣṭhān vahiṣṭhān sambhared evam evaitān sambharanti gatyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1310: (PB 11.1.6) nava bhavanti navāhasya yuktyā ṛcarcaivāhar yunakti
GV02pncvbr1u:1311: yathāprārthasya śamyā avadadhyād evam evaitan navāhasya śamyā avadadhāti gatyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1312: (PB 11.1.7) trivṛd eva stomo bhavati tejase brahmavarcasāya
GV02pncvbr1u:1313: (PB 11.2.1) ubhābhyāṃ vai rūpābhyāṃ bahiṣpavamānyo yujyante yatsāmā stomo bhavati tad ājyeṣu
GV02pncvbr1u:1314: (PB 11.2.2) nirāhāvanty ājyāni bhavanti yuktam eva tair āhvayati
GV02pncvbr1u:1315: (PB 11.2.3) agna āyāhi vītaya ā no mitrāvaruṇāyāhi suṣamā hi ta indrāgnī āgataṃ sutam iti rāthantaram eva tad rūpaṃ nirdyotayati stomaḥ iti
GV02pncvbr1u:1316_0: (PB 11.3.1) pra somāso vipaścita iti gāyatrī bhavati pretyā abhidroṇāni babhrava ity abhikrāntyai stutā indrāya vāyava iti

GV02pncvbr1u:1318: (PB 11.3.4) āśvaṃ bhavati (PB 11.3.5) aśvo vai bhūtvā prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata sa prājāyata
