GV02pncvbr1u:1321: (PB 11.3.7) anativādy enaṃ bhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1322_0: (PB 11.3.8) somasāma bhavati (PB 11.3.9) yathā vā imā anyā oṣadhayaḥ evaṃ soma āsīt sa tapo 'tapyata sa etat somasāmāpaśyat
GV02pncvbr1u:1322_1: tena rājyamādhipatyam agacchad yaśo 'bhavad rājyam ādhipatyaṃ gacchati yaśo bhavati somasāmnā tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1323: (PB 11.3.10) yaudhājayaṃ bhavati yad eva yaudhājayasya brāhmaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:1325_0: (PB 11.4.1) abhi tvā śūra no nu ma ity abhīti rathantarasya rūpaṃ rathantaraṃ hy etad ahaḥ (PB 11.4.2) kayā naś citra ābhuvad
GV02pncvbr1u:1325_1: iti kavatyas tena prājāpatyāḥ ko hi prajāpatiḥ prajāpater āptyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1326_0: (PB 11.4.3) taṃ vo dasmam ṛtīṣahaṃ vasor mandānam andhaso 'bhivatsaṃ na svasareṣu dhenava ity abhīti rathantarasya rūpaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1326_1: rathantaraṃ hy etad ahaḥ (PB 11.4.4) indraṃ gīrbhir havāmaha iti havanta evainam
GV02pncvbr1u:1327: (PB 11.4.5) tarobhir vo vidadvasum iti stomo vai taro yajño vidadvasuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1328_0: stomena vai yajño yujyate yat tarobhir vo vidadvasum ity āha yajñam eva tad yunakti (PB 11.4.6) rathantaraṃ bhavati brahma
GV02pncvbr1u:1328_1: vai rathantaraṃ brahma prāyaṇīyam ahar brahmaṇa eva tad brahmākramya prayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1329_0: (PB 11.4.7) iyaṃ vai rathantaram asyām eva pratiṣṭhāya sattram āsate (PB 11.4.8) vāmadevyaṃ bhavati paśavo vai vāmadevyaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1329_1: paśūnām avaruddhyai prājāpatyaṃ vai vāmadevyaṃ prajāpatāv eva pratiṣṭhāya sattram āsate
GV02pncvbr1u:1330: (PB 11.4.9) naudhasaṃ bhavati brahma vai naudhasaṃ brahma prāyaṇīyam ahar brahmaṇa eva tad rahmākramante
GV02pncvbr1u:1331_0: (PB 11.4.10) kāleyaṃ bhavati samānaloke vai kāleyañ ca rathantarañ ceyaṃ vai rathantaraṃ paśavaḥ kāleyam asyāñ caiva paśuṣu
GV02pncvbr1u:1331_1: ca pratiṣṭhāya sattram āsate (PB 11.4.11) dravadiḍaṃ tathā hy etasyāhno rūpaṃ stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1332: (PB 11.5.1) pra somāso madacyuta iti gāyatrī bhavati madavad vai rasavṛt
GV02pncvbr1u:1333: tṛtīyasavanaṃ madam eva tad rasaṃ dadhāty ayā pasvasva devayur ity eti rathantarasya rūpaṃ rāthantaraṃ hy etad ahaḥ pavate 'har yato harir iti
GV02pncvbr1u:1334_0: bṛhato rūpaṃ bṛhad eva tad etasminn ahani yunakti tad yuktaṃ śva ārabhante pra sunvānāyāndhasa iti pravatyo bhavanti praṇinīṇyam
GV02pncvbr1u:1334_1: iva hy etad ahar abhi priyāṇi pavate ca nohita ity abhīti rathantarasya rūpaṃ rāthantaraṃ hy etad ahaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1335: (PB 11.5.2) yajñā yajñā vo agnaya ity agner vai yajño yajña eva tad yajñaṃ

GV02pncvbr1u:1338_1: saphena vai devā imān lokān samāpnuvvan yat samāpnuvaṃs tat
GV02pncvbr1u:1339_0: saphasya saphatvam imān evaitena lokān samāpya sattram āsate (PB 11.5.7) ākṣāraṃ bhavati (PB 11.5.8) aṣṭau vā etāḥ kādughā

GV02pncvbr1u:1340: (PB 11.5.9) tāsu devāsurā aspardhanta te devā asurān kāmadughābhya ākṣāreṇānudanta nudate bhrātṛvyaṃ kāmadughābhya ākṣāreṇa tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1341_0: (PB 11.5.10) ebhyo vai lokebhyo raso 'pākrāmat taṃ prajāpatir ākṣāreṇākṣārayad yad ākṣārayat tad ākṣārasyākṣāratvam (PB 11.5.11)

GV02pncvbr1u:1344_0: (PB 11.5.13) gaurīvitaṃ bhavati (PB 11.5.14) gaurīvitir vā etac chāktyo brāhmaṇo 'tiriktam apaśyat tad gaurīvitam abhavat

GV02pncvbr1u:1345: (PB 11.5.16) vṛṣā vā etad vājisāma vṛṣabho retodhā adya stuvanti śvaḥ

GV02pncvbr1u:1349: (PB 11.5.18) prajāyate bahur bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1350: (PB 11.5.19) dvyudāsaṃ bhavaty etau vā udāsau svargasya
GV02pncvbr1u:1351_0: lokasyāvasānadarśau pūrveṇa pūrvam ahaḥ saṃsthāpayanty uttareṇottaram ahar abhyativadanti (PB 11.5.20) tad yathādaḥ pūrvedyuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1351_1: spaṣṭaṃ tṛṇodakam anvavasyanto yanty evam eva tābhyāṃ svargaṃ lokam anvavasyanto yanti (PB 11.5.21) gautamaṃ bhavati (PB
GV02pncvbr1u:1351_2: 11.5.22) sāmārṣeyavat svargāya yujyate svargāl lokān na cyavate tuṣṭuvānaḥ (PB 11.5.23) yad u caivānuṣtṭubhasya madhye nidhanasya
GV02pncvbr1u:1352: (PB 11.5.24) kāvaṃ bhavati (PB 11.5.25) lokabinduḥ sāma vindate lokaṃ kāvena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1353_0: (PB 11.5.26) svārasu svareṇa svareṇa hi devebhyo 'ntato 'nnādyaṃ pradīyate svareṇaiva tad devebhyo 'ntato 'nnādyaṃ pra yacchati
GV02pncvbr1u:1353_1: (PB 11.5.27) yajñāyajñīyaṃ bhavati (PB 11.5.28) vāg yajñāyajñīyaṃ vāci yajñaḥ pratiṣṭhito vācy eva tad yajñam
GV02pncvbr1u:1354: antataḥ pratiṣṭhāpayanti taṃ vāco 'dhi śva ārabhante (PB 11.5.29) trivṛd eva stomo bhavati tejase brahmavarcasāya
GV02pncvbr1u:1355_0: (PB 11.6.1) pratipad bhavati (PB 11.6.2) samārabhate dvirātrasyāvrisraṃsāya (PB 11.6.3) pavasvendo vṛṣāsuta ity anurūpyo
GV02pncvbr1u:1355_1: bhavati vṛṣāvad vā eta aindraṃ traiṣṭubham ahar yat dvitīyaṃ tad eva tad abhivadati
GV02pncvbr1u:1356: (PB 11.6.4) pūrvam u tad rūpam apareṇa rūpeṇānuvadati yat pūrvaṃ rūpam
GV02pncvbr1u:1358: (PB 11.6.5) anurūpa enaṃ putro jāyate ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:1359: (PB 11.6.6) stotrīyānurūpau tṛcau bhavataḥ prāṇāpānānām avarudhyai (PB 11.6.7) vṛṣaṇvantas tṛcā bhavatīndriyasya vīryasyāvarudhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1361: (PB 11.6.9) yenaiva prāṇena prayanti tam abhyudyanti (PB 11.6.10) pañdadaśa eva stomo bhavati

GV02pncvbr1u:1363: (PB 11.7.1) ubhābhyāṃ vai rūpābhyāṃ bahiṣpavamānyo yujyante yatsāmā stomo bhavati tad ājyeṣu
GV02pncvbr1u:1365: (PB 11.7.3) agniṃ dūtaṃ vṛṇīmahe mitraṃ vayaṃ havāmaha indram id gāthino
GV02pncvbr1u:1366: bṛhad indro agnā namo bṛhad iti bārhatam eva tad rūpaṃ nirdyotayati stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1367: (PB 11.8.1) vṛṣā pavasva dhārayeti gāyatrī bhavaty ahno dhṛtyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1368: (PB 11.8.2) vṛṣaṇvatyas triṣṭubho rūpeṇa traiṣṭubhaṃ hy etad ahaḥ

GV02pncvbr1u:1370_1: ahar yat dvitīyaṃ tad eva tad abhivadati (PB 11.8.6) gāyatraṃ bhavati yad eva gāyatrasya brāhmaṇam
GV02pncvbr1u:1371: (PB 11.8.7) yauktāśvaṃ bhavati (PB 11.8.8) yuktāśvo va āṅgirasaḥ śiśū jātau viparyaharat tasmān mantro 'pākrāmat sa tapo 'tapyata sa etad yauktāśvam apaśyat taṃ mantra
GV02pncvbr1u:1372_0: upāvartata tad vāva sa tarhy akāmayata kāmasani sama yauktāśvaṃ kāmam evaitenāvarundhe (PB 11.8.9) āyāsye bhavataḥ (PB 11.8.10)
GV02pncvbr1u:1372_1: ayāsyo vā āṅgirasa ādityānāṃ dīkṣitānām annādyam āśnāt taṃ śug ārcchat sa tapo 'tapyata sa ete āyāsye apaśyat tābhyāṃ śucam

GV02pncvbr1u:1372_3: cyāvayati vṛṣṭim āyāsyābhyāṃ tuṣṭuvānaḥ (PB 11.8.12) annādyaṃ vāva tad ebhyo lokebhyo 'pākrāmat tad ayāsya āyāsyābhyām acyāvayat
GV02pncvbr1u:1373: (PB 11.8.13) vāsiṣṭhaṃ bhavati (PB 11.8.14) vasiṣṭho vā etena vaiḍavaḥ stutvāñjasā svargaṃ lokam apaśyat svargasya lokasyānukhyātyai svargāl lokān na cyavate tuṣṭuvānaḥ stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1374: (PB 11.9.1) tvām id dhi havāmaha iti tvam iti bṛhato rūpaṃ bārhataṃ hy etad ahaḥ (PB 11.9.2) abhipravaḥ surādhasam iti yuñjate vai pūrveṇāhnā hy etena prayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:1375: (PB 11.9.3) tvām idā hyo nara ity adya caiva hyaś ca samārabhate dvirātrasyāvisraṃsāya (PB 11.9.4) bṛhad bhavati varṣma vai bṛhad varṣma dvitīyam ahar varṣmaṇa
GV02pncvbr1u:1377: (PB 11.9.5) śyetaṃ bhavati sāmnorvāho yajñasya santatyai (PB 11.9.6) mādhucchandasaṃ bhavati sāmārṣeyavat svargāya yujyate svargāl
GV02pncvbr1u:1379: (PB 11.9.7) ūrdhveḍaṃ tathā hy etasyāhno rūpaṃ stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1380: (PB 11.10.1) yas te mado vareṇya iti gāyatrī bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:1381: (PB 11.10.2) madavad vai rasavat tṛtīyasavanaṃ madam eva tad rasaṃ dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:1382: (PB 11.10.3) pavasva madhumattama iti pavanta iva hy etenāhnā madhumattama ity annaṃ vai madhv annādyam eva tad yajamāne dadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:1383: (PB 11.10.4) indram accha sutā ima itīndriyasya vīryasyāvarudhyai
GV02pncvbr1u:1384_0: (PB 11.10.5) ayaṃ pūṣā rayir bhaga iti (PB 11.10.6) anuṣṭubhaḥ satyas triṣṭubho rūpeṇa traiṣṭubhaṃ hy etad ahaḥ (PB 11.10.7)
GV02pncvbr1u:1384_1: vṛṣāmatīnāṃ pavate vicakṣaṇa iti jagatyaḥ satyas triṣṭubho rūpeṇa traiṣṭubhaṃ hy etad ahaḥ

GV02pncvbr1u:1386: (PB 11.10.9) hāviṣmataṃ bhavati (PB 11.10.10) haviṣmāṃś ca vai haviṣkṛc cāṅgirasāv āstāṃ dvitīye 'hani
GV02pncvbr1u:1388_0: (PB 11.10.11) ayaṃ haviṣmān ity eva jātam ahar jātaṃ somaṃ prāha devebhyaḥ sāmnaivāsmā āśiṣam āśāste sāma hi saty āśīḥ (PB
GV02pncvbr1u:1388_1: 11.10.12) śaṅku bhavaty ahno dhṛtyai yad vā adhṛtaṃ śaṅkunā tad
GV02pncvbr1u:1390: (PB 11.10.13) tad u sīdantīyam iy āhur etena vai prajāpatir ūrdhva imān lokān asīdad yad asīdat tat sīdantīyasya sīdantīyatvam ūrdhva imān lokān sīdati sīdantīyena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1391: (PB 11.10.14) sujñānaṃ bhavati (PB 11.10.15) svarvad vai rāthantaraṃ rūpaṃ svarṇadhanaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:1392: (PB 11.10.16) svarṇadhanaṃ bhavati tathā hy etasyāhno rūpam

GV02pncvbr1u:1396: (PB 11.10.21) yāmaṃ bhavati (PB 11.10.22) etena vai yamo 'napajayyam amuṣya lokasyādhipatyam āśnutānapajayyam amuṣya lokasyādhipatyam aśnute yāmena tuṣṭuvānaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1397: (PB 11.10.23) etena vai yamī yamaṃ svargaṃ lokam agamayat svargasya lokasyānukhyātyai svargāl lokān na cyavate tuṣṭuvānaḥ stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:1398: (PB 11.11.1) ehy ū ṣu bravāṇi ta ity ehivatyai bhavanti tṛtīyasyāhna
GV02pncvbr1u:1399: upahavāya santatyai (PB 11.11.2) apacchid iva vā etad yajñakāṇḍaṃ yad ukthāni yad eti
GV02pncvbr1u:1401: (PB 11.11.3) evāhy asi vīrayur iti samānaṃ vadantīdam ittham asad iti
GV02pncvbr1u:1402: (PB 11.11.4) indraṃ viśvā avīvṛdhann ity avardhanta hy etarhi yajamānam evaitayā vardhanti (PB 11.11.5) sākam aśvaṃ bhavaty ukthānām abhijityā abhikrāntyai

GV02pncvbr1u:1404: (PB 11.11.7) āmahīyavaṃ bhavati kḷptiś cānnādyañ ca samānaṃ vadantīṣu kriyata idam ittham asad iti
GV02pncvbr1u:1405_0: (PB 11.11.8) kṣatraṃ vā etad ahar abhinirvadati yat pañcadaśaṃ yad gāyatrīṣu brahmasāma bhavati brahma caiva tat kṣatrañ

GV02pncvbr1u:1407: (PB 11.11.11) āṣṭādaṃṣṭre bhavataḥ (PB 11.11.12) aiyāhā iti vā indro vṛtram ahann aiyādohoveti nyagṛhṇād vārtraghne sāmanī vīryavatī

GV02pncvbr1u:1410_0: (PB 12.1.1) davidyutaty āruceti tṛtīyasyāhnaḥ pratipad bhavati (PB 12.1.2) davidyutatī vai gāyatrī pariṣṭobhantī triṣṭub
GV02pncvbr1u:1410_1: gavāśīr jagatī trīṇi rūpāṇi samārabhate trirātrasyāvisraṃsāya (PB 12.1.3) ete asṛgram indava ity anurūpo bhavati

GV02pncvbr1u:1416: (PB 12.1.8) antarikṣadevatyas tṛco bhavaty antarikṣadevatyam etad ahar yat tṛtīyaṃ tad eva tad abhivadati

GV02pncvbr1u:2335_1: adīkṣitā dīkṣitavācaṃ vadanti ṣoḍaśo vā eteṣāṃ stomaḥ pāpmānaṃ nirhantum arhati yad ete catvāraḥ ṣoḍaśā bhavanti tena pāpmano
GV02pncvbr1u:2336: (PB 17.1.10) ''devo vo draviṇodā'' ity agniṣṭomasāma kāryaṃ devatāsv evainān pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2337: (PB 17.1.11) atho khalv āhuḥ ''adarśi gātuvittama'' ity eva satobṛhatīṣu
GV02pncvbr1u:2338: kāryaṃ viṣama iva vai vrātaḥ sarvān evainān satobṛhataḥ karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:2339: (PB 17.1.12) tad āhuḥ śithilam iva vā etat chandaś carācaraṃ yat
GV02pncvbr1u:2340: satobṛhatī ''devo vo draviṇodā '' ity eva kāryam
GV02pncvbr1u:2341: (PB 17.1.13) eṣā vai pratiṣṭhitā bṛhatī yā punaḥpadā tad yat padaṃ punar ārabhate tasmāt putro mātaram adhyeti
GV02pncvbr1u:2342: (PB 17.1.14) uṣṇīṣaṃ ca pratodaś ca jyāhṇoḍaś ca vipathaś ca phalakāstīrṇaḥ kṛṣṇaśaṃ vāsaḥ kṛṣṇavalakṣe ajine rajato niṣkas tad gṛhapateḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2343: (PB 17.1.15) valūkāntāni dāmatūṣāṇītareṣāṃ dve dve dāmanī dve dve upānahau dviṣaṃhitāny ajināni (PB 17.1.16) etad vai vrātyadhanaṃ yasmā etad dadati tasminn eva mṛjānā
GV02pncvbr1u:2345: (PB 17.1.17) trayastriṃśatā trayastriṃśatā gṛhapatim abhisamāyanti trayastriṃśad dhi devā ārdhnuvan ṛdhyā eva
GV02pncvbr1u:2346: (PB 17.2.1) athaiṣa ṣaṭṣoḍaśī ye nṛśaṃsā ninditāḥ santo vrātyāṃ pravaseyus ta etena yajeran
GV02pncvbr1u:2347: (PB 17.2.2) abhipūrveṇa vā ete pāpmanā gṛhītā ye nṛśaṃsā ninditāḥ santo
GV02pncvbr1u:2348: vrātyāṃ pravasanti yat ṣaṭṣoḍaśāni stotrāṇi bhavanti tena pāpmāno 'dhi
GV02pncvbr1u:2350: (PB 17.2.3) yad ekaviṃśo 'gniṣṭomo bhavati pratiṣṭhāyā ekaviṃśo madhyata eva yajñasya pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:2351: (PB 17.2.4) uktho bhavati paśavo vā ukthāni paśavo nṛśaṃsam agryaṃ pariṇayanti paśubhir evainān agryaṃ pariṇayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2352_0: (PB 17.3.1) athaiṣa dviṣoḍaśo ye kaniṣṭhāḥ santo vrātyāṃ pravaseyus ta etena yajeran (PB 17.3.2) hīnā vā ete ahīyante ye
GV02pncvbr1u:2352_1: kaniṣṭhāḥ santo vrātyāṃ pravasanti yat trivṛtaḥ pavamānā bhavanti mukhaṃ vai trivṛt stomānāṃ mukhata evainān yajñasya pariṇayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2353: (PB 17.3.3) yad vai ṣoḍaśe stotre bhavatas tena pāpmano 'dhi nirmucyante
GV02pncvbr1u:2354: (PB 17.3.4) ekaviṃśo 'gniṣṭomo bhavati pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśo 'ntata eva yajñasya pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:2355: (PB 17.4.1) athaiṣa śamanīcāmeḍhrāṇāṃ stomo ye jyeṣṭhāḥ santo vrātyāṃ pravaseyus ta etena yajeran (PB 17.4.2) agrād agraṃ rohanty ūrdhvāḥ stomā yanty anapabhraṃśāya
GV02pncvbr1u:2356: (PB 17.4.3) etena vai śamanīcāmeḍhrā ayajanta teṣāṃ kuṣītakaḥ sāmaśravaso gṛhapatir āsīt tān luśākapiḥ khārgalir anuvyāharad avākīrṣata kanīyāṃsau
GV02pncvbr1u:2357: stomāv upāgur iti tasmāt kauṣītakānāṃ na kaś canātīva jihīte yajñāva kīrṇā hi
GV02pncvbr1u:2358: (PB 17.5.1) indro vai triśirasaṃ tvāṣṭram ahaṃs tam aślīlā vāg abhyavadat
GV02pncvbr1u:2359: so 'gnim upādhāvat sa etad agnistotram apaśyat tad ātmany adhividhāya tenainam ayājayat tenāsyāślīlāṃ vācam apāhan (PB 17.5.2) apāślīlāṃ vācaṃ hate ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2360_0: (PB 17.5.3) yo 'pūta iva syād agniṣṭutā yajetāgninaivāsya pāpmānam apahatya trivṛtā tejo brahmavarcasaṃ dadhāti (PB 17.5.4)
GV02pncvbr1u:2360_1: tad āhur yat trivṛd bhavaty ekasmād evāṅgāt pāpmānam apahanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2362_0: (PB 17.5.6) yat trivṛd bhavati yad evāsya mukhato 'pūtaṃ tat tenāpahanti yat pañcadaśo yad evāsyorasto bāhvor apūtaṃ tat
GV02pncvbr1u:2362_1: tenāpahanti yat saptadaśo yad evāsya madhyato 'pūtaṃ tat tenāpahanti yad ekaviṃśo yad evāsya pador aṣṭhīvator apūtaṃ tat
GV02pncvbr1u:2362_2: tenāpahanti (PB 17.5.7) vaiśvānaraṃ vā eṣa praviśatīty āhur yo 'gniṣṭutā yajata iti vāravantīyam agniṣṭomasāma kāryaṃ tasya
GV02pncvbr1u:2364: (PB 17.6.1) trivṛd agniṣṭud agniṣṭomas tasya vāyavyāsv agniṣṭomasāma
GV02pncvbr1u:2365_0: (PB 17.6.2) brahmavarcasakāmo yajeta (PB 17.6.3) tejo vai trivṛd brahmavarcasaṃ yad vāyavyāsv agniṣṭomasāma bhavaty upaivainaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2365_1: tad dhamati (PB 17.6.4) yathā hiraṇyaṃ niṣṭaped evam enam agniṣṭun niṣṭapati
GV02pncvbr1u:2366: (PB 17.7.1) etasyaiva revatīṣu vāravantīyam agniṣṭomasāma kṛtvā paśukāmo
GV02pncvbr1u:2368: (PB 17.7.2) jaratkakṣo vā eṣa yo 'paśur yathā vai jaratkakṣe paśavo na ramanta evam etasmin paśavo na ramante yo 'paśur yadā vai jaratkakṣam
GV02pncvbr1u:2369: agnir dahaty athainam abhivarṣaty athāsminn oṣadhayo jāyante 'tha vai tasmin paśavo ramante
GV02pncvbr1u:2371: (PB 17.7.4) yad evāsyāpaśavyaṃ tad agniṣṭun nirdahati yad agniṣṭun nirdahati tad adbhī revatībhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2374_0: (PB 17.8.3) agnir vā etasya havyam atti yo yajñe vibhraṃśate na devatā havyaṃ gamayaty agnim evaikadhardhnoti (PB 17.8.4)
GV02pncvbr1u:2374_1: yad vai saṃśīryate 'thānyan niṣkurvanti tena tad yāti yadā vāva tan niṣkurvanty atha tad yāti yeṣv eva stomeṣu vibhraṃśate
GV02pncvbr1u:2374_2: yasmin yajñakratau tair eva yajeta yeṣv eva stomeṣu vibhraṃśate yasmin
GV02pncvbr1u:2376: (PB 17.9.1) saptadaśenāgniṣṭutānnādyakāmo yajeta (PB 17.9.2) annaṃ vai saptadaśo 'gnir annādyasya pradātāgnir evāsmā
GV02pncvbr1u:2377: annādyaṃ prayacchati (PB 17.9.3) annādo bhavati ya evaṃ veda (PB 17.9.4) sarvaḥ saptadaśo bhavati prajāpatir vai saptadaśaḥ prajāpatim evāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:2379: (PB 17.10.2) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata tā asmāt sṛṣṭā apākrāman sa etad
GV02pncvbr1u:2380: aniruktaṃ prātaḥsavanam apaśyat tenāsāṃ madhyaṃ vyavait tā enam upāvartanta pary enam āviśan
GV02pncvbr1u:2381: (PB 17.10.3) grāmakāmo yajeta yad etad aniktaṃ prātaḥsavanaṃ bhavati madhyam evāsāṃ vyavaity upainam āvartante pary enaṃ viśanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2382: (PB 17.10.4) sa eṣa prajāpater apūrvo nāsmāt pūrvo bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2383_0: (PB 17.11.1) trivṛd agniṣṭomaḥ (PB 17.11.2) tasya prātaḥsavane sanneṣu nārāśaṃseṣv ekādaśadakṣiṇā vyādiśaty aśvadvādaśā madhyandine
GV02pncvbr1u:2383_1: tā ubhayīr apākaroty ekādaśa tṛtīyasavane tā vaśāyām apākaroti (PB 17.11.3) trayastriṃśad etā dakṣiṇā bhavanti trayastriṃśad
GV02pncvbr1u:2384: devatā evāpnoty aśvaś catustriṃśo dakṣiṇānāṃ prajāpatiś catustriṃśo devatānāṃ prajāpatim evāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:2385: (PB 17.11.4) sa eṣa bṛhaspatisavo bṛhaspatir akāmayata devānāṃ purodhāṃ gaccheyam iti sa etenāyajata sa devānāṃ purodhām agacchat
GV02pncvbr1u:2386_0: (PB 17.11.5) gacchati purodhāṃ ya evaṃ veda (PB 17.11.6) sa eṣa sthapatisavo yaṃ sthāpatyāyābhiṣiñceran sa etena yajeta (PB
GV02pncvbr1u:2386_1: 17.11.7) gacchati sthāpatyaṃ ya evaṃ veda (PB 17.11.8) kṛṣṇājine 'dhy abhiṣicyata etad vai pratyakṣaṃ brahmavarcasaṃ brahmavarcasa
GV02pncvbr1u:2387: (PB 17.11.9) ājyenābhiṣicyate teja ājyaṃ teja ātman dhatte
GV02pncvbr1u:2388: (PB 17.12.1) trivṛd agniṣṭomaḥ sa sarvasvāro yaḥ kāmayetānāmayatāmuṃ lokam iyām iti sa etena
GV02pncvbr1u:2389: (PB 17.12.2) prāṇo vai trivṛt prāṇaḥ svaraḥ prāṇān evāsya bahir ṇirādadhāti tājak pramīyate
GV02pncvbr1u:2390_0: (PB 17.12.3) trivṛd vai stomānāṃ kṣepiṣṭho yat trivṛd bhavaty āśīyaḥ saṃgacchātā ity ananto vai svaro 'nanto 'sau loko 'nantam
GV02pncvbr1u:2390_1: evainaṃ svargaṃ lokaṃ gamayati (PB 17.12.4) abhivatyaḥ pravatyo bhavanty asmād evainaṃ lokāt svargaṃ lokaṃ gamayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2391: (PB 17.12.5) ārbhavapavamāne stūyamāna audumbaryā dakṣiṇā prāvṛto nipadyate tad eva saṃgacchate
GV02pncvbr1u:2392: (PB 17.12.6) sa eṣa śunaskarṇastoma etena vai śunaskarṇo bāṣkiho 'yajata
GV02pncvbr1u:2395: (PB 17.13.2) āgneyī pratipad vaiśvadevaḥ paśur bārhaspatyānubandhyā (PB 17.13.3) na yūpaṃ minvanti nottaravediṃ nivapanti (PB 17.13.4) paridhau paśuṃ niyuñjanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2396: (PB 17.13.5) pañcāśad dakṣiṇā (PB 17.13.6) ahataṃ vasāno 'vabhṛthād udeti caturo māso na māṃsam aśnāti
GV02pncvbr1u:2398: (PB 17.13.7) tataś caturṣu māseṣu varuṇapraghāsānāṃ loke dvidivaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2401: (PB 17.13.10) maitrāvaruṇy anūbandhyā minvanti yūpaṃ ny uttaravediṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2403: (PB 17.13.11) śataṃ dakṣiṇā ahataṃ vasāno 'vabhṛthād udeti caturo māso na māṃsam aśnāti na striyam upaiti
GV02pncvbr1u:2404: (PB 17.13.12) tataś caturṣu māseṣu sākamedhānāṃ loke trirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2405_0: (PB 17.13.13) anīkavatī pratipad āgneyaḥ paśur mārutī pratipad aindrāgnaḥ paśur vaiśvakarmaṇī pratipad ekādaśinī paśavaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2405_1: sauryānūbandhyā minvanti yūpaṃ ny uttaravediṃ vapanti yūpe paśūn niyuñjanti pañcāśacchataṃ dakṣiṇā
GV02pncvbr1u:2406: (PB 17.13.14) ahataṃ vasāno 'vabhṛthād udeti caturo māso na māṃsam aśnāti
GV02pncvbr1u:2408: (PB 17.13.15) tataś caturṣu māseṣu śunāsīryasya loke jyotiṣṭomo 'gniṣṭomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2409_0: (PB 17.13.16) upavatī pratipad vāyavyaḥ paśur āśviny anūbandhyā minvanti yūpaṃ ny uttaravediṃ vapanti yūpe paśuṃ niyuñjanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2409_1: dvādaśaṃ śataṃ dakṣiṇā (PB 17.13.17) agniḥ saṃvatsaraḥ sūryaḥ parivatsaraś candramā idāvatsaro
GV02pncvbr1u:2410_0: vāyur anuvatsaro 'gniṃ saṃvatsaraṃ vaiśvadevenāpnoti sūryaṃ parivatsaraṃ varuṇapraghāsaiś candramasam idāvatsaraṃ sākamedhair
GV02pncvbr1u:2410_1: vāyum anuvatsaraṃ śunāsīryeṇa (PB 17.13.18) haviryajñair vai devā imaṃ lokam abhyajayann antarikṣaṃ paśumadbhiḥ somair amum
GV02pncvbr1u:2410_2: imān eva lokān āpnoty eṣu lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhati ya
GV02pncvbr1u:2411: evaṃ veda (PB 17.14.1) yadāgnihotraṃ juhoty atha daśa gṛhamedhina āpnoty ekayā
GV02pncvbr1u:2412: rātryā, yadā daśa saṃvatsarān agnihotraṃ juhoty atha darśapūrṇamāsayājinam
GV02pncvbr1u:2413: āpnoti, yadā daśa saṃvatsarān darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajate 'thāgniṣṭomayājinam āpnoti, yadā daśabhir agniṣṭomair yajate 'tha
GV02pncvbr1u:2414: sahasrayājinam āpnoti, yadā daśabhiḥ sahasrair yajate 'thāyutayājinam
GV02pncvbr1u:2415_0: āpnoti, yadā daśabhir ayutair yajate 'tha prayutayājinam āpnoti, yadā daśabhiḥ prayutair yajate 'tha niyutayājinam āpnoti,
GV02pncvbr1u:2415_1: yadā daśabhir niyutair yajate 'thārbudayājinam āpnoti, yadā daśabhir arbudair yajate
GV02pncvbr1u:2416: 'tha nyarbudayājinam āpnoti, yadā daśabhir nyarbudair yajate 'tha
GV02pncvbr1u:2417: nikharvakayājinam āpnoti, yadā daśabhir nikharvakair yajate 'tha
GV02pncvbr1u:2418: badvayājinam āpnoti, yadā daśabhir badvair yajate 'thākṣitayājinam āpnoti yadā daśabhir akṣitair yajate 'tha gaur bhavati, yadā gaur bhavaty
GV02pncvbr1u:2419: athāgnir bhavati yadāgnir bhavaty atha saṃvatsarasya gṛhapatim āpnoti (PB 17.14.2) yadā saṃvatsarasya gṛhapatir bhavaty atha vaiśvadevasya
GV02pncvbr1u:2420: mātrām āpnoty ato vā itare parastarāṃ parastarām eva sarve
GV02pncvbr1u:2421: (PB 17.14.3) etān eva lokān āpnoty etān lokān jayati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2423: (PB 18.1.2) devāś ca vā asurāś ca prajāpater dvayāḥ putrā āsaṃs te 'surā
GV02pncvbr1u:2424: bhūyāṃso balīyāṃsa āsan kanīyāṃso devās te devāḥ prajāpatim upādhāvan sa etam upahavyam apaśyat
GV02pncvbr1u:2425: (PB 18.1.3) sa aikṣata yan niruktam āhariṣyāmy asurā me yajñaṃ haniṣyantīti so 'niruktam
GV02pncvbr1u:2426: (PB 18.1.4) sa uttame stotre ''devo vo draviṇodā'' iti devān abhiparyāvartata
GV02pncvbr1u:2428: (PB 18.1.6) bhavaty ātmanā parāsya bhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda (PB 18.1.7) atho khalv āhuḥ ''yajñāyajñā vo agnaya'' ity eva kāryam
GV02pncvbr1u:2429: (PB 18.1.8) agnir vai sarvā devatās tena na devatānāṃ kāṃ canāntar eti
GV02pncvbr1u:2430: (PB 18.1.9) indro yatīn sālāvṛkeyebhyaḥ prāyacchat tam aślīlā vāg abhyavadat sa prajāpatim upādhāvat tasmā etam upahavyaṃ prāyacchat taṃ viśve devā upāhvayanta tasmād upahavyaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2431_0: (PB 18.1.10) abhiśasyamānaṃ yājayet (PB 18.1.11) devatā vā etaṃ parivrajanti yam anṛtam abhiśaṃsanti devatā evāsyānnam ādayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2431_1: (PB 18.1.12) tasya pūtasya svaditasya manuṣyā annam adanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2432: (PB 18.1.13) grāmakāmo yajeta (PB 18.1.14) mārutī bhavati marutau vai devānāṃ viśo viśam evāsmā anuniyunakty anapakrāmukāsmād viḍ bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:2434: (PB 18.1.16) paśavo vai pūṣā paśūn evāvarundhe (PB 18.1.17) vaiśvadevī bhavati viśve hy enaṃ devā upāhvayanta
GV02pncvbr1u:2435: (PB 18.1.18) bṛhatsāmā bhavati (PB 18.1.19) prajāpatir hy enam indrāya prāyacchat (PB 18.1.20) aśvaḥ śyavo dakṣiṇā
GV02pncvbr1u:2438: (PB 18.1.23) brahmā vā ṛtvijām aniruktaḥ svenaivainaṃ tad rūpeṇa samardhayati (PB 18.1.24) yāvad dha vai kumāre sadyo jāta eno nāsmiṃs tāvac ca naino bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2441: (PB 18.2.3) svargakāmo yajeta (PB 18.2.4) dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaraḥ svargo lokaḥ svargam evaitena lokam āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:2442: (PB 18.2.5) ghṛtavrato bhavati (PB 18.2.6) devavrataṃ vai ghṛtaṃ devavratenaiva devatā
GV02pncvbr1u:2443: (PB 18.2.7) uttareṇottareṇa kāṇḍenopaity uttara uttara eṣāṃ lokānāṃ jyāyān svargasya samaṣṭyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2444: (PB 18.2.8) bṛhatsāma bhavati bṛhatā vai devāḥ svargaṃ lokam āyan svargam
GV02pncvbr1u:2446: (PB 18.2.9) ṛtam uktvā prasarpanty ṛtenaivainaṃ svargaṃ lokaṃ gamayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2447: (PB 18.2.10) somacamaso dakṣiṇā devatayaiva devatā apyeti (PB 18.2.11) audumbaro bhavaty ūrg udumbara ūrjam evāvarundhe

GV02pncvbr1u:2668_2: svārājyaṃ svārājyaṃ gacchati ya evaṃ veda (PB 19.13.6) ayutaṃ dakṣiṇās tad dhi svārājyaṃ svārājyaṃ gacchati ya evaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2670: (PB 19.13.7) pratiduhābhiṣicyate tad dhi svārājyaṃ svārājyaṃ gacchati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2671: (PB 19.13.8) bṛhataḥ stotra pratyabhiṣicyate tad dhi svārājyaṃ svārājyaṃ gacchati ya evaṃ veda (PB 19.13.9) anuddhate dakṣiṇata āhavanīyasyābhiṣicyate 'syām
GV02pncvbr1u:2674_0: (PB 19.14.1) athaiṣa marutstoma etena vai maruto 'parimitāṃ puṣṭim apuṣyann aparimitāṃ puṣṭiṃ puṣyati ya evaṃ veda (PB 19.14.2)
GV02pncvbr1u:2674_1: yad gaṇaśaḥ stomās tena marutstomo gaṇaśo hi marutaḥ (PB 19.14.3) etenaiva trīn yājayet
GV02pncvbr1u:2675_0: (PB 19.14.4) yat trīṇi trivṛnti stotrāṇi bhavanti nānā brahmavarcase pratitiṣṭhanti (PB 19.14.5) yat trīṇi pañcadaśāni nānā
GV02pncvbr1u:2675_1: vīrye (PB 19.14.6) yat trīṇi saptadaśāni nānā paśuṣu (PB 19.14.7) yat trīṇy ekaviṃśāni nānā pratitiṣṭhanti (PB 19.14.8) pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:2676: (PB 19.15.1) athaiṣa indrāgnyoḥ kulāyaḥ prajākāmo vā paśukāmo vā yajeta prajā vai kulāyaṃ paśavaḥ kulāyaṃ gṛhāḥ kulāyaṃ kulāyam eva bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:2678: (PB 19.15.3) yat ṣaṭ trivṛnti stotrāṇi bhavanti nānā brahmavarcase pratitiṣṭhato yat dve pañcadaśe nānā vīrye yat dve saptadaśe nānā paśuṣu
GV02pncvbr1u:2679: yat dve ekaviṃśe nānā pratitiṣṭhataḥ pratitiṣṭhati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2681: (PB 19.16.2) etena vā indro 'ty anyā devatā abhavad aty anyāḥ prajā
GV02pncvbr1u:2683: (PB 19.16.3) rājanyaṃ yājayet (PB 19.16.4) sarvaḥ pañcadaśo bhavaty ojo vīryaṃ pañcadaśa ojasaivainaṃ vīryeṇa samardhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2685: (PB 19.16.6) ukthyo bhavati paśavo vā ukthāni viḍ ukthāni viśam evāsmai
GV02pncvbr1u:2686: paśūn anuniyunakty anapakrāmukāsmād viḍ bhavati (PB 19.16.7) pañcadaśa stotrāṇi pañcadaśāni bhavanty ojo vīryaṃ pañcadaśo
GV02pncvbr1u:2688: (PB 19.17.1) athaiṣa indrāgnyoḥ stoma etena vā indrāgnī aty anyā devatā
GV02pncvbr1u:2689: abhavatām aty anyāḥ prajā bhavati ya evaṃ veda (PB 19.17.2) trivṛt pañcadaśo bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:2690: (PB 19.17.3) brahma vai trivṛt kṣatraṃ pañcadaśo brahmaṇa iva cāsya kṣatrasyeva ca prakāśo bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2691_0: (PB 19.17.4) rājā ca purohitaś ca yajeyātām (PB 19.17.5) gāyatrīṃ ca jagatīṃ ca saṃpadyate (PB 19.17.6) tejo brahmavarcasaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2691_1: gāyatryā brāhmaṇo 'varundhe viśaṃ rājā jagatyā praviśati (PB 19.17.7) purodhākāmo yajeta (PB 19.17.8) bṛhaspatir akāmayata
GV02pncvbr1u:2691_2: devānāṃ purodhāṃ gaccheyam iti sa etenāyajata sa devānāṃ purodhām agacchad gacchati purodhāṃ ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2692: (PB 19.18.1) athaiṣa vighanaḥ (PB 19.18.2) indro 'kāmayata pāpmānaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ vihanyām iti sa etaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2693: vighanam apaśyat tena pāpmānaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ vyahan vi pāpmānaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ hate ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2694_0: (PB 19.18.3) yat trivṛd bhavati prāṇāṃs tenāvarundhe yat dvādaśaḥ saṃvatsaraṃ tena yat pañcadaśo vīryaṃ tena yat saptadaśo
GV02pncvbr1u:2694_1: 'nnādyaṃ tena yad ekaviṃśaḥ pratiṣṭhā tena yan navadaśaḥ prajananaṃ tena yac caturviṃśo
GV02pncvbr1u:2695: brahmavarcasaṃ tena yat triṇavo vajraṃ bhrātṛvyāya praharati
GV02pncvbr1u:2696: (PB 19.18.4) paśukāmo yajeta bṛhatīṃ saṃpadyate paśavo vai bṛhatī paśūn evāvarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:2697: (PB 19.18.5) ṣaḍ etā bṛhatyo bhavanti ṣaḍ ṛtavaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaraṃ paśavo 'nu prajāyante tān evāptvāvarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:2698: (PB 19.19.1) indram adevyo māyā ayacanta sa prajāpatim upādhāvavat tasmā etaṃ vighanaṃ prāyacchat tena sarvā mṛdho vyahata yad vyahata tad vighanasya vighanatvam
GV02pncvbr1u:2699: (PB 19.19.2) sarvā mṛdho vihate ya evaṃ vidvān vighanena yajate yam evaṃ vidvān vighanena
GV02pncvbr1u:2700: (PB 19.19.3) paśukāmo yajeta paśavo vai bṛhatī paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:2701: (PB 20.1.1) trivṛd bahiṣpavamānaṃ pañcadaśāny ājyāni pañcadaśo mādhyandinaḥ pavamānaḥ saptadaśāni pṛṣṭhāni saptadaśa ārbhava ekaviṃśo
GV02pncvbr1u:2702: 'gniṣṭomaḥ sokthyaḥ pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhiḥ (PB 20.1.2) jyotiṣṭomenātirātreṇarddhikāmo yajetābhikramo vā eṣa stomānām abhikrāntyā abhikrāntena hi yajñasyardhnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:2703_0: (PB 20.1.3) eṣo 'gniṣṭoma eṣa ukthya eṣo 'tirātro 'gniṣṭomena vai devā imaṃ lokam abhyajayann ukthyair antarikṣaṃ rātryāmuṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2703_1: lokam ajayann ahorātrābhyām abhyavartanta (PB 20.1.4) parācyo vā anyā vyucchanti pratīcyo 'nyā eṣā vāva pratīcī
GV02pncvbr1u:2704: vyucchati yāśvinena vyucchati pratīcīr evāsmā uṣaso vivāsayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2705: (PB 20.1.5) dve saṃstutānāṃ virājam atiricyete eṣā vai stanavatī virāṭ yaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2706: kāmaṃ kāmayate tam etāṃ dugdhe (PB 20.1.6) trivṛtā praiti trivṛtodeti prāṇo vai trivṛt prāṇenaiva praiti prāṇam abhyudeti
GV02pncvbr1u:2707: (PB 20.2.1) trivṛd bahiṣpavamānaṃ pañcadaśāny ājyāni saptadaśo mādhyandinaḥ pavamāna ekaviṃśāni pṛṣṭhāni triṇava ārbhavas trayastriṃśo
GV02pncvbr1u:2708: 'gniṣṭomaḥ pratyavarohīṇy ukthāni triṇavaṃ prathamaṃ dve ekaviṃśe
GV02pncvbr1u:2709_0: saṣoḍaśike pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhiḥ (PB 20.2.2) sarvastomenātirātreṇa bubhūṣan yajeta sarvasyāptyai sarvasya jityai
GV02pncvbr1u:2709_1: sarvam evaitenāpnoti sarvaṃ jayati (PB 20.2.3) yat trivṛd bahiṣpavamānaṃ bhavati tat trivṛtaṃ stomam āpnoti gāyatrīṃ chando
GV02pncvbr1u:2709_2: yat pañcadaśāny ājyāni tat pañcadaśaṃ stomam āpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:2710_0: triṣṭubhaṃ chando yat saptadaśo mādhyandinaḥ pavamānas tat saptadaśaṃ stomam āpnoti jagatīṃ chando yad ekaviṃśāni pṛṣṭāni
GV02pncvbr1u:2710_1: tad ekaviṃśaṃ stomam āpnoty anuṣṭubhaṃ chando yat triṇava ārbhavas tat triṇavaṃ stomam āpnoti paṅktiṃ chando yat trayastriṃśo
GV02pncvbr1u:2710_2: 'gniṣṭomas tat trayastriṃśaṃ stomam āpnoti virājaṃ chando yad uṣṇikkakubhau kriyete tad uṣṇikkakubhāv āpnoti yad āśvinaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2710_3: śasyate tat sarvam evaitenāpnoti sarvaṃ jayati (PB 20.2.4) prāñcaṃ vai trayastriṃśo yajñaṃ prabhujati tam adhvaryur ekādaśinyā
GV02pncvbr1u:2710_4: purastāt pratyudyacchaty ekādaśa raśanā ekādaśa paśava ekādaśa
GV02pncvbr1u:2711: yūpā bhavanti tat trayastriṃśe trayastriṃśaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2712: (PB 20.2.5) tayā samudyatayā rātryā yaṃ yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate taṃ tam
GV02pncvbr1u:2713: abhyaśnute yaṃ yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate taṃ tam abhyaśnute ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2714_0: (PB 20.3.1) trivṛd bahiṣpavamānaṃ pañcadaśāny ājyāni saptadaśo mādhyandinaḥ pavamāna ekaviṃśaṃ hotuḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ chandomā itarāṇi
GV02pncvbr1u:2714_1: triṇava ārbhavas trayastriṃśo 'gniṣṭomaḥ pratyavarohīṇy ukthāni triṇavaṃ prathamam athaikaviṃśam atha saptadaśam ekaviṃśaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2715: sandhis trivṛt prathamam atiriktastotram atha pañcadaśam atha saptadaśam athaikaviṃśam
GV02pncvbr1u:2716: (PB 20.3.2) prajāpatiḥ paśūn asṛjata te 'smāt sṛṣṭā apākrāmaṃs tān
GV02pncvbr1u:2717_0: agniṣṭomena nāpnot tān ukthair nāpnot tān ṣoḍaśinā nāpnot tān rātryā nāpnot tān sandhinā nāpnot tān āśvinena nāpnot tān agnim
GV02pncvbr1u:2717_1: abravīd imān ma īpseti tān agnis trivṛtā stomena jarābodhīyena sāmnā nāpnot tān indram abravīd imān ma īpseti tān indraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2717_2: pañcadaśena stomena sattrāsāhīyena sāmnā nāpnot tān viśvān devān abravīd imān ma ipsateti tān viśve devāḥ saptadaśena stomena
GV02pncvbr1u:2717_3: mārgīṃyaveṇa sāmnā nāpnuvaṃs tān viṣṇum abravīd imān ma īpseti tān viṣṇur ekaviṃśena stomenāpnod vāravantīyenāvārayatedaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2717_4: viṣṇur vicakrama iti vyakramata (PB 20.3.3) yasmāt pra preva paśavo bhraṃśeran sa etena yajeta (PB 20.3.4) etena vai devā
GV02pncvbr1u:2717_5: jaitvāni jitvā yaṃ yaṃ kāmam akāmayanta taṃ tam āpnuvan yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate tam etenāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:2719: (PB 20.4.1) trivṛd bahiṣpavamānaṃ pañcadaśaṃ hotur ājyaṃ navasaptadaśāni
GV02pncvbr1u:2720: stotrāṇy ekaviṃśo 'gniṣṭomaḥ sokthaḥ pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhiḥ (PB 20.4.2) navasaptadaśenātirātreṇa prajākāmo yajeta nava vai prāṇāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2721: prajāpatiḥ saptadaśaḥ prāṇebhya eva tad adhi prajāpateḥ prajāḥ prajāyante
GV02pncvbr1u:2722: (PB 20.4.3) kakubhaṃ prācīm udūhati puruṣo vai kakup garbho vā eṣa
GV02pncvbr1u:2723: madhyato dhīyate (PB 20.4.4) tasyāṃ sākamaśvam (PB 20.4.5) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata tā na prājāyanta sa etat sāmāpaśyat
GV02pncvbr1u:2724: tā aśvo bhūtvābhyajighrat tāḥ prājāyanta prajananaṃ vā etat sāma
GV02pncvbr1u:2725: (PB 20.4.6) prajāyate bahur bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2726: (PB 20.4.7) dvipadāṃ kakubho loke karoti garbham eva taddhitaṃ madhyataḥ prajanayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2727: (PB 20.4.8) atirātro bhavaty ahorātre vā anu prajāḥ prajāyante 'horātre
GV02pncvbr1u:2729: (PB 20.5.1) trivṛt bahiṣpavamānaṃ pañcadaśāny ājyāni pañcadaśo mādhyandinaḥ pavamānaḥ saptadaśāni pṛṣṭhāni saptadaśa ārbhava ekaviṃśo
GV02pncvbr1u:2730: 'gniṣṭomaḥ saptadaśāny ukthāni pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2731: (PB 20.5.2) viṣuvatātirātreṇa jyeṣṭhaṃ jyaiṣṭhineyaṃ yājayed viṣuvān vā
GV02pncvbr1u:2732: eṣa stomānāṃ viṣuvān eva bhavati yad eka ekaviṃśo bhavaty ekaviṃśo vā ito
GV02pncvbr1u:2733: 'sāv āditya dvādaśa māsāḥ pañcartavas traya ime lokā
GV02pncvbr1u:2734: (PB 20.5.3) asāv āditya ekaviṃśa ādityasyaivainaṃ mātrāṃ gamayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2735: (PB 20.5.4) eṣa vā udeti na vā enam anyat jyotiṣāṃ jyotiḥ pratyudeti
GV02pncvbr1u:2736: (PB 20.5.5) nainam anyaḥ sveṣu pratyudeti ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2737_0: (PB 20.6.1) pañcadaśaṃ bahiṣpavamānaṃ trivṛnty ājyāni saptadaśaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanam ekaviṃśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ sokthaṃ pañcadaśī
GV02pncvbr1u:2737_1: rātris trivṛt sandhir goṣṭomenātirātreṇa bhrātṛvyavān yajeta gavā vai devā asurān ebhyo lokebhyo 'nudanta rātryānapajayyam
GV02pncvbr1u:2737_2: ajayann ebhyo lokebhyo bhrātṛvyaṃ praṇudya rātryānapajayyaṃ jayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2738_0: (PB 20.7.1) trivṛt bahiṣpavamānaṃ pañcadaśāny ājyāni saptadaśaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanam ekaviṃśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ sokthaṃ pañcadaśī
GV02pncvbr1u:2738_1: rātris trivṛt sandhir āyuṣṭomenātirātreṇa svargakāmo yajetordhvāḥ stomā yanty anapabhraṃśāya yad atirātro bhavaty ahorātrābhyām
GV02pncvbr1u:2739: (PB 20.8.1) trivṛt bahiṣpavamānaṃ pañcadaśaṃ hotur ājyaṃ saptadaśaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2740_0: maitrāvaruṇasya pañcadaśaṃ brāhmaṇācchaṃsinaḥ saptadaśam acchāvākasyaikaviṃśo mādhyandinaḥ pavamānaḥ saptadaśaṃ hotuḥ pṛṣṭham
GV02pncvbr1u:2740_1: ekaviṃśaṃ maitrāvaruṇasya triṇavaṃ brāhmaṇācchaṃsina ekaviṃśam acchāvakasya triṇava ārbhavas trayastriṃśo 'gniṣṭomaḥ pratyavarohīṇy
GV02pncvbr1u:2740_2: ukthāni triṇavaṃ prathamaṃ dve ekaviṃśe saṣoḍaśike pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhir abhijitātirātreṇa bhrātṛvyavān yajetābhijitā
GV02pncvbr1u:2741: lokān abhyajayat rātryānapajayyam ajayann abhijitaiva bhrātṛvyam imān lokān abhijitya rātryānapajayyaṃ jayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2742: (PB 20.9.1) trivṛt bahiṣpavamānaṃ pañcadaśaṃ hotur ājyaṃ saptadaśaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2743: maitrāvaruṇasyaikaviṃśaṃ brāhmaṇācchaṃsinaḥ pañcadaśam acchāvākasya saptadaśo mādhyandinaḥ pavamāna ekaviṃśaṃ hotuḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ triṇavaṃ maitrāvaruṇasya
GV02pncvbr1u:2744_0: (PB 20.9.1) saptadaśaṃ brāhmaṇācchaṃsina ekaviṃśam acchāvākasya triṇava ārbhavas trayastriṃśo 'gniṣṭomaḥ pratyavarohīṇy ukthāni
GV02pncvbr1u:2744_1: triṇavaṃ prathamaṃ dve ekaviṃśe saṣoḍaśike pañcadaśī rātriḥ trivṛt sandhir viśvajitātirātreṇa
GV02pncvbr1u:2745: paśukāmo yajeta (PB 20.9.2) reto hi nābhānediṣṭhīyaṃ paśavo vālakhilyā yan
GV02pncvbr1u:2746: nābhānediṣṭhīyaṃ pūrvaṃ śasyata uttarā vālakhilyā retasas tat paśavaḥ prajāyante rūpāṇi vikaroti yad vārṣākapam ṛtuṣu pratitiṣṭhati yad evayāmarut
GV02pncvbr1u:2747_0: (PB 20.10.1) trivṛt ātirātreṇa brahmavarcasakāmo yajeta tejo vai trivṛt brahmavarcasaṃ teja eva brahmavarcasam avarundhe
GV02pncvbr1u:2747_1: tejasi brahmavarcase pratitiṣṭhati pañcadaśenātirātreṇa vīryakāmo yajetaujo vīryaṃ pañcadaśa
GV02pncvbr1u:2748: oja eva vīryam avarundha ojasi vīrye pratitiṣṭhati saptadaśenātirācreṇānnādyakāmo yajetānnaṃ vai saptadaśo 'nnādyam
GV02pncvbr1u:2749: evāvarundha ekaviṃśenātirātreṇa pratiṣṭhākāmo yajeta pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśo yad atirātro bhavaty ahorātrayor eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:2751: (PB 20.11.2) tasya caturviṃśaṃ bahiṣpavamānaṃ pañadaśāny ājyāni saptadaśo
GV02pncvbr1u:2752: mādhyandinaḥ pavamāna ekaviṃśāni pṛṣṭhāni triṇava ārbhavas trayastriṃśo
GV02pncvbr1u:2753: 'gniṣṭomaḥ pratyavarohīṇy ukthāni triṇavaṃ prathamam athaikaviṃśam atha
GV02pncvbr1u:2754: saptadaśam ekaviṃśaḥ ṣoḍaśī pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2755_0: (PB 20.11.3) aṅgirasaḥ svargaṃ lokam āyaṃs teṣāṃ haviṣmāṃś ca haviṣkṛc cāṅgirasāv ahīyetā tāv āgacchetāṃ yato 'ṅgirasaḥ svargaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2755_1: lokam āyaṃs tāv atapyetāṃ tāv ete sāmanī apaśyatāṃ tābhyāṃ dvirātram atanvātāṃ tena svargaṃ lokam aitām
GV02pncvbr1u:2756: (PB 20.11.4) yaḥ pauṇyo hīna iva syāt sa etena yajetāpnoti pūrveṣāṃ prahām āpnutāṃ hi tāv aṅgirasaḥ (PB 20.11.5) prajākāmo yajeta dvitīyaṃ hy etad yat prajāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2757: (PB 20.11.6) svargakāmo yajeta dvitīyād dhi lokāt paro loko 'bhiprakramyo
GV02pncvbr1u:2758: durādho dvirātra ity āhur yad agniṣṭomaḥ pūrvam ahar bhavaty ukthyam antaryanti yady ukthyo
GV02pncvbr1u:2759: (PB 20.11.7) yaj jyotir ukthyaḥ pūrvam ahar bhavati nāgniṣṭomam antaryanti nokthāni

GV02pncvbr1u:2775: (PB 20.14.1) trivṛt prātaḥsavanaṃ pañcadaśaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ saptadaśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ pañcadaśaṃ prātaḥsavanaṃ saptadaśaṃ mādhyandinaṃ

GV02pncvbr1u:2778_0: (PB 20.14.2) prajāpatir vā idam eka āsīt tasya vāg eva svam āsīd vāg dvitīyā sa aikṣatemām eva vācaṃ visṛjā iyaṃ vā idaṃ

GV02pncvbr1u:2779_0: yathāpāṃ dhārā santataivaṃ tasyā eti tṛtīyam acchinat tad bhūmir abhavad abhūd iva vā idam iti tad bhūmer bhūmitvaṃ keti
GV02pncvbr1u:2779_1: tṛtīyam acchinat tad antarikṣam abhavad antar eva vā idam iti tad antarikṣasyāntarikṣatvaṃ ho iti tṛtīyam ūrdhvam udāsyat
GV02pncvbr1u:2779_2: tat dyaur abhavad adyutad iva vā iti tad divo divatvam (PB 20.14.3) eṣā vāva pratyakṣaṃ vāg yaj jihvāgreṇaitad vāco vadati
GV02pncvbr1u:2780: eti madhyenaitad vāco vadati yat keti sarvayaitad vāco raso 'dhyūrdhva
GV02pncvbr1u:2782: (PB 20.14.4) yad etāni rūpāṇy anvahaṃ vyajyante mukhata eva tad vācaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2784: (PB 20.14.5) prajāpatir vā idam ekākṣarāṃ vācaṃ satīṃ tredhā vyakarot ta
GV02pncvbr1u:2785_0: ime lokā abhavan rūkṣā anupajīvanāḥ sa aikṣata katham ime lokā loma gṛhṇīyuḥ katham upajīvanīyāḥ syur iti sa etaṃ trirātram
GV02pncvbr1u:2785_1: apaśyat tam āharat tenemān lokān anvātanot tato vā ime lokā lomāgṛhṇaṃs tata upajīvanīyā abhavaṃs trirātrasya vā idaṃ puṣṭaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2785_2: trirātrasyodaraṇaṃ yad idam eṣu lokeṣv adhi
GV02pncvbr1u:2786_0: (PB 20.14.6) gacchati paśūnāṃ bhūmānaṃ dvipadāṃ catuṣpadāṃ ya evaṃ veda (PB 20.14.7) prajāpatir yad vācaṃ vyasṛjata sākṣarad
GV02pncvbr1u:2786_1: eveti prathamaṃ kṣeti dvitīyaṃ reti tṛtīyaṃ yena yena vai rūpeṇa prajāpatir vācaṃ vyasṛjata tena tena rūpeṇājyāni cārabhyante
GV02pncvbr1u:2787: (PB 20.13.8) tad āhur brahmavādino 'kṣarestho vai trirātra ity ekākṣarā vai vāk tryakṣaram akṣaraṃ tryakṣaraḥ puruṣaḥ sa vā enaṃ vedety āhur ya enaṃ puruṣasammitaṃ vedeti
GV02pncvbr1u:2788: (PB 20.15.1) etena vai devā eṣu lokeṣv ārdhnuvann etena svargaṃ lokamāyan
GV02pncvbr1u:2789: (PB 20.15.2) vāg vai trirātro vāco rūpeṇājyāni cāhāni ca vibhajyanta ekākṣarā vai vāk tryakṣaram akṣaram akṣarasya rūpeṇa vibhajyante trayo
GV02pncvbr1u:2790: gandharvās teṣām eṣā bhaktir agneḥ pṛthivī vāyor antarikṣam asāv ādityasya dyaus trayo gharmāsa uṣasaṃ sacante

GV02pncvbr1u:2793: (PB 20.15.5) mithunaṃ dve sambhavato mithunād yat prajāyate tat tṛtīyam (PB 20.15.6) indro vṛtrāya vajram udayacchat so 'bravīn mā me praharṣīr
GV02pncvbr1u:2794_0: asti vā idaṃ mayi vīryaṃ tat te pradāsyāmīti tad asmai prāyacchat tad viṣṇuḥ pratyagṛhṇāt sa dvitīyaṃ sa tṛtīyam udayacchat
GV02pncvbr1u:2794_1: sa evābravīn mā me prahārṣīr asti vā idaṃ mayi vīryaṃ tat te pradāsyāmīti tad asmai prāyacchat tad viṣṇuḥ pratyagṛhṇād etad
GV02pncvbr1u:2794_2: vāca tad abhyanūcyate (PB 20.15.7) ubhau jigyathur na parājayethe na parājigye kataraś ca nainoḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2795: indraś ca viṣṇo yad apaspṛdhethāṃ tredhā sahasraṃ vitad (?) airayethām iti (PB 20.15.8) etad vā ābhyāṃ tat sahasraṃ prāyacchat
GV02pncvbr1u:2796: (PB 20.15.9) tasyaiṣā bhaktir ya ārṣeyo vidvāṃs tasmai prathame 'hani
GV02pncvbr1u:2797: deyaṃ yathā vā iyaṃ evaṃ sa pratiṣṭhiteyaṃ pratiṣṭhitaḥ saḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2798: (PB 20.15.10) yo 'nārṣeyo vidvāṃs tasmai dvitīye 'hani deyaṃ yathā vā
GV02pncvbr1u:2799: antarikṣam evaṃ so 'ntarikṣam ity antarikṣaṃ vidur vedaṃ tasya viduḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2800: (PB 20.15.11) ya ārṣeyo vidvāṃs tasmai tṛtīye 'hani deyaṃ yathā vai dyaur evaṃ sa dyaur iti divaṃ vidur bandhu tasya viduḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2801: (PB 20.15.12) śatāny anvahaṃ dīyante eṣā vāva yajñasya mātrā yac chataṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2802: saiva sāvicchinnā dīyate daśato 'nvahaṃ dīyante daśākṣarā virāḍ vairājo yajñaḥ saiva sā vicchinnā

GV02pncvbr1u:2804_1: sarasvati mahi viśruta etāni te 'ghnye nāmāni deveṣu naḥ sukṛto brūtāt
GV02pncvbr1u:2805: (PB 20.16.1) idaṃ vāva prathamenāhnā vyakarod yad idam asyām adhyāyat ta

GV02pncvbr1u:2806_2: 'hanī tau pakṣau yan madhyamam ahaḥ sa ātmāgniṣṭomasāmāni puccham (PB 20.16.3) yad evāsāv udeti tan mukhaṃ ye abhito 'hanī

GV02pncvbr1u:2813_0: (PB 20.16.7) yad vai trirātrasya saloma tad asya viloma yad asya viloma tad asya saloma tad yad etat paraṃ sad ahar avaraṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2813_1: kriyate yajamānāyaiva tat paśūn parigṛhṇāti prajananāya na hy amuṣmin loke paśavaḥ prajāyante (PB 20.16.8) ete vāva chandasāṃ

GV02pncvbr1u:2813_3: prajananāya na hy amuṣmin loke paśavaḥ prajāyante (PB 20.16.9) asau vāva trirātro yathodety evaṃ prathamam ahar yathā madhyandina
GV02pncvbr1u:2813_4: evaṃ dvitīyaṃ yathāstam ety evaṃ tṛtīyaṃ gacchaty amuṣyasāyujyaṃ gacchati sāveśyaṃ ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2814: (PB 21.1.1) indro marutaḥ sahasram ajināt svāṃ viśaṃ somāya rājñe procya
GV02pncvbr1u:2815: tasmād rājñe procya viṃśa jinanti tau yamo 'śṛṇon maruto ha sahasram
GV02pncvbr1u:2816: ajyāśiṣṭām iti sa āgacchat so 'bravīd upa māsmin sahasre hvayethām iti tam
GV02pncvbr1u:2817: upāhvayetāṃ sa yamo 'paśyad ekāṅgāṃ sahasre 'pi sahasrasya payo bibhratīṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2818: so 'bravīd iyam eva mamāstu sahasraṃ yuvāṃ vikalpayethām iti tāv abrūtāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2819: yathā vāva tvam etāṃ paśyasy evam āvam etāṃ paśyāva iti
GV02pncvbr1u:2820: (PB 21.1.2) tayā vā idaṃ sahasraṃ vikalpayāmahā ity abruvaṃs tām udake
GV02pncvbr1u:2821: prāveśayaṃs te 'bravan na śānāharāmahai yasmai na iyaṃ prathamāyādeṣyati
GV02pncvbr1u:2822: iti te 'ṃśān āharanta somasya prathama aid athendrasyātha yamasya
GV02pncvbr1u:2823_0: (PB 21.1.3) te 'bruvan somāya rājña udehi tṛtīyena cātmanas tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya payasa iti sā babhruḥ piṅgākṣy ekavarṣodait
GV02pncvbr1u:2823_1: tṛtīyena cātmanas tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya payasaḥ sā yā somakrayaṇī saiva sā
GV02pncvbr1u:2824: (PB 21.1.4) tṛtīyena cāsya tasyā ātmanas tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya payasaḥ somaḥ krīto bhavati ya evaṃ vidvān somaṃ krīṇāti yasmā evaṃ viduṣe somaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2826_0: (PB 21.1.5) te 'bruvann indrāyodehi tṛtīyena cātmanas tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya payasa iti sā śabalī paṣṭhauhy udait tṛtīyena

GV02pncvbr1u:2826_2: payasa indriyaiṣyā dattā bhavati ya evaṃ vidvān indriyaiṣyāṃ dadāti yasmā evaṃ viduṣa indriyaiṣyāṃ dadāti
GV02pncvbr1u:2827: (PB 21.1.7) te 'bruvan yamāyodehi tṛtīyena cātmanas tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya
GV02pncvbr1u:2828_0: payasa iti sā jaratī kuṣṭhāśṛṅgyad aid dhūmrā vā dityauhīrmato hrasīyasī tṛtīyena cātmanaḥ tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya payasaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2828_1: sā yānustaraṇī saiva sā (PB 21.1.8) tṛtīyena cāsya tasyā ātmanas tṛtīyena ca sahasrasya payaso 'nustaraṇī kṛtā bhavati ya
GV02pncvbr1u:2828_2: evaṃ vidvān anustaraṇīṃ karoti yasmā evaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2830: (PB 21.1.9) tad āhur brahmavādino na vā amuṣmin loke sahasrayāḍ aloko
GV02pncvbr1u:2831: 'stīti tad yāvad itaḥ sahasrasya gaur gavi pratiṣṭhitā tāvad asmāl lokād asau lokaḥ sarasrayājī vā imān lokān vyāpnoty atho yāvat sahasraṃ yojanāny
GV02pncvbr1u:2832: atho sahasram āśvīnān yatho yāvat sahasram ahnayāni tad gavā gavā spṛṇoti samākramaṇāya vā etā dīyante
GV02pncvbr1u:2833: (PB 21.1.10) sahasraṃ yad asṛjata tasya tārpyaṃ yonir āsīd yat tārpyaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2835: (PB 21.2.1) prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata tā asmāt sṛṣṭāḥ parācya āyan natsyati
GV02pncvbr1u:2836: na iti bibhyatyaḥ so 'bravīd upa mā vartadhvaṃ tathā vai vo 'tsyāmi
GV02pncvbr1u:2837_0: yathādyamānā bhūyasyaḥ prajaniṣyatha iti tābhyo vainaṃ ṛtaṃ brūhīty abruvaṃs tābhya ṛtanidhanenartam abravīd īnidhanenāvayat
GV02pncvbr1u:2837_1: triṇidhanena prājanayad etair ha vā idaṃ sāmabhir mṛtyuḥ prajā atti ca prajanayati (PB 21.2.2) adyamānasya bhūyo bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:2838: (PB 21.2.3) jyeṣṭhasāmāni vā etāni śreṣṭhasāmāni prajāpatisāmāni (PB 21.2.4) gacchati jyaiṣṭhayaṃ śraiṣṭhayaṃ ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2839: (PB 21.2.5) etair vai sāmabhiḥ prajāpatir imān lokān sarvān kāmān dugdhe
GV02pncvbr1u:2840_0: yad ācyā dugdhe tad ācyā dohānām ācyā dohatvam (PB 21.2.6) sarvān imān lokān kāmān dugdhe ya evaṃ vidvān etais sāmabhiḥ stute
GV02pncvbr1u:2840_1: (PB 21.2.7) ime vai lokā etāni sāmāny ayam evartanidhanam antarikṣam īnidhanaṃ dyaus triṇidhanam
GV02pncvbr1u:2841: (PB 21.2.8) yathā kṣetrajñaḥ kṣetrāṇy anusañcaraty evam imān lokān anusañcarati ya evaṃ veda (PB 21.2.9) agner vā etāni vaiśvānarasya sāmāni yatra vā etair aśāntaiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2842: stuvanti tat prajā devo ghātuko bhavaty agnim upanidhāya stuvate svāyā eva tad devatāyāḥ sāmyekṣāya namaskṛtyodgāyati śāntais stuvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2843: (PB 21.3.1) vāg vai śabalī tasyās trirātro vatsas trirātro vā etāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2845: (PB 21.3.2) tad ya evaṃ veda tasmā eṣā prattā dugdhe (PB 21.3.3) yo 'lam annādyāya sann athānnaṃ nādyāt
GV02pncvbr1u:2846_0: (PB 21.3.4) barāsīṃ paridhāya taptaṃ piban dvādaśa rātrīr adhaḥ śayīta (PB 21.3.5) yā dvādaśī syāt tasyā upavyuṣaṃ śabalīhomaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2846_1: hutvā purā vāgbhyaḥ sampravaditor yatra grāmyasya paśor nāśṛṇuyāt tad araṇyaṃ paretya
GV02pncvbr1u:2847: darbhastambam ālabhya śabali śabalīti trir āhvayed yad anyac chunaś ca gardabhāc ca prativāśyate sā samṛddhā
GV02pncvbr1u:2848: (PB 21.3.6) yadi na prativāśyeta saṃvatsare punar āhvayeta
GV02pncvbr1u:2849: (PB 21.3.7) śabali samudro 'si viśvavyacā brahma devānāṃ prathamajā ṛtasyānnam asi śukram asi tejo 'sy amṛtam asi tāṃ tvā vidma śabali
GV02pncvbr1u:2850: dīdyānāṃ tasyāste pṛthivī pādo 'ntarikṣaṃ pādo dyauḥ pādaḥ samudraḥ pāda eṣāsi śabali tāṃ tvā vidma sā na iṣam ūrjaṃ dhukṣva vasordhārāṃ śabali
GV02pncvbr1u:2853: (PB 21.4.2) prajāpater vā akṣy aśvat tat parāpatat tad aśvo 'bhavat tad aśvasyāśvatvaṃ tad devā aśvamedhena pratyadadhur eṣa vāva prajāpatiṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2855: (PB 21.4.3) eṣa vāva saśarīraḥ sambhavaty amuṣmai lokāyayo 'śvamedhī
GV02pncvbr1u:2856: (PB 21.4.4) saraghā vā aśvasya sakthy āvṛhat tad devāś catuṣṭomena pratyadadhur yac catuṣṭomo bhavaty aśvasya sarvatvāya
GV02pncvbr1u:2857_0: (PB 21.4.5) yat tisro 'nuṣṭubhaś catasro gāyatrīḥ karoti tasmāt tribhis tiṣṭhan pratitiṣṭhati sarvān palāyamānaḥ pratidadhāti
GV02pncvbr1u:2857_1: (PB 21.4.6) anto vā aśvaḥ paśūnām anto 'nuṣṭup chandasām anto viṣṇur
GV02pncvbr1u:2858: devatānām antaś catuṣṭomas stomānām antas trirātro yajñānāṃ yad vaiplavyo
GV02pncvbr1u:2859: 'nuṣṭubhaḥ pratipado bhavanti catuṣṭoma stomas trirātro yajño 'nta eva tadantaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2860: (PB 21.4.7) ekaviṃśam ahar bhavati yasminn aśva ālabhyata ekaviṃśo vā ito
GV02pncvbr1u:2861: 'sāv ādityo dvādaśa māsāḥ pañcartavas traya ime lokā asāv āditya ekaviṃśa ādityasyaivainaṃ mātrāṃ gamayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2863: (PB 21.4.9) anyad-anyad vā etāś chando 'nyonya ete paśava ālabhyanta etā vā etaṃ samāpnuvanti yan mahānāmnyaḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavanty aśvasya sarvatvāya
GV02pncvbr1u:2865_0: (PB 21.4.11) īśvaro vā eṣo 'yato 'dhṛtaḥ parāṃ parāvatam eto raśminā vā aśvo dhṛto yat pārthuraśmaṃ brahmasāma bhavaty aśvasyaiva
GV02pncvbr1u:2865_1: yatyai (PB 21.4.12) sarvastomo 'tirātro bhavati sarvasyāptyai sarvasya jityai sarvam evaitenāpnoti sarvaṃ jayati (PB 21.4.13)
GV02pncvbr1u:2865_2: ekayūpo vaikādaśinī vānyeṣāṃ yajñānāṃ bhavaty ekaviṃśiny
GV02pncvbr1u:2866: aśvamedhasya khādiro vā bailvo vā pārṇo vā 'nyeṣāṃ yajñānāṃ bhavati naicudāra ekaviṃśatyaratnir aśvamedhasya nānyeṣāṃ paśūnāṃ tejanyā
GV02pncvbr1u:2867_0: avadyanty avadyanty aśvamedhasya dakṣiṇato 'nyeṣāṃ paśūnām avadyanty uttarato 'śvamedhasya plakṣaśākhāsv anyeṣāṃ paśūnām
GV02pncvbr1u:2867_1: avadyanti vetasaśākhāsv aśvamedhasya yūpe grāmyān paśūn niyuñjanty ārokeṣv āraṇyān
GV02pncvbr1u:2868: dhārayanty ā grāmyān paśūn labhante prāraṇyān sṛjanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2869: (PB 21.5.1) trayas trivṛto 'tirātrāḥ sarve ṣoḍaśimantaḥ (PB 21.5.2) yo rājya āśaṃseta sa etena yajeta
GV02pncvbr1u:2870: (PB 21.5.3) rājā vā eṣa stomānāṃ rājyam evāsmin dadhāti

GV02pncvbr1u:2872: (PB 21.5.5) atha yat dvyakṣaraṇidhanam ājyadohaṃ bhavaty uttarayor ahor abhisantatyā anvaham ājyadohāni bhavanty anvaham evainaṃ paśubhiḥ samardhayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:2873: (PB 21.5.6) sarve ṣoḍaśimanto bhavantīndriyaṃ vīryaṃ ṣoḍaśīndriyeṇaivainān vīryeṇa samardhayati
GV02pncvbr1u:2874: (PB 21.6.1) caturviṃśāḥ pavamānās trivṛnty ājyāni pañcadaśāni pṛṣṭhāni
GV02pncvbr1u:2875_0: saptadaśo 'gniṣṭomaś catuścatvāriṃśāḥ pavamānāḥ pañcadaśāny ājyāni saptadaśāni pṛṣṭhāny ekaviṃśo 'gniṣṭomaḥ soktho 'ṣṭācatvāriṃśāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2875_1: pavamānā ekaviṃśāny ājyāni triṇavāni pṛṣṭhāni trayastriṃśo 'gniṣṭoma ekaviṃśāny ukthāni saṣoḍaśikāni pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt
GV02pncvbr1u:2875_2: sandhiś chandomapavamānaḥ (PB 21.6.2) paśukāmo yajet (PB 21.6.3) paśavo vai chandomā yac chandomāḥ pavamānā bhavanti paśūnevāvarūndhe
GV02pncvbr1u:2875_3: (PB 21.6.4) ubhaye stomā yugmantaś cāyujaś ca tat mithunaṃ tasmān mithunāt
GV02pncvbr1u:2877_0: (PB 21.7.1) trivṛt prātassavanaṃ pañcadaśaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ saptadaśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ caturviṃśaṃ prātassavanaṃ catuścatvāriṃśaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2877_1: mādhyandinaṃ savanam aṣṭācatvāriṃśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ soktham ekaviṃśaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2878: prātassavanan triṇavaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ trayastriṃśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ soktham ekaviṃśaḥ ṣoḍaśī pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhir antarvasuḥ (PB 21.7.2) ime lokās trirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2879_0: (PB 21.7.3) astīva vā ayaṃ loko 'stīvāsau chidram ivāntarikṣam (PB 21.7.4) astīva trirātrasya prathamam ahar astīvottamaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2879_1: chidram iva madhyataḥ (PB 21.7.5) paśavo vai chandomā yac chandomā madhyato bhavanty apihityā evācchidratāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2880: (PB 21.8.1) trivṛt prātassavanaṃ pañcadaśaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ saptadaśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ ekaviṃśaṃ prātassavanaṃ triṇavaṃ mādhyandinaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2881_0: savanaṃ trayastriṃśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ sokthaṃ caturviṃśaṃ prātassavanaṃ catuścatvāriṃśaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanam aṣṭācatvāriṃśaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2881_1: tṛtīyasavanaṃ soktham ekaviṃśaḥ ṣoḍaśī pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhiḥ parākaḥ (PB 21.8.2) parākeṇa vai devāḥ svargaṃ lokamāyan
GV02pncvbr1u:2881_2: svargakāmo yajeta parāṅ evaitena svargaṃ lokam ākramate
GV02pncvbr1u:2882: (PB 21.8.3) yad vā etasyākaṃ tad asya parāk tat parākasya parākatvam
GV02pncvbr1u:2884: (PB 21.8.5) nāsmā akaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2885: (PB 21.8.6) prajāyās tv akḷptaḥ parāṅ hy evaitena svargaṃ lokam ākramate
GV02pncvbr1u:2886: tad yad ekaviṃśaḥ ṣoḍaśī bhavati pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhis tenāsmin loke pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:2887: (PB 21.9.1) caturviṃśāḥ pavamānās trivṛnty ājyāni pañcadaśāni pṛṣṭhāni
GV02pncvbr1u:2888_0: saptadaśo 'gniṣṭomaś caturviṃśāḥ pavamānāḥ pañcadaśāny ājyāni saptadaśāni pṛṣṭhāny ekaviṃśo 'gniṣṭomaḥ sokthaś caturviṃśāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2888_1: pavamānāḥ saptadaśāny ājyāny ekaviṃśani pṛṣṭhāni triṇavo 'gniṣṭomaḥ sokthaś caturviṃśāḥ pavamānā
GV02pncvbr1u:2889: ekaviṃśāny ājyāni triṇavāni pṛṣṭhāni trayastriṃśo 'gniṣṭoma ekaviṃśāny ukthāni saṣoḍaśikāni pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhi
GV02pncvbr1u:2890_0: (PB 21.9.2) atrir akāmayata catvāro me vīrā ājāyerann iti sa etam apaśyat tasya catvāro vīrā ājāyantāsya catvāro vīrā jāyante
GV02pncvbr1u:2890_1: ya evaṃ veda (PB 21.9.3) ekaṃ stomam utsṛjyaikam abhyārabhate vīrajananaṃ vai stomo vīram evāsmai tat prajanayati (PB 21.9.4)
GV02pncvbr1u:2890_2: caturviṃśāḥ pavamānā bhavanti caturviṃśatyakṣarā gāyatrī prajananaṃ gāyatrī prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2891: (PB 21.9.5) ubhaye stomā yugmantaś cāyujaś ca tan mithunaṃ tasmān mithunāt
GV02pncvbr1u:2893: (PB 21.9.6) agniṣṭomaḥ prathamam ahar ūktho dvitīyaṃ ṣoḍaśī tṛtīyam atirātraś caturthaṃ nānāvīryatāyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2895: (PB 21.9.8) gāyatraṃ vai prathamam ahas traiṣṭubhaṃ dvitīyaṃ jāgataṃ tṛtīyam ānuṣṭubhaṃ caturtham
GV02pncvbr1u:2896: (PB 21.9.9) tad āhur yat tṛtīye 'hani ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇīyus tṛtīyenāhnānuṣṭubham āpnuyur acchandaś caturtham ahaḥ syād ānuṣṭubho vai ṣoḍaśīti
GV02pncvbr1u:2897: (PB 21.9.10) caturthe 'hani ṣoḍaśī grahītavyaḥ sva āyatane ṣoḍaśī gṛhyate
GV02pncvbr1u:2899: (PB 21.9.12) naudhasaṃ prathamasyāhno brahmasāma śyaitaṃ dvitīyasya śrāyantīyaṃ tṛtīyasya traiśokaṃ caturthasya
GV02pncvbr1u:2900: (PB 21.9.13) tad āhur apabhraṃśa iva vā eṣa yat jyāyasaḥ chandaso 'dhi
GV02pncvbr1u:2903: (PB 21.9.15) kāleyaṃ prathamasyāho 'cchāvākasāma mādhucchandasaṃ dvitīyasya rauravaṃ tṛtīyasya samantaṃ caturthasya nānāvīryatāyai nānāvīryāṇy ahāni karoti
GV02pncvbr1u:2905: ''kastam indra tvā vasava'' iti vāmadevyaṃ ''yajñā yathā apūrva'' iti caturthasyāhno bṛhat ''ed u madhor madintaram'' iti vāmadevyaṃ chandasāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2907_0: (PB 21.10.1) trivṛt pañcadaśo 'gniṣṭomaḥ prathamam ahaḥ (PB 21.10.2) athottarasyāhnoś caturviṃśaṃ vahiṣpavamānaṃ pañcadaśāni
GV02pncvbr1u:2907_1: trīṇy ājyāni saptadaśam acchāvākasyaikaviṃśo mādhyandinaḥ pavamānaḥ saptadaśe
GV02pncvbr1u:2908: dve pṛṣṭhe ekaviṃśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃṃ soktham (PB 21.10.3) tṛtīyasyāhna ekaviṃśaṃ bahiṣpavamānaṃ trīṇi cājyāni pañcadaśam acchāvākasya caturviṃśo mādhyandinaḥ pavamāna ekaviṃśāni
GV02pncvbr1u:2909: pṛṣṭhāni triṇavaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ dve cokthe ekaviṃśam acchāvākasya
GV02pncvbr1u:2910: (PB 21.10.4) caturthasyāhnaś caturviśāḥ pavamānāḥ pañcadaśaṃ hotur ājyaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2911: saptadaśāni trīṇy ekaviṃśāni pṛṣṭhāni trayastriṃśo 'gniṣṭoma ekaviṃśāny ukthāni saṣoḍaśikāni pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2912_0: (PB 21.10.5) jamadagniḥ puṣṭikāma etam āharat sa imān poṣān apuṣyat (PB 21.10.6) yad idam āhur navā ūrvau palitau sañjānāte
GV02pncvbr1u:2912_1: iti (PB 21.10.7) tat sarvān evaitena poṣān puṣyati (PB 21.10.8) jagatī chandobhiḥ sampadyate
GV02pncvbr1u:2913: (PB 21.10.9) jagatī vai chandasāṃ paramaṃ poṣaṃ puṣṭā paramam evaite poṣaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2915: (PB 21.10.10) puroḍāśinya upasado bhavanti paśavo vai puroḍāśāḥ paśuṣveva pratitiṣṭhanti (PB 21.10.11) agne ver hotra ver adhvaram āpitaraṃ vaiśvānaram avase 'kar
GV02pncvbr1u:2916: indrāya devebhyo juhutā haviḥ svāhā (PB 21.10.12) devāv aśvinau madhukaśayādyemaṃ yajñaṃ yajamānāya mimikṣatam
GV02pncvbr1u:2917_0: indrāya devebhyo juhutā haviḥ svāhā (PB 21.10.13) deva viṣṇa urv adyāsmin yajñe yajamānāyādhi vikramasvendrāya devebhyo juhutā
GV02pncvbr1u:2917_1: haviḥ svāhā (PB 21.10.14) deva soma retodhā adyāsmin yajñe yajamānāyaidhīndrāya
GV02pncvbr1u:2919: (PB 21.10.15) deva savitaḥ susāvitram adyāsmin yajñe yajamānāsuvasvendrāya
GV02pncvbr1u:2921: (PB 21.10.16) deva dhātaḥ sudhātādyāsmin yajñe yajamānāyaidhīndrāya devebhyo juhutā haviḥ

GV02pncvbr1u:2925: (PB 21.10.19) devy adite svādityām adyāsmin yajñe yajamānāyāsuvasvendrāya
GV02pncvbr1u:2927: (PB 21.10.20) devya āpo nannamyadhvam adyāsmin yajñe yajamānāyendrāya

GV02pncvbr1u:2930: (PB 21.10.22) deva tvaṣṭaḥ suretodhā adyāsmin yajñe yajamānāyaidhīndrāya
GV02pncvbr1u:2932: (PB 21.10.23) āgneya ekakapāla āśvino dvikapālo vaiṣṇavas trikapālaḥ

GV02pncvbr1u:2933_1: vārūṇo daśakapāla aindra ekādaśakapālo vaiśvadevo dvādaśakapālaḥ (PB 21.11.1) trivṛta prātassavanaṃ pañcadaśaṃ mādhyandinaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2933_2: savanaṃ saptadaśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ pañcadaśaṃ prātassavanaṃ saptadaśaṃ mādhyandinaṃ

GV02pncvbr1u:2934_2: dve ekaviṃśe saṣoḍaśike pañcadaśī rātris trivṛt sandhiḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2935: (PB 21.11.2) vasiṣṭhaḥ putrahato hīna ivāmanyata sa etam apaśyat so 'graṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2936_0: paryaid yo hīna iva manyeta sa etena yajeta (PB 21.11.3) yat stomāt stomam abhisaṃkrāmaty agrād evāgraṃ rohati vasiṣṭhasya
GV02pncvbr1u:2936_1: janitre bhavataḥ prajātyai (PB 21.11.4) pratyavarohīṇy uttamasyāhna ukthāni bhavanti pratiṣṭhityai
GV02pncvbr1u:2937: (PB 21.12.1) trivṛd agniṣṭomaḥ pañcadaśa ukthaḥ saptadaśa uktha ekaviṃśo
GV02pncvbr1u:2938: 'tirātro viśvāmitrasya sañjayaḥ (PB 21.12.2) jahnuvṛcīvanto rāṣṭra āhiṃsanta sa viśvāmitro
GV02pncvbr1u:2939: rājaitam apaśyat sa rāṣṭram abhavad arāṣṭram itare
GV02pncvbr1u:2940: (PB 21.12.3) bhrātṛvyavān yajeta (PB 21.12.4) bhavaty ātmanā parāsya bhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda (PB 21.12.5) jyotir vā eṣa vihṛtaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2941: (PB 21.12.6) jyotiḥ prajānāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda
GV02pncvbr1u:2942: (PB 21.12.7) catuṣṭomo vā eṣa catuṣpādāḥ paśavaḥ paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati (PB 21.12.8) ekaviṃśaṃ stomā nātiyanti pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśo 'ntata eva yajñasya pratitiṣṭhati
GV02pncvbr1u:2943_0: (PB 21.13.1) dve trivṛtī savane pañcadaśam ekaṃ dve pañcadaśe savane saptadaśam ekaṃ dve saptadaśe savane ekaviṃśam ekaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:2943_1: dve ekaviṃśe savane triṇavam ekaṃ dve triṇave savane trayastriṃśam ekaṃ pratyavarohīṇy ukthāni triṇavaṃ prathamaṃ dve ekaviṃśe
GV02pncvbr1u:2944: (PB 21.13.2) devāś ca vā asurāś cāspardhanta te na vyajayanta te 'bruvan
GV02pncvbr1u:2945_0: vāco mithunena vijayāmahai yatare no vāco mithunaṃ na prativindāṃs te parā bhavān iti te devā eka ity abruvann ekety asurā
GV02pncvbr1u:2945_1: vāco mithunaṃ pratyavindan dvāv iti devā abruvan dve ity asurā vāco mithunaṃ pratyavindanaṃs traya iti devā abruvaṃs tisra
GV02pncvbr1u:2945_2: ity asurā vāco mithunaṃ pratyavindaṃś catvāra iti devā abruvaṃś catastra ity asurā vāco mithunaṃ pratyavindan pañceti devā
GV02pncvbr1u:2945_3: abruvan nāsurā avindaṃs tato devā abhavan parāsurāḥ (PB 21.13.3) bhavaty ātmanā parāsya bhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda (PB
GV02pncvbr1u:2945_4: 21.13.4) saṃvatsaraṃ vā eṣāṃ tad vīryam annādyam avṛñjata
GV02pncvbr1u:2946: (PB 21.13.5) saṃvatsaraṃ vīryam annādyaṃ bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkte ya evaṃ veda (PB 21.13.6) pañcarātro vā eṣa pāṅktaḥ purūṣaḥ pāṅktāḥ paśavas tena purūṣaṃ ca paśūṃś cāpnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:2947_0: (PB 21.13.7) āstharir vā eṣa santato yajño dvau dvau hi stomāv ahar vahato yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate tam etenābhyaśnute (PB 21.13.8)
GV02pncvbr1u:2947_1: yatra yatra hy asthūriṇā kāmayate tat tad abhyaśnute (PB 21.13.9) abhyāsaṅgyaḥ pañcāho bhavati santatyai
GV02pncvbr1u:2949: (PB 21.14.1) trivṛd agniṣṭomaḥ pañcadaśa ukthaḥ saptadaśa ukthaḥ pañcadaśa ukthaḥ saptadaśo 'tirātraḥ pañcaśāradīyo marutāṃ stomaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2950: (PB 21.14.2) yaḥ kāmayeta bahu syām iti sa etena yajeta (PB 21.14.3) marūto vai devānāṃ bhūyiṣṭhā bahur eva bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:2951: (PB 21.14.4) saptadaśaṃ stomā nātiyanti prajāpatir vai saptadaśaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:2952: prajāpatim evāpnoti (PB 21.14.5) agastyo vai marūdbhya ukṣṇaḥ praukṣat tān indrāyābadhnāt te vajram ādāyābhyapatan sa etat kayāśubhīyam apaśyat tenāśamayat
GV02pncvbr1u:2953_0: (PB 21.14.6) yat kayāśubhīyaṃ śasyate śāntyā eva (PB 21.14.7) saptadaśa pṛśnīn ukṣṇaḥ pañcavarṣān saptadaśa pṛśnīs trivatsā

GV02pncvbr1u:3314: (PB 25.1.4) annaṃ vai pṛṣṭhāny annam eva tan madhyato dhīyate tasmān
GV02pncvbr1u:3316: (PB 25.1.5) paśavaḥ pṛṣṭhāni paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhanti (PB 25.1.6) cakre vā ete sākaṃvṛtīyat trivṛt pañcadaśau stomau yaṃ kāmaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3317_0: kāmayante tam etenābhyaśnuvate yatra yatra hi cakrīvatā kāmayate tat tad abhyaśnute (PB 25.1.7) athaiṣa trivṛd bṛhaspatistoma
GV02pncvbr1u:3317_1: etena vai bṛhaspatir devānāṃ purodhām agacchat purodhakāmā upeyur gacchanti purodhāṃ pura enān dadhate
GV02pncvbr1u:3318: (PB 25.1.8) athaite svarasāmānaḥ śiro vai divākīrtyaṃ prāṇāḥ svarasāmāno yad divākīrtyam abhitaḥ svarasāmāno bhavanti śivasyeva tat prāṇā dhīyante
GV02pncvbr1u:3319: (PB 25.1.9) athaiṣa pañcadaśa indrastoma ukthya etena vā indro 'tyanyā
GV02pncvbr1u:3320: devatā abhavad atyanyāḥ prajā bhavanti ya etad upayanti (PB 25.1.10) athaitāni dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni vyūḍhā agniṣṭomās trivṛto
GV02pncvbr1u:3321: madhyataḥ pāpmano mucyanta eṣa vāva devatalpo devatalpam eva tad ārohanti talpyā bhavanti pravasīyasas talpam āpnuvanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3322: (PB 25.1.11) athaitāv udbhidbalabhidāv etābhyāṃ vai bṛhaspatir devebhyaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3323: paśūn udasṛjat paśūn evaitābhyām utsṛjante (PB 25.1.12) athaite go āyuṣī mithunau stomāv upayanti prajātyai
GV02pncvbr1u:3324: (PB 25.1.13) athaiṣa chandomadaśāhaś chandasāṃ doho 'rvāñci chandāṃsy upayanti tasmād arvāñco bhuñjantaḥ paśava upatiṣṭhante
GV02pncvbr1u:3325_0: (PB 25.1.14) athaid vratam annaṃ vai vrataṃ na vā anyatra mukhād annaṃ dhinoti yad upariṣṭād vratam upayanti mukhata eva
GV02pncvbr1u:3325_1: tad annādyaṃ dhīyate tasmān mukhe sad annaṃ dhinoti (PB 25.1.15) athaitau prāyaṇīyodayanīyāv atirātrau yenaiva prāṇena prayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3326: (PB 25.2.1) atirātraś caturviṃśaṃ prāyaṇīyam ahaḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍahaś
GV02pncvbr1u:3327: catvāras trivṛto 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ sa māsaḥ sa dvitīyaḥ sa tṛtīyaḥ sa caturthaḥ sa pañcamas trayas trivṛto 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍahas
GV02pncvbr1u:3328_0: trivṛd bṛhaspatistomas trayaḥ svarasāmāno divākīrtyam ahas trayaḥ svarasāmānaḥ pañcadaśa indrastoma ukthyaḥ pṛṣṭyaḥ ṣaḍahas
GV02pncvbr1u:3328_1: trayastriṃśārambhaṇa ekas trivṛd abhiplavaḥ ṣaḍaho dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni vyūḍhā agniṣṭomās trivṛta udbhic ca balabhic ca
GV02pncvbr1u:3328_2: dve ahanī catvāras trivṛto 'bhiplavāḥ ṣaḍahāḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍahau sa māsaḥ sa dvitīyaḥ sa tṛtīyaḥ sa caturtho dvau trivṛtāv
GV02pncvbr1u:3328_3: abhiplavau ṣaḍahau pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍaha āyuś ca gauś ca
GV02pncvbr1u:3329_0: dve ahanī chandomadaśāhaś caturviṃśaṃ prathamam ahar dve aṣṭāviṃśe triṃśaṃ dvātriṃśaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśaṃ catvāriṃśaṃ catuścatvāriṃśam
GV02pncvbr1u:3329_1: aṣṭācatvāriṃśaṃ caturviṃśaṃ mahāvrataṃ cātirātraś cāṅgirasāṃ purastāt pṛṣṭhyam
GV02pncvbr1u:3330_0: (PB 25.2.2) purastāt pṛṣṭhyena vā aṅgirasaḥ svargaṃ lokam ākramanta yat purastāt pṛṣṭhāny upayanti svargasya lokasyākrāntyai
GV02pncvbr1u:3330_1: (PB 25.2.3) annaṃ vai pṛṣṭhāny annam eva tan mukhato dhīyate tasmān mukhe sad annaṃ dhinoti paśavaḥ pṛṣṭhāni paśuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3331: (PB 25.2.4) yad anyac cakrābhyāṃ sākavṛdbhyāṃ tatsamānam ā chandomadaśāhāt
GV02pncvbr1u:3332: (PB 25.2.5) athaiṣa chandomadaśāhaś chandasāṃ doha ūrdhvāni chandāṃsy
GV02pncvbr1u:3333: upayanty anapabhraṃśāyaiṣa vāva devayānaḥ panthāḥ pra devayānaṃ panthānam āpnuvanti ya etad upayanty athaitad vratam
GV02pncvbr1u:3334: (PB 25.2.6) athaitau prāyaṇīyodayanīyāv atirātrau yenaiṣa prāṇena prayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3336_0: (PB 25.3.1) atirātras trivṛtā māsaṃ pañcadaśena māsaṃ saptadaśena māsam ekaviṃśena māsaṃ triṇavena māsaṃ trayastriṃśena māsaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3336_1: mahāvrataṃ trayastriṃśena māsaṃ triṇavena māsam ekaviṃśena māsaṃ saptadaśena māsaṃ pañcadaśena māsaṃ trivṛtā māsam atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3336_2: (PB 25.3.2) ṛtavo na pratyatiṣṭhaṃs ta etena pratyatiṣṭhan pratiṣṭhākāmā upeyuḥ praty eva tiṣṭhanti ṣaḍ vā ṛtava ṛtuṣv evaitena
GV02pncvbr1u:3336_3: pratitiṣṭhanti (PB 25.3.3) yad gataṃ madhyata upayanti madhyata eva tad annādyaṃ dhīyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3338: (PB 25.3.4) pakṣi vā etat sattrāyaṇaṃ yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayante tam etenābhyaśnuvate yatra yatra hi pakṣī kāmayate tat tad abhyaśnute
GV02pncvbr1u:3339: (PB 25.3.5) trivṛtā prayanti trivṛtodyanti prāṇā vai trivṛt stomānāṃ prāṇair eva prayanti prāṇeṣu pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3340: (PB 25.3.6) etad vai dṛtivātavantau khāṇdava upeto viṣuvati vātavān uttiṣṭhati samāpayati dṛtis tasmāt tanīyāṃso vātavatā bhūyāṃso dārteyāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3341_0: (PB 25.4.1) māsaṃ dīkṣitā bhavanti te māsi somaṃ krīṇanti teṣāṃ dvādaśopasada upasadbhiś caritvā somam upanahya māsam agnihotraṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3341_1: juhvati māsaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajante māsaṃ vaiśvadevena māsaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3342_0: varuṇapraghāsair māsaṃ sākamedhair māsaṃ śunāsīryeṇa trivṛtā māsaṃ pañcadaśena māsaṃ saptadaśena māsam ekaviṃśena māsaṃ triṇavena
GV02pncvbr1u:3342_1: māsam aṣṭādaśa trayastriṃśāny ahāni dvādaśāhasya daśāhāni mahāvrataṃ cātirātraś ca (PB 25.4.2) agnihotraṃ daśahotā darśapūrṇamāsau
GV02pncvbr1u:3343_0: (PB 25.4.3) ete vāva sarveṇa yajñena yajante ya etad upayanti sarva eva bhavanti (PB 25.4.4) te sarve kuṇḍapāyino 'tsarukaiś
GV02pncvbr1u:3343_1: camasair bhakṣayanti (PB 25.4.5) yo hotā so 'dhvaryuḥ sa potā ya udgātā sa neṣṭā so 'cchāvāko
GV02pncvbr1u:3344: yo maitrāvaruṇaḥ sa brahmā sa pratihartāyaḥ prastotā sa brāhmaṇācchaṃsī sa grāvastut yaḥ pratiprasthātā so 'gnīt sa unnetā gṛhapatir gṛhapatiḥ subrahmaṇyassubrahmaṇyaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3345: (PB 25.5.1) saṃvatsaraṃ dīkṣitā bhavanti saṃvatsaram upasadbhiś caranti
GV02pncvbr1u:3347: (PB 25.5.2) tat saṃvatsaraṃ dīkṣitā bhavanti tapa eva tena tapyante yat
GV02pncvbr1u:3348_0: saṃvatsaram upasadbhiś caranti punata eva tena yat saṃvatsaraṃ prasuto bhavati devalokam eva tenāpi yanti (PB 25.5.3) etena
GV02pncvbr1u:3348_1: vai tapaścito devāḥ sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnuvan sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3349: (PB 25.6.1) trayastrivṛtaḥ saṃvatsarās trayaḥ pañcadaśās trayaḥ saptadaśās
GV02pncvbr1u:3351: (PB 25.6.2) etena vai prajāpatiḥ sarvasya prasavam agacchat sarvasya prasavaṃ gacchanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3352_0: (PB 25.6.3) yat trayas trivṛtaḥ saṃvatsarā bhavanti tejo brāhmavarcasaṃ trivṛt teja eva brahmavarcasam avarundhate yat trayaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3352_1: pañca daśā ojo vīryaṃ pañcadaśa oja eva vīryam avarundhate yat trayaḥ saptadaśā annaṃ vai saptadaśo 'nnādyam evāvarundhate
GV02pncvbr1u:3352_2: yat traya ekaviṃśāḥ pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśo
GV02pncvbr1u:3354: (PB 25.6.4) etena vai naimiśīyāḥ sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnuvan sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ya etad
GV02pncvbr1u:3355: (PB 25.6.5) te ha saptadaśebhya evādhyuttasthus ta u hocur yo naḥ prajāyām ṛdhyātai sa etat sattraṃ samāpayād iti tad etat samīpsanto brāhmaṇās sattram āsate
GV02pncvbr1u:3356_0: (PB 25.7.1) nava trivṛtaḥ saṃvatsarā nava pañcadaśā nava saptadaśā navaikaviṃśāḥ śāktyānāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśat saṃvatsaram (PB 25.7.2)
GV02pncvbr1u:3356_1: etena vai gaurīvitiḥ śāktas tarasapuroḍāśo yavyāvatyāṃ sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnot sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3357_0: (PB 25.7.3) bṛhatī vā etat sattrāyaṇaṃ svārājyaṃ chandasāṃ bṛhatī pra svārājyam āpnuvanti ya etad upayanti (PB 25.7.4) tad
GV02pncvbr1u:3357_1: etac chāktyānāṃ daśavīram eṣāṃ daśa vīrā jāyante ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3358: (PB 25.8.1) pañcaviṃśatis trivṛtaḥ saṃvatsarāḥ pañcaviṃśatiḥ pañcadaśāḥ pañcaviṃśatiḥ saptadaśāḥ pañcaviṃśatir ekaviṃśāḥ sādhyānāṃ śatasaṃvatsaram
GV02pncvbr1u:3359_0: (PB 25.8.2) sādhyā vai nāma devebhyo devāḥ pūrva āsaṃs ta etat sattrāyaṇam upāyaṃs tenārdhnuvaṃs te sagavaḥ sapuruṣāḥ sarva
GV02pncvbr1u:3359_1: eva saha svargaṃ lokam āyann evaṃ vāva te saha svargaṃ lokaṃ yanti ya etad upayanti (PB 25.8.3) āyur vā etat sattrāyaṇaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3360: avarundhate na hy atyāyuṣaṃ sattram asti
GV02pncvbr1u:3361: (PB 25.8.4) tad abhyanūktā tānīd ahāni bahulāny āsan yā prācīnam uditā
GV02pncvbr1u:3362: sūryasya yataḥ pari jāra ivācaranty ūṣā (?) dādṛśe na punar yatīveti
GV02pncvbr1u:3363_0: (PB 25.8.5) jyotiṣṭomasyāyanena yanti jyotir eva bhavanti (PB 25.8.6) ekaviṃśo 'ntataḥ stomānāṃ bhavati pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśo
GV02pncvbr1u:3363_1: 'ntataḥ stomānāṃ bhavati pratiṣṭhā vā ekaviṃśo 'ntata eva yajñasya pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3365: (PB 25.9.2) etena vā agniḥ savasya prasavam agacchat sarvasya prasavaṃ gacchanti ya etad
GV02pncvbr1u:3366_0: (PB 25.9.3) agner vai sarvam ādyaṃ sarvam eṣām ādyaṃ bhavati ya etad upayanti (PB 25.9.4) atha yat sahasrasāvyaṃ bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:3366_1: sahasrākṣarā vai paramā virāṭ paramāyām eva virāji pratitiṣṭhanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3369_0: (PB 25.10.3) yad ahar atirātro bhavati tad ahar vatsān apākurvanti saṃsthite 'tirātre sānnāyyena yajante (PB 25.10.4) sānnāyyeneṣṭvādhvaryuḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3369_1: śamyāṃ parāsyati sā yatra nipatati tad gārhapatyas tataḥ ṣaṭtriṃśataṃ prakramān prakramati tad āhavanīyaḥ (PB 25.10.5) cakrīvat
GV02pncvbr1u:3370: ulūkhalabudhno yūpaḥ prakṛṣya upopta eva noparavān khananti
GV02pncvbr1u:3371: (PB 25.10.6) te tam āpūryamāṇam āvāsyena yanti (PB 25.10.7) teṣāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ goṣṭomastomo bhavaty ukthyo bṛhatsāmā
GV02pncvbr1u:3372: (PB 25.10.8) saṃsthite goṣṭome paurṇamāsaṃ nirvapante te tam apakṣīyamāṇaṃ paurṇamāsena yanti teṣām amāvāsyāyām āyuṣṭomastomo bhavaty ukthyo rathantarasāmā
GV02pncvbr1u:3373: (PB 25.10.9) mitrāvaruṇayor ayanam (PB 25.10.10) etena vai mitrāvaruṇāv imān lokān ājayatām ahorātrau vai mitrāvaruṇāv ahar mitro rātrir varuṇo 'rdhamāsau vai mitrāvaruṇau ya
GV02pncvbr1u:3374_0: āpūryate sa mitro yo 'pakṣīyate sa varuṇaḥ sa eṣa mitro varuṇe retaḥ siñcati (PB 25.10.11) sarasvatyā vai devā ādityam astabhnuvan
GV02pncvbr1u:3374_1: sā nāyacchat sābhyavlīyata tasmāt sā kubjimatīva taṃ bṛhatyāstabhnuvan sāyacchat tasmād
GV02pncvbr1u:3375: bṛhatī chandasāṃ vīryavattamādityaṃ hi tayāstabhnuvan (PB 25.10.12) pratīpaṃ yanti na hy anvīpam aṣṭa vai pūrveṇa pakṣasā yanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3377_0: (PB 25.10.14) dṛṣadvaty eva (PB 25.10.15) dṛṣadvatyā apyaye 'ponaptrīyaṃ caruṃ nirupyāthātiyanti (PB 25.10.16) catuścatvāriṃśad
GV02pncvbr1u:3377_1: āśvīnāni sarasvatyā vinaśanāt plakṣaḥ prāsravaṇas tāvad itaḥ svargo lokaḥ sarasvatīsammitenādhvanā svargaṃ lokaṃ yanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3378: (PB 25.10.17) etena vai namī sāpyo vaideho rājāñjasā svargaṃ lokam aid
GV02pncvbr1u:3380: (PB 25.10.18) sa etad avabhṛtham abhyavaid ya eṣa uttareṇa sthūlārmaṃ hradas tad dhāsya śataṃ gāvaḥ sahasraṃ sampeduḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3381: (PB 25.10.19) śate goṣv ṛṣabham apy ṛjanti(?) tā yadā sahasraṃ sampadyante
GV02pncvbr1u:3383: (PB 25.10.20) yadā sarvajyāniṃ jīyante 'thotthānaṃ yadā gṛhapatir mriyate
GV02pncvbr1u:3385: (PB 25.10.21) yadā plakṣaṃ prāsravaṇam āgacchanty athotthānam (PB 25.10.22) plakṣaṃ prāsravaṇam āgamyāgnaye kāmāyeṣṭiṃ nirvapante tasyām
GV02pncvbr1u:3386: aśvāṃ ca puruṣīṃ ca dhenuke datvā
GV02pncvbr1u:3388: (PB 25.11.1) atirātras trivṛt pañcadaśam indrāgnyor ayanaṃ goāyuṣī
GV02pncvbr1u:3389: indrakukṣī atirātraḥ (PB 25.11.2) etena vā indrāgnī atyanyā devatā abhavatām atyanyāḥ prajā bhavanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3390: (PB 25.11.3) indrāgnī vai devānām ojiṣṭhā ojiṣṭhā bhavanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3391: (PB 25.11.4) atha yat trivṛt pañcadaśam indrāgnyor ayanaṃ goāyuṣī indrakukṣī bhavato 'saṃvyāthāya
GV02pncvbr1u:3392: (PB 25.12.1) atirātro jyotir gaur āyus tryaho viśvajid abhijitāv indrakukṣī atirātraḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3394: (PB 25.12.3) yad āhur aryamṇaḥ panthā ity eṣa vāva devayānaḥ panthāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3395: (PB 25.12.4) pra devayānaṃ panthānam āpnuvanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3396: (PB 25.12.5) tasmād eṣo 'ruṇatama iva diva upadadṛśe 'ruṇatama iva hi panthāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3397: (PB 25.12.6) atha yat jyotir gaur āyus tryaho viśvajid abhijitāv indrakukṣī bhavato 'saṃvyāthāya
GV02pncvbr1u:3398: (PB 25.13.1) saṃvatsaraṃ brāhmaṇasya gā rakṣet saṃvatsaraṃ vyarṇe
GV02pncvbr1u:3399: naitandhave 'gnim indhīta saṃvatsare parīṇahy agnīn ādadhīta (PB 25.13.2) sa dakṣiṇena tīreṇa dṛṣadvatyā āgneyenāṣṭākapālena śamyāparāsīyāt
GV02pncvbr1u:3400: (PB 25.13.3) indraś ca ruśamā cāṃśaṃ prāsyetāṃ yataro nau pūrvo bhūmiṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3401: paryeti sa jayatīti bhūmim indraḥ paryait kurukṣetraṃ ruśamā so 'bravīd
GV02pncvbr1u:3402: ajaiṣaṃ tv ety aham eva tvām ajaiṣam itīndro 'bravīt tau deveṣv apṛcchetāṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3403: te devā abruvann etāvatī vāva prajāpater vedir yāvat kurukṣetram iti tau na vyajayetām (PB 25.13.4) sa ya āgneyenāṣṭākapālena dakṣiṇena tīreṇa dṛṣadvatyāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3404: śamyāparāsyeti triplakṣān prati yamunām avabhṛtham abhyavaiti tad eva manuṣyebhyas tiro bhavati
GV02pncvbr1u:3406: (PB 25.14.2) adīkṣitaḥ kṛṣṇājinaṃ pratimuñcate yad adīkṣitaḥ kṛṣṇājinaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3407: pratimuñcate yo mānuṣy ṛddhis tāṃ tenardhnoti
GV02pncvbr1u:3408_0: (PB 25.14.3) atha yat tapas tapyate yā daivī tāṃ tena (PB 25.14.4) yad āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo bhavaty agnimukhā vai devatā mukhata
GV02pncvbr1u:3408_1: eva tad devatā ṛdhnoty atho prātassavanam eva tenāpnoty atha yad aindra ekādaśakapālo bhavaty aindraṃ vai mādhyandinaṃ savaṇaṃ
GV02pncvbr1u:3408_2: mādhyandinam eva savanaṃ tenāpnoty atha yad vaiśvadevaś carur bhavati vaiśvadevaṃ vai
GV02pncvbr1u:3410: (PB 25.14.5) etena vai puro devamuniḥ sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnot sarvām ṛddhim
GV02pncvbr1u:3412: (PB 25.15.1) atirātrāv abhito 'gniṣṭomā madhye sarvo daśadaśī saṃvatsaro dvādaśo viṣuvān sarpasāmāni viṣuvati kriyante
GV02pncvbr1u:3413: (PB 25.15.2) etena vai sarpā eṣu lokeṣu pratyatiṣṭhann eṣu lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhanti ya etad
GV02pncvbr1u:3414: (PB 25.15.3) jarvaro gṛhapatiḥ dhṛtarāṣṭra airāvato brahmā pṛthuśvarā
GV02pncvbr1u:3415_0: daureśravasa udgātā glāvaś cājagāvaś ca prastotṛpratihartārau dattastāpaso hotā śitipṛṣṭho maitrāvaruṇaḥ takṣako vaiśāleyo
GV02pncvbr1u:3415_1: brāhmaṇācchaṃsī śikhānuśikhau neṣṭāpotārau aruṇa āṭocchāvākaḥ timirgho daureśruto 'gnīt
GV02pncvbr1u:3416_0: kautastāv adhvaryū arimejayaś ca janamejayaś cārbudo grāvas tu dajiraḥ subrahmaṇyaḥ cakkapiśaṅgāv unnetārau ṣaṇḍakuṣaṇḍāv
GV02pncvbr1u:3416_1: abhigarāpagarau (PB 25.15.4) etena vai sarpā apamṛtyum ajayann apamṛtyuṃ jayanti ya etad
GV02pncvbr1u:3417: upayanti tasmāt te hitvā jīrṇāṃ tvacam atisarpanty apa hi te mṛtyum ajayan sarpā vā ādityā ādityānām ivaiṣāṃ prakāśo bhavati ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3419_0: (PB 25.16.2) etena vai gāvaḥ prajātiṃ bhūmānam agacchan prajāyante bahavo bhavanti ya etad upayanty etena vā ādityā eṣu lokeṣu
GV02pncvbr1u:3419_1: pratyatiṣṭhan pratitiṣṭhanti ya etad upayanty etena vā aṅgirasaḥ svargaṃ lokam āyan svargaṃ lokaṃ yanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3420: (PB 25.16.3) para āhṇāras trasadasyuḥ paurukutso vītahavyaḥ śrāyasaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3421: kakṣīvān auśijas ta etat prajātikāmāḥ sattrāyaṇam upāyaṃs te sahasraṃ sahasraṃ putrān apuṣyann evaṃ vāva te sahasraṃ sahasraṃ putrān puṣyanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3422: (PB 25.17.1) atirātraḥ sahasraṃ trivṛtaḥ saṃvatsarā atirātraḥ prajāpateḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3424: (PB 25.17.2) etena vai prajāpatiḥ sarvasya prasavam agacchat sarvasya prasavaṃ gacchanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3425: (PB 25.17.3) etad vai prajāpatir jīryā mūra upait tena jarām apāhatāpa
GV02pncvbr1u:3426: jarāṃ ghnate ya etad upayanti (PB 25.17.4) tad etat prajāpateḥ sahasrasaṃvatsaram etena vai prajāpatiḥ sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnot sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3427: (PB 25.18.1) pañca pañcāśatas trivṛtaḥ saṃvatsarāḥ pañca pañcāśataḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3428: pañcadaśā pañca pañcāśataḥ saptadaśāḥ pañca pañcāśata ekaviṃśā viśvasṛjāṃ sahasrasaṃvatsaram
GV02pncvbr1u:3429: (PB 25.18.2) etena vai viśvasṛja idaṃ viśvam asṛjanta yad viśvam asṛjanta
GV02pncvbr1u:3430: tasmāt viśvasṛjaḥ (PB 25.18.3) viśvam enān anu prajāyate ya etad upayanti
GV02pncvbr1u:3431_0: (PB 25.18.4) tapo gṛhapatir brahma brahmerā patny amṛtam udgātā bhūtaṃ prastotā bhaviṣyat pratihartartava upagātāra ārtavāḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3431_1: sadasyāḥ satyaṃ hotartaṃ maitrāvaruṇa ojo brāhmaṇācchaṃsī tviṣiś cāpacitiś ca neṣṭāpotārau
GV02pncvbr1u:3432_0: yaśo 'cchāvāko 'gnir evāgnīd bhago grāvastud ūrg unnetā vāk subrahmaṇyaḥ prāṇo 'dhvaryur apānaḥ pratiprasthātā diṣṭir viśāstā
GV02pncvbr1u:3432_1: balaṃ dhruvagopam āśā haviṣyeṣy ahorātrāv idhmavāhau mṛtyuḥ śamitaite dīkṣante
GV02pncvbr1u:3433_0: (PB 25.18.5) tad eṣa śloko viśvasṛjaḥ prathame sattram āsata sahasrasamaṃ prasutena yantas te ha yajñe bhuvanasya gopā hiraṇmayaḥ
GV02pncvbr1u:3433_1: śakuno brahmanām eti (PB 25.18.6) brahmaṇaḥ salokatāṃ sārṣṭitāṃ sāyujyaṃ gacchanti ya etad upayanti tad etad viśvasṛjāṃ sahasrasaṃvatsaram
GV02pncvbr1u:3434: sarvām ṛddhim ārdhnuvan sarvām ṛddhim ṛdhnuvanti ya etad upayanti
